As a shower gel, this product is exceptional.  It's an extremely rich and thick gel, and produces a generous lather with abundant bubbles.  I find it to be somewhat moisturizing- it doesn't explicitly moisturize my skin, but it also doesn't dry it out, even in the winter.  In addition, the gel is opaque and creamy, rather than clear, like most shower gel.  The melon daquiri scent is summery and fruity.  It's a pleasant sweet melons scent.  It doesn't smell especially alcoholic; though it's part of Philosophy's line of 3-in-1s meant to smell like fruity cocktails- like margaritas and pina coladas.  The scent is more fruity melon than alcoholic melon.  That said, people who like juicy, fruity scents will likely love this.  

While I haven't tried using this as a bubble bath or shampoo, the rich lather I get from the shower gel suggests to me that it would probably work very well as the other two parts of the 3-in-1.  The one thing that may be problematic for people- the scent doesn't last beyond the shower.  I can't smell it on my skin anymore when I get out of the shower, though the scent is quite strong while in use.  Some people may find that problematic.  I like that it doesn't clash with my perfume, so it's okay for me.

product_name: Bobbi Brown Shimmer Cream Shadow Stick: Beauty
title: love this!!
review_text: I use it every time I use make-up. (which isn't very often) but I just love it. It's easy to use and also looks great. Great if you're in a hurry. And plus, it's about a pen size, so you can even just put it in your pencil case. Or evening purse. :

product_name: Calvin Klein cK One Summer: Beauty
title: 2006 Edition in the Blue/Green Bottle
review_text:
It's been awhile since I bought myself some perfume, so I stood at the counter trying several perfumes. I had tried CK Summer 2006 earlier this year, but didn't get it.

Nothing I tried compared to it that day. So I bought the spray and shower gel.

This glorious perfume has hints of Tangerine, Pineapple, Grapefruit, Frangipani, Sea Breeze, Palm Sap, Driftwood. It's clean--very fresh smelling. I LOVE it! It's a very yummy scent.

If you like citrusy, clean scents, you'll love CK One Summer 2006. It stays on me all day, which is surprising. Usually scents--especially the clean ones I favor--fade as the day goes by.

This is a limited edition, and comes in the blue/green bottle. Don't pass it up!

product_name: Too Faced Lip Injection Intensive Plumping Lip Mask: Beauty
title: plumper?
review_text: i put this on for 5 minutes a slight tingling...a slight plumping happens..umm..its a big jar could last me a yea

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Cover Up Dark Circles
review_text: Put the "light" back in highlight without that greasy feeling.  Your dark circles will be concealed, and you'll look wide awake

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: THE BEST!!
review_text: This is truly the best in highlighting products and I have tried many high end and cheaper products out there.  This is so light and just doesn't get all cakey and greasy.  I have tried so many brands that claim to look natural, but they just don't.  This really does and don't let the price fool you either.  It only takes alittle and lasts a long time, so well worth the price for the look it gives.  I love this!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: !! Loooove This Product !!
review_text: I've been using Touche Eclat ever since it came out. I still love it. Cannot believe how rested I look after I put this on. My dark circles are minimized & I look radiant. Till now, no other concealer can beat YSL's Touche Eclat. Can't live without this product!

product_name: Curious by Britney Spears for Women Two Tempting! Fragrance Roller Ball and Lip Gloss Duo: Beauty
title: Awesome!
review_text:
Okay, I love this!  I got it for Christmas as part of a gift set and I absolutely love it.  It's ideal for in your purse for use on the go...  And the lipgloss smells/tastes great!  And when it's on, it has tiny sparkles of purple that seem to come from nowhere and then disappear just as fast.  Love it!  It lasts a long time, too!

Highly recommended for fans of this perfume who also love a good lipgloss

product_name: Curious by Britney Spears for Women Two Tempting! Fragrance Roller Ball and Lip Gloss Duo: Beauty
title: "Two" Perfect!
review_text: This item is a must for CURIOUS lovers. Its the perfect ON-THE-GO set. You have a roll on fragerence, and a hot lip shine. My review is a full 5 stars

product_name: Vera Wang Princess Body Lotion, 5.0 oz.: Beauty
title: Sweet and Sexy Scent
review_text: This is my new favorite perfume! Its not overpowering like some others. Its perfect for twenty and thirty-something women who like a sweet, medium perfume. (Its not too light or strong.

product_name: PARIS HILTON For Women By PARIS HILTON eau de parfum: Beauty: Paris Hilton
title: Not that bad...
review_text:
...This a nice, fruity, sweet scent comprised of apple, peach, freesia & mimosa, so this is best suited to daytime in spring/summer. It smells very similar to Ralph Lauren's `Ralph', so if you like that you'll like this too. 

On the minus side, this scent needs to be applied lightly to avoid headaches, it does get overpowering. (It loses a star for this).

Don't be put of by Paris' name on the bottle - try it!


Oh, the secret ingredient? Pheromones! Let me know if you have any look with it!!

product_name: PARIS HILTON For Women By PARIS HILTON eau de parfum: Beauty: Paris Hilton
title: Light and airy
review_text: This perfume had me skeptical of purchasing it mainly because of the name behind it...Hilton.  Anyways... I went to my local perfume store and sample it...LOVES IT!  =)   It's a very airy/light scent that isn't overpowering like most other perfumes.  I highly suggest this perfume

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Goodbye to stray-aways!
review_text: Naturally I have dark brown hair, but I dye it blonde, so I have a lot of dead ends and stray-aways. When I first received this product, I put a little in my hands and rubbed it into my dry hair. At first, I think I put in a little too much, because it was a little greasy, but I was amazed at the results. It instantly flattened and smoothed my hair. The smell was kind of vasoline-like, but don't worry it goes away. If you have dry hair, I definitely recommend this product. I used to use a flat iron on my hair to keep the dead ends from rising, but now I don't even use my flat iron. I just blow dry my hair straight and put a little hair healthy butter on and I'm out the door! I LOVE this product

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Great Conditioner!
review_text: I've been hearing rave reviews for CD's products all over forums, and I purchased the 8oz. Healthy Hair Butter for my dry, breaking, relaxed hair from Sephora. It has the consistency of Vaseline and when I applied it to my dried hair after washing, it felt very stiff and heavy. It was hard to comb my hair even with my wide-toothed comb and for a few minutes I regretted getting it thinking it would stay like this. I tied my hair into a loose ponytail, and wrapped it with a satin scarf for 20 minutes. When I removed the scarf my hair was unbelievably SOFT and smooth! It felt incredible. It absorbed very well into the hair. I was able to comb through it easily. It felt silky but slightly greasy, but that may have been my fault for adding too much. This is an excellent all-natural conditioner and it smells fantastic. Like lemons and mint and garden fresh. The only issues I have with it are that it's very heavy, so on relaxed hair apply it sparingly, or it will get greasy and weighty. This will be great for controlling new growth. Next time I'll try applying it to wet hair. Overall great product

product_name: Sephora Glitter All Over Color: Beauty
title: Good prodduct 4 a deep smoky eye
review_text:
These shadows are great 4 a deep smoky eye look. The pictures make the colors appear lighter and brighter than they really are when U get them at home.

The application is smooth and blends great, which is perfect for a smoky eye

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Great Products
review_text: I used Proactiv and wasn't pleased; it is very drying. I have tried over the counter and they are harsh too. This is a great product. Can be pricey but it is so worth it. I am African-American and find it difficult to indentify products right for me. This is on the money!! I use the entire line

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: best acne treatment I have EVER used
review_text:
As soon as I started using this face wash, I started seeing results very quickly, and I have had adult acne for a long time.  This product keeps them away and I don't have any at all anymore.  My skin is smooth now, no blemishes, and I will not switch to any other products, this one is the best..hands down..and believe me...I'v tried them all!!  Thank you Murad!
Stephanie

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Not just for acne prone skin!
review_text:
I'm 28 and have always had what I would call average skin, the kind that most women have. I have normal skin with a little more oiliness in the T-Zone and I get blackheads and the occasional breakout. I have tried all kinds of different product lines (Urban Defense, DDF, Dior, Philosphy, Bliss, etc.) and am the happiest with the results I get from Murad. 
I have been using Murad for about 2 1/2 years now so I have tried a lot of the Murad products and found a routine that works great for me. 

In the morning I use the AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser (love it! the gritiness gives you very smooth surface for applying makeup) then the Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel and the Skin Perfecting Lotion which I mix and apply together so that I don't use as much. Last I put on my Moisture Silk Eye Gel and I'm ready to go.  

At night I use the Clarifying Cleanser followed by the Clarifying Toner, the Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel, the Perfecting Lotion and the best product of all the Night Reform Treatment (see my review of that product for details, I love it!) and again I use the Moisture Silk Eye Gel. 

Once a week I throw in the Exfoliating Fruit Enzyme Mask and I have perfect skin if I stick to the program everyday. My skin looks and feels better than it ever has and people always guess my age to be around 23 so it must be doing something right! 

Top 5 Favorite Murad Products:
1. Soothing Lip Therapy
2. Night Reform Treatment
3. Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel
4. AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser
5. Clarifying Cleanser

Murad Products that I don't like:
1. Day Reform Treatment (too greasy and I hate the smell)
2. Purifying Face Scrub 
3. The products for combination skin - they are ok but the acne line is so mild that people with combination skin will see better results using it. (I have used both product lines)

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Try it and you might be suprised!
review_text: I've tried a full range of acne products from Proactiv to almost all of the drugstore brands, all of which have been disappointing.  Murad cleanser, however, is actually worth the money.  The cleanser imparts a tingly cooling sensation when used, a little goes a long way (need less than a dime size per use) and I saw clearer skin in less than 2 weeks.  I would recommend this product along with  Murad skin perfecting moisturizer to anyone.

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: The Best
review_text: I have tried other products such as ProActiv to help clear up my breakouts...and all have been harsh and may have helped clear my skin a little...but not enough for me to be 100% happy.  However, this product from Murad has completely cleared my skin and is so refreshing to my face.  Plus, I feel that you are definitely getting your money's worth -- this product last a lot longer than any other face wash.  I can't say enough good things about it...great smell, makes your face FEEL clean, ACTUALLY clears your skin, etc.  If you are looking for an alternative to ProActiv, try this.  It will probably take a week or two for you to see your face completely clear...but it will

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Great results from this refreshing cleanser!
review_text: I've recently started using Murad's Clarifying Cleanser as part of my daily routine and I'm very impressed with the results.  Not only does this cleanser smell fabulous, but it leaves my skin feeling clean and soft with no soapy residue left behind like some cleansers.  And I know that it's working because even after just 3 weeks, my adult acne is almost completely gone

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Best cleanser I've tried so far..
review_text: I have combination skin and this has dramatically helped my acne breakouts.  It can be drying at first, but after a week of usage, my skin adjusted.  It's very important to use moisturizer as drying out your skin can also cause breakouts.  Use this and a murad moisturizer (with SPF) and I doubt that you'll be disappointed.

product_name: Clarisonic Daily Cleanser 6 oz.: Beauty
title: Great Cleanser!!!
review_text:
This is the perfect cleanser with my Clarisonic brush. You must use the two together for maximum benefits.. What is great about this cleanser, is that it is extremely gentle, and mild to the skin, yet the brush actions cleanse deep into the pores.

Ever since I started using my Clarisonic brushwith this cleanser, I constantly get compliments on my skin. I have recomeneded this product combination to all my friends and family

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Leave-In Conditioner: Beauty
title: I love this stuff....
review_text: I've been using this product for over a year now...and I love it...I have naturally curly hair that i get relaxed every three months to loosen the curls...and this is the only leave in that I have found that not only smells great (I get lots of compliments)...but makes my curls look great and have bounce to it...I use the leave in as well as the Tui Oil...great products...great product line...highly reccomended...

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: I have been using Clarins UV SPF 40 for approximately 6 months now and would recommend this product - does not leave any type of white shadow and feels great

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: This is a great product!!!!!!!!!!!
review_text: I have to admit I tried to find a cheaper sunscreen that does the same things this one does without irritating my skin, but I keep ending back on this one.  It's awesome.  It feels great on your skin, works great, and is so lightweight.  It is so easy to wear under makeup if necessary, and it leaves a flattering look to the skin.  When it first showed up I thought it was an awfully small amount, but then I realized it only takes a tiny, tiny amount to cover your whole face because it's water-light.  So it lasts (at least for me) at least a month with daily use.  In my opinion the only thing they could do to improve this product would be to make it sweat/water-proof, but then it might not feel as good to the skin as it does.  I can't find a better facial sunscreen for the money

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Clarins UV Plus Facial Protection  is unlike other sunscreens
review_text: I stopped using sunscreen on my face, except at the beach, because all the brands I tried were too oily and heavy, and the directions were to apply UNDER moisturizer and/or foundation. The result was a greasy, shiny face with clogged pores and frequent breakouts.  And then I received a sample of Clarins UV Plus SPF 40.  What a difference!!  Clarins UV Plus is a smooth, light lotion to be applied OVER moisturizer.  (I can't even tell I'm wearing it, except for excellent protection from all the sun's rays.)  Now I wouldn't be without it!  Although the price is $36+, you only have to use a tiny bit, and it lasts a long time.

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Protection Perfection!
review_text:
This is my first Clarins product that I've ever used.  And I honestly am very impressed.  I've always been pretty anal about sunscreen and protection against harmful UV/UVB/Everything else rays.  I've always wanted products with the highest SPF available.  But the problem that I've always run into is that if you want a moisturizer with SPF included, it's usually on SPF 15 or 20...and that is simply not acceptable for me.

Higher SPFs always tended to be much heavier and oilier than I would like, and they caused me to break out frequently - Until Clarins UV Plus!  I am totally in love with this stuff!  It's a tiny tube that will literally last forever!  It has SPF 40 - which is enough protection from practically everything! It has anti-oxidants to fend off pollution.  What more could you ask for.  Yes, it is $35...but keep in mind that you will still need a separate moisturizer.  I use Hope in a Jar on freshly cleansed skin and then I apply my Clarins UV Plus, and I'm good to go.  

Protection is a must in today's world!  UVA/UVB/UV rays are going to bake your skin if you don't do something about it now.  If you're loking for a high quality, high protection product...Look no further

product_name: philosophy falling in love perfumed body lotion: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text: I love this lotion, it's the second time I've purchased it. I've usually moved on when I get to the end of most perfumed lotions - but I still love this. I have the bath gel also

product_name: philosophy falling in love perfumed body lotion: Beauty
title: Smells Gorgous!
review_text: It's smells a little like cotton candy but more like soft flowers, blackberries and sweet vanilla. It's a sweet, light smell. Not reall musky or overpowering. I love it. It feels nice and light going on , not greasy or sticky. Leaves my skin feeling silky

product_name: philosophy falling in love perfumed body lotion: Beauty
title: Love It
review_text: i never ever wrote a review for any product.  however - when i went to reorder this lotion i saw the reviews and was a little taken back.  this lotion is amazing.  the smell is beautiful and this product does not affect my sensitive skin.  i love it

product_name: CITY Cosmetics CITY Lips: Beauty
title: the best in the market
review_text: it does not irritate or burn. this is the best product in the market

product_name: CITY Cosmetics CITY Lips: Beauty
title: CITY Lips is the best one yet!!!
review_text: The wonderful thing about CITY Lips is that it really works! I fell in love with it the first time I used it, noticing a difference in the way my lips felt. They were extremely smooth, and unlike every other gloss I have tried, there was no sticky mess.  My lips have never felt so good, being completely hydrated and tremendously soft! I not only love the city lips, but the other city face products are wonderful as well

product_name: CITY Cosmetics CITY Lips: Beauty
title: husband love my lips
review_text: i was not sure if this product was really working, but my husband swears my lips are bigger. This is a nice gloss because it is not sticky at all and my husband can use it too. I guess it has helped make my lips bigger

product_name: CITY Cosmetics CITY Lips: Beauty
title: Good product - ridiculously high priced
review_text: This product does work - and the night treatment brings out the natural color of my lips and gives a nice gloss. However, the price is just outrageous. $19 would be a more realistic price tag. Also, as anyone who uses a lipgloss that comes in a tube and is applied by a wand knows, the bulk of the product gets trapped up by the entrance of the tube where the wand cannot reach. On top of paying top dollar for this product, I can't reach about a quarter of it! CITY seems to have created a great lip plumping formula, but they need to bring the price down and/or redesign the package

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance: Beauty
title: Fell in love with this fragrance!
review_text: After much scent testing was just thrilled to find this lovely, sweet fragrance! Cannot say I've had the same issues with staying power that a few others noted-- I find this scent quite detectable on my wrists and clothing even after an entire day out and about-- but, just chalk that up to the fact that everyone just has a different chemistry with a scent. I do agree that it is a "light" and subtle scent, certainly not meant to fill an entire room when you enter, but it is sexy, feminine and I've received many complimentary remarks on how pretty it smells. Absolutely love wearing it.

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance: Beauty
title: Smells like Cotton Candy-
review_text: I agree with the previous reviewer, the smell has a candy like fragrance. I generally wear Oscar or Chloe, but this fragrance is a nice change. Doesn't have much staying power, though. It wears off fairly quickly. But it is a lovely scent.

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance: Beauty
title: LOVELY SCENT
review_text:
LOVELY! LIGHT AND FRUITY SWEET. AN INNOCENT SCENT IF YOU WILL.  IT SMELLS LIKE COTTON CANDY. THE SCENT DOES NOT LAST VERY LONG AND I FIND THAT I USE IT SEVERAL TIMES DURING THE DAY. I WEAR IT ON DAYS WHEN I AM HOME OR ON WEEKENDS. IT IS MY SIGNATURE "MOMMY" SCENT.  MY KIDS LOVE IT.  
IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A SOPHISTICATED SCENT, THIS IS NOT IT.  I RECOMMEND MICHAEL BY MICHAEL KORS IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR SOMETHING SENSUAL AND SOPHISTICATED.

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance: Beauty
title: best romantice perfume ever!!!
review_text: I HAVE HAD THIS PERFUME SINCE NOVEMBER AND I AM NOT A PERFUME KIND OF PERSON. THIS IS HONESTLY ONE OF THE BEST FRANGRANCES FOR ANYBODY. ADD IT TO YOUR COLLECTION. ALSO I ENJOY DOLCE AND GABBANAS' LIGHT BLUE AND MOSCINO I LOVE LOVE. ALL THREE OF THESE SCENTS GOT ME MARRIED IN LESS THAN 3 MONTHS

product_name: Kenzo FlowerbyKenzo: Beauty
title: Light, flowery, sexy!
review_text: I was intrigued when I saw that amazon.com also sold body products such as perfume and make up.  How can you review a scent and convince people to purchase it?  I can't exactly post a scratch and sniff pad online.  I can say that this is one of my all time favorite perfumes.  It smells summery, light, fresh and refreshing, somewhat like Happy by Clinique.  The scent also lasts for a few hours, unlike some other cheaper perfumes.  Another bonus is that the packaging is beautiful: the perfume comes wrapped in a slender white box with a piece of rice paper that has describes flowers in a few different languages.

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Eye Shadow Soft Shimmer: Beauty
title: Best brand for eye shadow!
review_text: I absolutely love Clinique for eye shadow. All of their eye shadows go on so smooth, never crease, and are just the perfect shades of colors for my skin tone. The Almost Peach color is great because I can use it as a highlighter under my brow or just as a base, either way I use it just about every day!  :

product_name: Relastin, Eye Silk, 0.5 oz, 15 ml: Beauty
title: Relastin Eye Silk
review_text: I bought this product after first trying out Relastin's other product, Revitalizer.  I have really liked the Revitalizer, especially because it actually worked to firm up my skin and reduce my pores.  But I have different problems around my eye area like puffiness and I thought the Eye Silk could address that, which is normally hard to reduce.  So far, the results are good so I am happy with the Eye Silk.  This is worth trying

product_name: Relastin, Eye Silk, 0.5 oz, 15 ml: Beauty
title: Appear Younger
review_text: Stop covering up those blemishes, and fix them instead!  This non-greasy product brings out the natural elasticity in your skin, making you look younger

product_name: Relastin, Eye Silk, 0.5 oz, 15 ml: Beauty
title: I love the feel.  It really feels like silk on my skin.
review_text: The Eye Silk has a smooth texture and it is non-greasy. It makes my skin feel baby soft and it makes the lines and wrinkles go away.  I've been using it for six months and absolutely love it

product_name: Dior Pure Poison: Beauty
title: Fall/Winter Perfume
review_text: Pure Poison has a sensual and mysterious scent that is nothing short of invigorating.  But it's something I would only use during the colder seasons just because the weather brings out the scent more pleasantly.  For spring/summer, I would recommend Sunflowers by Elizabeth Arden.

product_name: Dior Pure Poison: Beauty
title: Whats YOUR Poison?
review_text: I love this,so does my husband.I bought the entire kit which comes in a lovely satin mini duffel-like purse with a handle.it includes body creme,body wash,perfume.it has a bit of a strong introduction.it doesnt smell like pine-sol like others have said.Its like a re-vamping of the original POISON in the purple bottle.except this one has a sweeter and crisper tone.it becomes light and stays fresh with time.id say its a bit fruity/floral.Good for everyday or a special night out.

product_name: Dior Pure Poison: Beauty
title: excellent
review_text: i love pine. i want to eat it. i am a nature detective so i love the out doors so this woodsy perfum is great for me

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Sweet Satin Shave: Beauty
title: Wonderfully Moisturizing
review_text:
This is by far the best shaving product I have ever used. Yes, it is pricey, but if you can get past that, you won't be disappointed.

I hesitated to purchase this for months b/c of the price, but my friend gave me a sample to try-- I was hooked! It is decandent & creamy, & a little goes a long way. I also used to spend more money on expensive razors to get a closer shave; I now only use the cheapie razors & my legs are so much smoother than before! I also use this under my arms & have NO irritation (this was another hesitation, as I have very sensative skin). 

The fragrance is amazing as well. Sweet, as in the name, but not overpowering. This works very well as a layering to Benefit's other scented products, or their Maybe Baby fragrance, as they all smell similar enough to compliment one another.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Sweet Satin Shave: Beauty
title: Mostly wonderful!
review_text:
The first time I used this, it was purchased for me as a gift.  It took me a couple of times to get the hang of it after using other foams and gels, but once I did, I was addicted.

Then I had to buy my own.  Just about fell over at the price.  It works great and I haven't had a nick or touch of razorburn since using it, but when I can go to another store and buy another product to shave with for 1/4 the price, I sometimes ask myself if it's worth it.  I just use it lightly and make it last as long as I can

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: My first LUSH buy
review_text: Like others, I was skeptical about a shampoo bar. I really,really like this bar. It has a great scent. The first time I used it, the smell stayed in my hair most of the day, and now it lasts a few hours. Its a pretty deep cleanse, so I really only use it when I've been at bars or when my hair is full of product. I use it about twice a week or so. It has a really great lather. My boyfriend even uses it, since the smell isn't floral, but rather spicy in nature. The little cinnamon sticks fall out after a while, but the bar itself has held. I will definitely buy again. If you have dry hair, you should probably use this sparingly, as your hair will be 'squeaky' clean, or just make sure to follow-up with a good conditioner

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Totally Lives Up To Hype!
review_text: I am on my second bar of this stuff now and, wow-there's so much I can say about it!  First the smell in honestly awesome and second, after only a week of use, I got all of these "baby" hairs cropping out over my head-this is awesome to me since, though I'm not currently loosing my hair, I have a strong family history of hair loss!  I also have VERY oily hair-the kind of hair that needs washed EVERY DAY or I look like I'm homeless but after using this shampoo I can skip a day and-for the first time in my life-you can't tell it my the condition of my hair!!  My only issue with this is that even though my scalp is oily, my ends are dry and I have to use just a tiny bit of cream conditioner along with it-also this item dissolves SUPER quick if you leave it in the shower and makes everything in your shower pink...but other than that I strongly recommend this item to anyone curious

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: I'm sold!
review_text: This product is wonderful. I have extremely thick and unruly hair which always needs to be conditioned in order to get a brush through it. It's also started falling out by the handfuls since the birth of my daughter (an iron deficiency may be the culprit). This solid shampoo bar leaves my hair soft and shiny, and I DON'T need a conditioner. It lathers up wonderfully, too. So far, I've also noticed that hairs don't come away when I run my fingers through it, so I'm keeping my fingers crossed that NEW! will help me to combat the hair loss. And, lastly, LUSH sent me a tin to keep it in, which I thought was pretty cool.

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: I LOVE this shampoo
review_text: I was totally skeptical about purchasing a solid shampoo. I was also completely NEW to LUSH products in general. WOW, was I surprised when I used this little bar! At first I was surprised at how small the bar itself is. I thought it wouldn't last a few washes...but it's absolutly amazing! I am a male and all I need to do is rub this bar on my head twice and my head is full of rich, thick suds! The lathering is amazing!!! There really are NO WORDS to describe how amazingly well this lathers. The scent is DELICIOUS! I love the cinnamon, spicey, almost "holiday" type scent. It is very pleasant and refreshing at the same time. I don't know how well this shampoo is for actually moisturizing (I have dry hair and my hair has pretty much stayed the same texture-so I can't say that this softens very well) but the scent and lathering-action alone were well worth the price for me. I can't wait to try more products from Lush

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Add my voice to the chorus
review_text: Smells great, works great, lasts forever and a day....what's not to love?  I was shopping in New York with a friend last month and followed her into LUSH.  I picked up a few things, all good, but this shampoo is outstanding

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Super Clean & the Smell...mmmmmm
review_text: I have used many Lush products and some I love, some I HATE!  This one definitely falls in the LOVE category.  I have thick, medium texture, color-treated, slightly wavy hair.  This stuff works!!  I use it every other wash to remove all the residue from salon shampoos, conditioners, and products.  It makes my hair so shiny.  It lasts forever, about 3 months using it every other day.  Be sure to store it where it will not get wet - I use disposable gladware.  And, I haven't even gotten to the best part.  The smell is refreshing - mostly cinnamon and it makes your scalp tingle just a bit.  Can't say enough about this one!

product_name: Bare Escentuals bareVitamins Eye Rev-er Upper: Beauty
title: brighter eyes
review_text: This product really does brighten your eyes and when used with the eye powder, amazing! Worth the money!

product_name: Bare Escentuals bareVitamins Eye Rev-er Upper: Beauty
title: when you can just feel the puff and tired in your eyes as you start thinking anyone who looks in your eyes will know exactly ...
reviewer: sami p. "samieyeam green eggs and ham"
reviewer_location: New York City,  NY United States
review_text: ... what you've been doing or did last night. This stuff feels nice and cool and leaves this great shimmering highlight which looks the absolute natural best out of the few other types i've tried. Really nice stuff!!

product_name: Bliss Slimulator: Beauty
title: I like it
review_text: It feels nice and is fun to use as a massage along with lotions.  I can see how frequent use can help smooth out the area.

product_name: Bliss Slimulator: Beauty
title: Slimulator
review_text: This is a good product to use in the shower when you want to scrub on your cellulite.  It feels good and does not hurt to rub.  I don't think I use it enough to see if it makes a big difference but I'd like to think it does.  It does get the circulation going.  I like this product and will continue to use it.

product_name: Bare Escentuals Baby Buki Brush: Beauty
title: a must have
review_text: if you are using this line of makeup--and I strongly recommend it--you must get the brushes--its worth the money-makes application a breeze

product_name: PRADA For Men By PRADA eau de toilette: Beauty: Prada
title: Powdery Fresh Scent
review_text: This scent is a bit softer than many men's fragrances. It's a unique powdery scent. I like how it is not too strong and overbearing on one spray. Just enough so my girl can smell it when she hugs me or sits next to me. I also use Acqua di Gio and it is a good contrast to this scent. I get compliments for both scents

product_name: philosophy pure grace perfumed shower cream: Beauty
title: Wonderful clean smell
review_text: I love the smell of Philosophy Pure Grace. The shampoo/shower gel smells just as clean and fresh as the perfume. It's not too drying either

product_name: philosophy pure grace perfumed shower cream: Beauty
title: Great Stuff
review_text: Of all the Philosophy line, I find that this is the best consistency-wise.  It's much thicker than the Amazing or Baby Grace gels, and leaves your hair and skin much softer, and smelling like Ivory soap.  Very clean scented, not too girly.

product_name: Clinique Almost Lipstick: Beauty
title: love it
review_text: ok, this is the first lipstick my mom let me wear/buy. 15 YEARS AGO! it is still my favorite. you can't go wrong

product_name: Clinique Almost Lipstick: Beauty
title: I hate lipstick, but love this
review_text: I am one of these people who hates make up, I am natural, but this is yet another of the clinique line that I love love love.  This almost lipstick is great.  It does not leave nasty lipstick everywhere. It stays on the lips not on my teeth, the glass or my boyfriend.  I love the almost lipstick.  It is great

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: A secret for stunning hair..
review_text: I really really love this product. It is the first rub in moisturizer I have ever used that smooths in evenly without leaving a sticky, slick feeling all over my hands. I think it actually has helped my cuticles as well.. But, it works wonderfully on frizz and damaged ends. It really seems to smooth and repair them

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: Miracle treatment
review_text: I have fine hair, and this did nothing to make my hair oily or weigh it down. It helped emphasize my natural wave and eliminated the need to heat-style. Plus, no frizzies! One thing to keep in mind: This is a PRE shampoo treatment, so make sure you use it before you shower and then wash it out. Your hair shouldn't get too greasy if you wash it out. You can also warm a little in your hands and pull through your ends as a hydrating styling product. The smell is a little "unique," not bad exactly, but you can always wash it out with your favorite-smelling shampoo. However, the whole line by Ojon is good, so I'd recommend the shampoo, conditioner, and styling cream too.

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: Best Product on the Market
review_text:
I've read the reviews, and it seems that only people with thick, coarse hair think this is right for them. Well, I have very fine hair that is chemically processed, and I've tried literally every product on the market. This makes my hair extremely soft and FULL! So far I've only used the restorative treatment, but after seeing the amazing results it gives, I'm ready to try the whole line.

It smells to me like mocha coffee, and I absolutely LOVE the smell, when I'm using it I run my hands through my hair and sniff them constantly - my husband laughs at me. I do think it's an earthy smell that some people would not like, though. It's kind of like patchouli, you either love it or hate it.

I know the price tag is a bit daunting - but a little does go a long way, so it lasts forever. And it's helping a tribe in Central America to thrive - that helps you feel a little better about spending the money.

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: Happy; but product is not for everyone
review_text:
I read the reviews of this product, and decided to go for it.  I love the smell (although it is a distinctive scent and it may not be for everyone), and it does make my hair really soft.  However, I have semi-fine hair, and it made my hair really oily-looking, even though I used a tiny amount.  I think people with thicker hair may benefit more from this hair treatment.  It reminds me of glorified coco butter with just a few more ingredients (and coco butter is way cheaper). 

I will use Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment again, but probably only on the weekends when I'm not going to work (because of the oily look).  

The bottom line is, definately smell it first to make sure you like it!  They sell it at Pure Beauty stores, among other places.  And, if you can try it somewhere before you buy it, do it!  Make sure it doesn't give you the "oily" look

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: oh ojon you amaze me
review_text:
i'm a true product junkie. i've tried more crap and spent more money on stuff for my colored, processed, blow dried, ironed, wavy damaged weak hair then any sane human being would...but i think i finally found my soulmate of a product...

first i must say it smells divine like mocha coffee...

i use this product daily before bed every night and in the morning after i towel dry my hair..it is the ONLY product i leave in my hair after shower whether i wear it naturally wavy or blow dry it straight...sometimes i will add the ojon gloss serum if i feel my hair needs it...

a little goes a long way, my past bottom of bra thick hair uses about the size of a tablespoon...

since using this product 2 weeks my hair is significantly shinier, softer, way less frizz, no more puff and not as porous.my color also looks more vibrant which is great b/c it's blonde and was getting brassy. and i noticed results right after the 1st treatment.

i especially love that it's good for your hair and the purchase contributions helps the tribe in central america who gather the oil from their trees. =)


it is pricey but worth every cent and then some. you can't put a price of true beauty right

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: It's Good Stuff
review_text: I brought the kit which included both the ultra hydrating shampoo and conditioner as well as the hair treatment from QVC.  First of all, lets talk about the smell.  Yes there is a smell but it's not really that bad, honestly.  It has a slight coffee smell, but since I used the hair treatment as a pre-shampoo treatment, the smell wasn't really worth complaining about because it's not noticable after you shampoo.  Second, the hair treatment is absolutely great for hair that has been in braided styles for extended periods of time or has just been mistreated and needs a little TLC.  It restores moisture and elasticity to my starving hair.  I don't have course or very kinky hair, but it is very thick and this stuff works very well with my thick hair.  It also moisturizes the scalp, which I love.  The only thing I'd want to change is the price, wish it was a little cheaper, but because it's not, I guess I value it all the more

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: Very Cool!!
review_text: Ok, this stuff is a bit like putting grease in your hair, but you use no more than a rice-sized amount and it will add shine and make your hair feel more healthy (and it may actually be!). I find the more I use it, the better my hair seems. It does have a slight odor similar to coffee beans, but I like that smell so it doesn't bother me. If your hair is dry or over-processed this stuff is for you -  but if your hair is just very fine and limp, I don't think this product would be for you

product_name: Bobbi Brown Oil Free Even Finish Foundation SPF 15: Beauty
title: FLAWLESS PERFECTION
review_text: I have been hooked on this foundation since I found it at the Bloomdale's counter in NYC in 2002. I have oily complexion and this keeps my face not just looking but also feeling fresh and wonderful.I have skin issues but with this foundation as an example this morning all men see is a WOW face. My shade is definitely Honey, find your perfect shade/color match and you too will fall in love with Bobbi Brown Foundation. I refuse to use anything else, why mess with WOW

product_name: Bobbi Brown Oil Free Even Finish Foundation SPF 15: Beauty
title: Eureka!
review_text: Every other foundation I've tried has had some ashy undertone, no matter what color I tried, and even when the color itself was right. This one was the exceptation. They seemed to have got the undertone thing right. I got great coverage, and at the same time managed to have it looking natural. It's oil free, but not chalky: think dewy, not greasy, which I appreciate as a person with oily skin. My skin looked like it was naturally near-flawless and even, but it also lookked like I was wearing little to no foundation. I hear it's buildable though, so someone who likes cake-face makeup could have that with it

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Rose Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: Fresh picked roses
review_text: "Holly, you smell like roses!" is what I hear anytime someone comes near me. And its all thanks to this little bottle of wonders. Normally fragrance gives me severe hives, but not this. I am beautifully scented and hive free. AND it DOESN'T smell like old lady Big Lots perfume. It smells like actual roses. I once compared it to a real rose and the smells were identical. I am a teen and am constantly complimented on this scent by my peers. I even put a little in my hair to help smooth split ends. A wonderul product, deserving of 10 stars

product_name: Bobbi Brown Creamy Concealer Kit: Beauty
title: smooth operator
review_text:
I gave this four stars because of the price and because I bought a concealer brush for the cream and have since found my finger does the trick nicely!
Aside from that, the effect of looking at your face in the mirror without any darkness under your eyes leaves you a little shocked at first...there is something wrong!  Until you realise that you just look really...fresh. There is no other word. You look like you've had a great nights' sleep and your whole face seems brighter because of it. Although it is a little on the pricey side..bear in mind you really don't need to use that much of it..the powder is great to matte everything out and the little mirror inside the lid is so helpful too! I know this is a great investment as everyone needs to conceal the stress, bad sleep and lifestyle from under their eyes! Bobby Brown is an expert at creating natural looking makeup that makes you look like the best version of yourself

product_name: Bobbi Brown Creamy Concealer Kit: Beauty
title: I love it
review_text:
All i can say is this product is great, because of my Indian Heritage, i got the dark circle around my eyes and after the baby my dark cirlce got worse. I looked so tired and older with the dark cirlces. I bough a lot of products to cover my undereye dark circles, but i was not happy at all. I was keep trying new concealers but no satisfaction at all.  One day i went to a store they sell Bobbi products, and i was just looking for a powder that matched my skin tone from bobbi brown. They got me the right powder color and she asked me to try out some of the Bobbi Brown Creamy Concealer for my dark cirlces. I was not sure but i let her try it on me. I was so happy to see my dark circles gone. And i keep getting compliments how fresh i look and makes me feel pretty. Since than its my all time favourite. A little goes a long way. And i think its great for people with serious dark circles. I got a little kit with a small mirror, included with  a yellow based concealer and a a little darker creamy concealer to even out the yellow concealer with your skin color and a yellow powder for the finishing touch.
You just have to get the right color of concealer for your skin complexion. 
Its a little expensive for that small kit but i love it its the money worth

product_name: Clinique Eye Defining Liquid Liner: Beauty
title: Love It!
review_text: Very good product.  I am allergic to many make up products, but this one I have not had any problems with.  Very satisfied!

product_name: Lancome Le Stylo Waterproof Long Lasting Eyeliner: Beauty
title: Great eyeliner from Lancome
review_text: I received Lancome Le Stylo Waterproof Long Lasting Eyeliner as a gift from my best friend on my last birthday. Since we are both in love with make up, she knew what to get. I fell in love with this eyeliner because it was smooth and easy to apply and it looked great. It works very well and very long lasting. They have different color and all of them are pretty. Even though, Lancome is a pretty pricey brand, the product pays for it.

product_name: Clinique Almost Lipstick: Beauty
title: love it
review_text: ok, this is the first lipstick my mom let me wear/buy. 15 YEARS AGO! it is still my favorite. you can't go wrong

product_name: Clinique Almost Lipstick: Beauty
title: I hate lipstick, but love this
review_text: I am one of these people who hates make up, I am natural, but this is yet another of the clinique line that I love love love.  This almost lipstick is great.  It does not leave nasty lipstick everywhere. It stays on the lips not on my teeth, the glass or my boyfriend.  I love the almost lipstick.  It is great

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Eye Shadow Soft Shimmer: Beauty
title: Best brand for eye shadow!
review_text: I absolutely love Clinique for eye shadow. All of their eye shadows go on so smooth, never crease, and are just the perfect shades of colors for my skin tone. The Almost Peach color is great because I can use it as a highlighter under my brow or just as a base, either way I use it just about every day!  :

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Eye Shadow Soft Shimmer: Beauty
title: best shadow out there
review_text: I have only used clinique eye shadows and have been so happy with them. I've tried different brands and always come back to this one. They have great colors and it lasts all day without creasing or looking too "powdery".

product_name: Kinerase Cream 40gm: Beauty
title: It's worth every penny!
review_text:
And then some....

I try to take good care of my skin and have tried just about every "fine line" or general facial moisturizing cream available over the years.  

I purchased some makeup recently from Sephora.com and got a free sample of the Kinerase cream and decided to try it.  Within two days (no kidding) I noticed a difference in my skin tone.  I began to notice a more "fresh" look - rosy, if you will.  I had some light freckles as well, which started getting even lighter.  

I decided right then and there to get some of this cream, as I was quickly running out of the small free sample.  That was when I learned how expensive it is.  :-(  However, I decided that since this has made more of a difference in my skin in just DAYS that I would bite the bullet and spend the money.

I can't tell yet whether it's really helping some of the fine lines I have, but just based on what it's done for my skin tone and color -- I can honestly say it's worth every single penny.  Until they come out with a cream that can perfect skin tone in a day I'm sticking with this stuff....and singing it's praises

product_name: Kinerase Cream 40gm: Beauty
title: Best Ever
review_text: Within two days of using this cream, I waa astonished at the results!  My skin tone completely evened out, and my skin appeared smoother than it ever has in my life.  And it does add a glow.  I'm not so sure tha it really works on eliminating wrinkles, but the other effects are well worth every penny

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics DeGroovie: Beauty
title: It works
review_text: I wish I could agree with the PP, but I still have a problem with feathering and I have tried everything. This product works very well. I can wear the sheerest of lip glosses and it stays within my lip line. With dark colors, I no longer have to worry about the feathering that always occurs this keeps lip color inside your lipline. This also works nice as an eyebrow wax

product_name: Gucci Envy For Men: Beauty
title: Stress Free Shopping
review_text: I am so glad that I purchased this cologne from Amazon for a Christmas gift.  I also had it shipped directly to the home where the gift was going to be opened.  This was a good thing, since MY home was burglarized 4 days before Christmas and they stole all of our gifts. If this one had been under my tree, it would have been gone.  The convenience of ordering online and shipping to the person is wonderful

product_name: philosophy banana shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: Mild, smells amazingly like real fresh bananas, lasts
review_text: This shower gel works really well--you can use it as a general soap, and it's very mild, so you can use it anywhere (ah hem..) on your body without it stinging, or burning. I haven't tried it as a shampoo. Works quite well for shaving. Good consistency. Smells exactly like fresh banana. More of a fruity banana scent, like a tropical lifesaver, than a baked banana bread scent, if that helps any. Pricewise, this is actually one of the more affordable upscale shower gels per ounce, assuming you buy the large bottle of just one scent. Also, this stuff preserves very well. I still have some Philosophy eggnogg (!) shower gel that I bought for the holidays, and I have now used it through 2 Christmases and it still smells great..

product_name: H2O Plus Moisture Therapy Gloves: Beauty
title: Great product
review_text:
I admit: slathering on hand cream and putting on a pair of gloves is my Sunday morning indulgence. Usually, plain cotton gloves have done the job just fine. The first time I tried these,though, I noticed the difference immediately. The fabric seals in moisture and you get the pleasant sensation of your hands being lightly massaged.
When I took off the gloves, my hands looked and felt incredibly soft and supple. If you have very dry hands, these would be great if you wore them overnight.
They're very cheap too. A really worthwhile investment and highly recommended

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: A MIRROR SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy!

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Best Gloss on the Market
review_text:
MAC LipGlass is the absolute best. There are plenty of colors to choose from, SUPER-Shiny, and the gloss is thick, stays on and doesn't run. 
The best colors are....
NICO for a cute lavender pink color with a glittery shine. 
OYSTERGIRL is a shimmery baby pink.
OH BABY is the perfect gloss for any earth toned lipstick.
CHAI looks amazing with black smokey eyes. It's the perfect neutral earthy gloss and has no glitter or shimmer - just pure shine

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Vanilla scent not so bad!
reviewer: Lindsey Justice "MAC addict, and reader of many things"
review_text: I'm REALLY anal about scented/flavored lipglosses- especially ones scented or flavored with vanilla, but MAC LipGlass isn't that vanilla-ish at all!  It's got very pigmented color, it stays on a LONG time for a gloss, and each tube lasts a long time...  Don't let what the other reviewer said about the vanilla scent throw you off

product_name: philosophy the supernatural lash wrap mascara: Beauty
title: Best ever
review_text: This is the absolute best mascara. There are no more racoon eyes, and I don't need to use a curler

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 2: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text:
This is the toner that won't dry out my skin.

I bought the whole set and I have combination dry skin. 

The first day I thought it was strong. Second day, I can see on the cotton pad my black head on my nose. It worked! 

Along with the other 2 products, this toner made my skin glow in just a week.  My skin looked very healthy and beautiful. 

For people that have problems with this toner, don't use it during winter time. I avoid toner in general during winter time since I know my skin is already too dry. All I use is the mild cleanser and lotion. For Spring and summer, I use the whole set.

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 2: Beauty
title: Know your skin type!
review_text: With Clinique products, the key is knowing your skin type. I took the quiz at [...] in order to decide which products to buy for the 3step system and the results showed Clarifying Lotion #2 as the appropriate option. I was a little worried when I read reviews on Amazon.com that said it was too strong and had given some individuals rashes, but I used it anyway. It works beautifully. If you buy this lotion and get a rash or breakout it's because you didn't consult with a clinique source or are unaware of your true skin type. So long as you buy the right products for you, it's going to do everything it promises and more...I highly recommend it

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 2: Beauty
title: great exfoliant and very effective!
review_text: Clinique Clarifying Lotion is Step #2 in their 3-step skin care system.  (You start with their soap, and then follow the lotion with the Dramatically Different Moisturizer).  What I love about this one, made for larger pores, is that really effectively exfoliates and resurfaces your skin without stripping it of its natural oils too much.  You really feel it working, to pull out the impurities.  Well worth the investment....

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 2: Beauty
title: Part of A Great Refresher Course
reviewer: K. Montgomery "mercedes307--Contributing Author for Highland Press's Second Time Around Anthology"
review_text:
I've been using this product, along with the mild facial soap and dramatically different moisturizer, for fourteen years now. I remember my consultation with the Clinique rep like it was yesterday. And therein lies the rub--if you've never used these products and are considering doing so, it is best to visit a Clinique representative to help you decide which products are best for your skin. A lot of times, people do not know what skin type they have or think they have one when it's really another. If you're not using the right ones for your skin type, you won't get the results you need. The Clinique reps can help. Talk to them first and then you can purchase anywhere!

I myself have the combination skin. The Clinique rep warned me that I might have some initial blemishes, and I did, but they tapered off after a week or so. Just out of the shower, or after a long day of who knows what may have gotten on your skin, this is an uplifting, cooling-when-it's-hot, breath of fresh zinginess. Often one all over swipe with this on a cotton ball is not enough--so use the other side of the puff, dab on more clarifying lotion and apply again, and maybe more with another cotton ball till it no longer turns any shade. This is worth it. You are taking off not only the makeup that the facial soap may not have caught, but any impurities that daily activity can attract to the skin--dirty fingers unconciously rubbed over the neck or cheek, etc. Follow up with the Clinique moisturizer that's right for you and your skin will feel five times lighter. Your skin is important. These products have helped mine stay in amazing shape over the years

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 2: Beauty
title: New Clinique Clarifying Moisture Lotion 2
review_text:
I know that this is for reviews about clarifying lotion 2 but I thought that I would let people know about a new product Clarifying moisture lotion 2.

I have dry, sensitive skin and when assessed by the girls at the clinique counter I came out as a skin type I/II.  I use the extra mild facial soap, the clarifying moisture lotion 2 and the dramatically different moisturising lotion.  

When I looked at the reviews here on amazon I was suprised to find so many people were unhappy with the product, but I happened to go to the clinique counter the other day and found that in Australia there are two ranges of clarifying lotions, the original, which was what everyone was talking about, and the new moisture lotions.  According to the sales assistants the new moisture lotion was developed for the asian market and is alcohol free and being in the asian region Australia luckily gets both.

They exfoliate like the regular lotions but there is no sting or tingle and the skin feels really soft.  My face feels like polished marble at the moment and my makeup is going on and staying much better than before. I can tell you that my skin has never looked better since starting on Clinique and I would recomend this skin care line to anyone.

product_name: Clinique Clarifying Lotion 2: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text:
I have used this skin care system for the past 3 years without any issues. This works perfectly with my combination skin making it seem just like "normal" skin.

Additionally, my breakouts have been reduced to virtually nothing (like one pimple every 3 months compared to several breakouts a month). 

If you have never used these products you would benefit from going to the mall and having one of the consultants explain the product usage

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious: Beauty
title: LOVE IT
review_text: I have received SO many compliments since I started to wear this.  Its great, subtle and not over powerin

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious: Beauty
title: You just smell Yummy
review_text: I love this scent, I got it when it first came out in 2004, they gave away samples in the Macy's Impulse show and it has become my signature scent since then.  I receive lots of complements from everyone in the office since it really works with my body chemistry.  I work in a department mostly populated by men and they all tell me that this is the first perfume that does not irritate them.  Go out and try this scent.  It changes with time, to become a bit floral after a few hours, but my body chemistry can maintain the crisp, fresh, apple scent so it really works for me.  I love it

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious: Beauty
title: Sweet and Sexy!
review_text: Daring and provocative, enigmatic and mysterious, Be Delicious is a perfume with much to say. Dazzling with its spicy heart notes, Karan's message is seductive and perhaps even troubling. Way to go Donna Karan! 5 stars for you

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious: Beauty
title: Nice for summer and someone young
review_text: Smells fresh and slightly fruity but not cloying at all. Since I generally dislike fruity perfumes that was a plus. Nice enough but not heart stopping. I don't think I'll buy it again

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious: Beauty
title: Scrumptious
review_text: The first time I smelled this at a beauty counter I thought it was OK but I didn't buy it. By the time I left the mall the scent had changed and I decided to buy some. I get more comments on how good I smell when I wear this fragrance. It is awesome! I got my mom some for Mother's day and she is constantly get compliments as well...

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious: Beauty
title: Delicious, light scent
review_text: Finally I have found a delicious, light, everyday scent. Not to heavy or over-powering, this refreshing apple scent is great for any day.

product_name: DKNY Be Delicious: Beauty
title: Yummy!
review_text: Its scent makes me want to eat an apple... Delicious is the best word for it. Good for daytime, evening, whenever you want to smell fresh in Spring. You'll love it

product_name: The Body Shop Skin Focus Face Illuminator: Beauty
title: Radiant Rose....
review_text:
True or False?

1.	Beauty is only skin deep (read: physical beauty is superficial). 
2.	Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder (read: everyone is beautiful).

If anything my decade and half long stint as stylist and fashion editor has taught me, it is that a) physical beauty might be skin deep but its creation and maintenance is as complex a task as coming up with the theory of relativity b) beauty never lies in the eyes of the beholder...all beauty is about tricking the beholder to feel in a certain kind of way.

So banish all your old worn out mantras about beauty and adopt a new one. Beauty is hard work and Beauty is savvy. The Body Shop Skin Focus Face Illuminator passes both these litmus tests. For starters you are going to save a cool 14 bucks when you add this petite tube to your arsenal and before you scream, "what about quality?" let me assure you that a few dabs of this booster boy at the beginning or the end of your day (remember to wash and pat dry your face though) and your face will glow with that fresh faced allure that you last saw only in the black and white scrap books of your grandma.

p.s: Everyone is not born beautiful. I have seen enough. I know. You have to work at it.

p.p.s.:  And if it lightens your conscience any, the delightful gunk in this tiny tube has not been tried out on animals before. You'll be the first person to get a rash. Just kidding!

product_name: Sephora Prestige Brush Set: Beauty
title: Awesome
review_text: I am a hairstylist & I'm starting to do wedding make-up as well for some of my clients.  I am a firm believer in having high quality tools.  This set does not disappoint.  I achieved professional results from the get go with these.  I love them.  The bristles are soft & the handles are just right.  These brushes will last a lifetime.

product_name: Clinique Rinse Off Eye Makeup Solvent 125ml/4.2oz: Beauty
title: Clinique Rinse off eye makeup solvent
review_text: The best I've ever used. Little burn, very efficient. Love this stuff

product_name: Bourjois Precision Eyebrow Pencil: Beauty
title: I Love Noir Ebene
review_text: I am very pleased with these pencils.  The quality is excellent, and I love the eyebrow brush connected to the cover.  These pencils are worth every cent

product_name: Baxter Pure Badger Hair Travel Aluminum Shave Brush: Beauty
title: Pretty Good
review_text: The price of this shave brush may seem high, but after shopping around, I found it to be fair. The quality of the brush is great. It is more modern looking than most others on the market without going overboard on the stainless steel. I use this shave brush daily with shave cream from the body shop

product_name: Hard Candy Key To My Heart Lipgloss: Beauty
title: Lip Gloss
review_text: This was purchased as a gift for my son's 14-yr-old girlfriend for Valentine's Day. The heart shape of the container, as well as the nice color of the lip gloss made it a perfect gift for her

product_name: Hard Candy Key To My Heart Lipgloss: Beauty
title: They Loved It!
review_text: Purchased for XMAS stocking stuffer; item was received faster than I expected for the Holidays.  If you know a child that enjoys lip gloss and collects key chains this is ideal

product_name: Hard Candy Key To My Heart Lipgloss: Beauty
title: Diffrent and Cute- Novel idea
review_text: They put the lip gloss in a key chain. Its convenient to have with you on your keys so you can do a touch up anytime or moisturize your lips. Good quality, good product, nice lip gloss. Overall 3.5 stars.

product_name: Hard Candy Key To My Heart Lipgloss: Beauty
title: Cute but small
review_text: It is probably smaller than a one inch cube so it isn't a whole lot of gloss, but is a key chain so it can't be too big. Very cute

product_name: Laura Mercier Caviar Eye Liner: Beauty
title: Superb Product--Perfect for Day or Night!
review_text: At first glance this product may seem too intense to wear during the daytime but let me persuade you otherwise.  By using the suggested brush the unique texture that is a slight dry gel provides eye definition without looking nightclub ready at 9 am.  However, when you're ready to rock 'n roll this product can go on thicker and smudged creates a perfect smoky eye.  Additionally it stays on until removed and does not flake or smudge once dry.  The pot it comes in is quite large and deep so the purchase price actually is not excessive.  Great product from a dependable favorite line.

product_name: Laura Mercier Caviar Eye Liner: Beauty
title: LASTING AND EASY TO APPLY
review_text:
These eye liners have a creamy, soft  texture that results in a satiny matte finish.  The texture makes them easy to apply (no liquid drops on cheeks) for either a classic thin line or a smudged smoky effect.

	Two shades are available - Black and Indigo.  The Black is jet, a true black, and the Indigo merits its name as it is a deep, deep blue that looks stunning on any eye color.

	Best part is that the color lasts all day and into evening without fading or running.  It can be used either wet or dry depending on the effect you want.  And, of course, they both come in Mercier's trim mirrored signature compact.

	Hint: Apply a line just above the upper lash roots to make lashes look fuller and thicker.  Amazing

product_name: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.4 oz: Beauty
title: It's just Lovely!!!!
review_text: I was looking for a summer scent.  This is the perfect summer scent.  It's refreshing, feminine and has a clean scent!  Definitlely, not overpowering for a hot summer day.  I allowed my friend to borrow my bottle for her wedding and she received many compliments during the day..both from her new husband and many of her guests!  This is definitely a great buy for the summer.  As far as it staying on, I beleive it last for quite a while.  Just when I think it's disappeared, someone ask me what I am wearing...you won't regret the purchase

product_name: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.4 oz: Beauty
title: Classic Scent
review_text: This is a classic fragrance, not your overpowering J-Lo, B'Spears, etc.  I wish I could explain the scent...but it is tough to describe.  It isn't fruity or flowery.  Perhaps a bit of lavendar though?  Basically, you don't overpower a room with it.  It has a bit of an "old-world"-ness to it...but as far as I am concerned, that is a wonderful thing.  I am a 31 year old professional, I wear it daily and out at night, and I just love it

product_name: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.4 oz: Beauty
title: Fragrance Opinion is Subjective - I love this scent
review_text:
I recieved this perfume for Christmas from my husband. I love it. I am very picky about scents - I actually didn't have any until I recieved this one. I had given all the others away for being too strong, too flowery, too sweet, etc.

I love this scent. It is subtle and not overwhelming. So, I thought I would write a review to let people know that, while others may not like it, I do

product_name: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.4 oz: Beauty
title: Love It!
review_text: After seeing SJP promote her new fragrance on Oprah, I had to smell it for myself! I got my chance in a magazine, and boy did I love it! I had hoped to get it as a gift, because it seems a bit pricey to me. However, I didn't get it. Still not sure if I want to spend the money on it, but I do love the scent

product_name: Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker Eau de Parfum Spray, 3.4 oz: Beauty
title: AN ULTRA FEMININE SCENT
review_text:
Is there anyone who doesn't know the name Sarah Jessica Parker?  Okay.  Think "Carrie" on TV's enormously successful "Sex and the City."  She was the gal who dressed to the nines - always with style and glamour.  She brings both of those qualities to her first fragrance, "Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker."

	It's a unique, almost indescribable blend of classicism, chic, and innocence.  There's not a scent like it with top notes of fresh Mandarin, Bergamot, Lavender, and Apple Martini. Vibrant and warm it's  a fragrance that caresses the senses.

	Middles notes are Patchouli, tender Paper Whites, and luxe Orchid.  These are enhanced by bottom notes of irresistible white amber, sensuous cedar, and the very sultry musk.  This is a scent I revel in, and  enjoy wearing.

	The bottle is, of course, simple and exquisite, curved with polished glass, ultra feminine.

	Lovely Sarah Jessica Parker is a beautiful, dreamy yet quite alive fragrance appropriate for every occasion

product_name: MenScience Pigmentation Repair Formula (Hydroquinone 2%, Glycolic and Kojic Acid) 2oz.: Beauty
title: The best bang for your buck.
review_text: It is the best product out  for a fraction of the cost of the womens versions from major brands

product_name: MenScience Pigmentation Repair Formula (Hydroquinone 2%, Glycolic and Kojic Acid) 2oz.: Beauty
title: Paul
review_text: I bought this product three weeks ago and I have seen great improvements on my skin already.  I have never really used skin products but I have been living in Florida for over 20 years I have a lot of spots due to sun damage.  A friend of mine told me about this product that his wife bought for him.  So, I decided to give it a try and it has really shown great results! The spots on my skin are diminishing and my face looks better. I have decided to try some of the other Menscience products. My wife also started using the product, so you may have to buy two

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Eyeliner: Beauty
title: Really doesn't smudge, and comes of cleanly
review_text: This eyeliner works as described. I would give it 5-stars except I'm not a big fan of liquid eyeliners that use a brush. It can be too hard to control the applicator, especially if you want to apply under the lower lashes. Since this is a brush on liquid eyeliner, it can't easily be smudged for a smoky look. Of course, the fact that it can't be smudged, once it is dried, is the whole point of this product. It can be cleaned up before it dries, but once it sets, it will stay there until you take it off. When you want to take it off, it comes off very easily, and cleanly, and really doesn't require anything but plain water to remove. I've found that very helpful when I travel. I also have sensitive eyes, but this product has not bothered me at all, probably because it doesn't flake or transfer into my eyes.  If there was just some way to get this product in a "marker" style, and a few more colors, I would be in heaven, even with the high price

product_name: Dream Cream Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: So Good!
review_text:
I live where it's very dry and cold so I would use coco butter to keep from drying out, but it was very very greasy.

I got dream cream as a gift and I am able to use just a little bit and it keeps my skin so soft, the other day someone actually told me how soft it was.

I'm offically hooke

product_name: Dream Cream Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Amazing product
review_text:
I tried this at the LUSH store in Bellevue, I didn't like how it felt at first because it felt greasy to me but I soon realized I had used too much, it doesn't take much.

I got a free sample after purchasing other products there and my skin has been very dry because I am on a diuretic, this is helping my hands a bunch and I was suprised because I had a small cut on my finger that the skin was drying out around and it was catching on my clothes and other things. Within two days of useing the product the dry skin cleared up and the cut healed with almost no mark at all!

I love the mild, clean smell and soft feel

product_name: Dream Cream Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Good for eczema
review_text:
I've a mild case of eczema, so am also always keeping an eye out for products that can help my skin, without resorting to cortizone creams... I've had some success in the past with using straight jojoba and coconut oil on the eczema patches - but not enough to keep up with the hassle of oily spots of skin. I even tried making my own recipes - to some success. But, it was time consuming and I just don't have the time to mess around with kitchen cosmetics for a hobby.
After looking at the reviews for various types of lotions/creams in the Lush line, I decided to give this one a go. I've only been using it for a couple of days, but already my skin is less irritated, and the scaliness seems to be diminishing some. (eczema strikes the top of my feet and a bit of the ankle... makes wearing combat boots a bit annoying when its acting up)
I'll probably need another week or two of steady use to really know if it works as I'm hoping, but so far so good...
There's no real strong scent to the lotion - so it shouldn't bother those who are sensitive to smells. So also pretty cool on that end as well :-)
Works great on the rest of my skin as well!! No more dryness from the winter weather anymore

product_name: Dream Cream Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Very soothing after shaving or waxing
review_text:
I initially bought LUSH's Dream Cream because I recently started to wax my arms and I wanted something to help soothe and minimize any irritated skin.  The wax kit did come with `Soothing Oil' that is suppose to help, but it's too oily to leave on the skin.

I've been a LUSH fan for a while, and the sales person led me to Dream Cream.  It has really soothing ingredients, like oat milk, olive oil, chamomile, and tea tree oil, so I took a sample home.

I just waxed tonight and put Dream Cream on after.  What a HUGE difference.  There was very minimal redness and no irritated bumps.  I usually get these mosquito-like bumps whenever I wax, but I didn't get any.  The next morning, I couldn't even tell I just waxed my arms because my skin was so "normal".

Dream Cream also works great to cut down on red bumps after shaving, and as a soothing lotion for itchy skin.  I will be getting more to use after waxing and shaving.  Definitely worth trying.  It's not LUSH's best selling lotion for no reason

product_name: Dream Cream Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Relief for battered skin
review_text:
I was browsing a Lush Newsletter and read that Dream Cream had been used to alleviate the horribly painful dry skin that accompanies cancer patient's skin during the course of chemotherapy.  Since a family member was undergoing both chemotherapy and radiation therapy, I thought I would buy a tub and see if it did indeed relieve the horrid eczema-like patches of skin covering her body. I figured we had nothing to lose; we had tried everything else and had not found anything that worked yet. Being eternal skeptics, I have to say that we were both pleasantly surprised at how well it worked. It immediately relived the burning and itching that often accompanies dry skin. It took a couple of days of liberally applying the lotion 2-4 times a day for the swelling and redness to diminish, but it did finally disappear. I think if you have standard dry skin, applying it this often might make you feel a bit on the greasy side.  I found that it if you have particularly painful dry skin, it helps to keep the tub of Dream Cream in the refrigerator. The coolness of the lotion further augments the relieving properties of the essential oils in the cream. 
	
I would have to say that a little of this cream does go quite a long way.  If you slather a ton of it on at once, it will leave you feeling a bit sticky. An earlier review mentioned that it can leave you feeling greasy if you put it on your face; however, it should be noted that Dream Cream is meant to be used on the hands and body and not meant to be used as a facial moisturizer. 

I would also have to say that the scent is definitely herbal, but the scent (at least for my tub of Dream Cream) was quite subtle.  I did not find it overwhelming. If you are particularly fond of the strong scents that characterize many of Lush's products, then you might be disappointed in this cream. But, if you have dry, itchy, scaly skin, I would strongly recommend this cream.  It is expensive, but it is definitely worth it.

product_name: philosophy old fashioned lemonade shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: Needs more lemon
review_text: This product is good, but if you are looking for a REAL lemon scent, seach for something else

product_name: philosophy old fashioned lemonade shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: Again, wonderful, wonderful product.....
review_text: Again, Philosophy has added another "needed" product to my extensive Philosophy line.  I absolutely love this scent.  You will come out of the shower or bath smelling clean, refreshing, and crisp.  Not overdone, as you can layer it with a different smelling perfume.  Just delicious

product_name: philosophy old fashioned lemonade shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: lovely & lemony
review_text:
Living in hot and steamy Florida, and looking for something refreshing, I have gone through a range of Philosphy's lemony shower gel combos: first Sweet Sugar (very nice sugar smell, with a hint of lemon) to Frozen Lemon Custard ( didn't like it at all- too much of an artificial vanilla smell, but the first time I didn't like a Philosophy product) and now to Lemonade. I love the smell, like sniffing a real lemon, not a fake lemon scent. Very fresh and clean.  I am following it up with the lemon body souffle and Sweet sugar cologne for a cool, light summery scent. 
As for those who say Philosophy's products cost a lot- they pay a living wage to their employees and put more money on high-quality ingredients for the product, not on packaging and advertising.  Not to get heavy, but I'd rather have a really good quality product than have my dollars going to fancy packaging and an advertising campaign featuring some over-priced cokehead model. 
So, feeling fresh and clean physically and ethically

product_name: philosophy old fashioned lemonade shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: I love philosophy!!!!
review_text:
Philosophy has managed to do it yet again.......  what is unique about this??  Well it is a three in one product it has shampoo, bubble bath and also body wash.  I am not a big one for baths so I admit I did not try that.  I did however use it for the other uses.
