Well the fact is that there are a lot of soap products that you can use in the shower, for washing your hair, and also for a bubble bath.  

It lathers up nicely but not excessively......  so what??


Well the most unique thing about this product is the lemon scent.  I love this.  It is very strong and it also manages to scent up the bathroom when I am taking a shower.  I really like the scent of lemons.  If you dont like it then there are other products.  They have this in apple, coconut and some other scent........maybe strawberry??  I personally like the lemon scent the most.  
I have tried other philosophy products and honestly they do not have a bad one.  They do not advertise this but if this stuff does get in your eyes, it stings very little.  

The only drawback is the fact that it is quite frankly expensive........ about a dollar an ounce. There are other products....and I guess you still need a conditioner for your hair

product_name: The Body Shop Satsuma Shimmer Lip Balm: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text: I received this lip gloss a few years ago in a Christmas present, and then I couldn't find it and forgot about it. But a friend of mine had this and was using this same lip gloss a couple of weeks ago and I remembered how great it was. This is one of the best lip glosses/balms I've ever used. The flavor is fantastic and the moisture it gives your lips is unbeatable. It's not sticky, it's not even really noticeable. It's very "natural beauty" if you know what I mean.  :

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion Oil-Free Formula: Beauty
title: Best lotion ever!
review_text:
This is probably the most expensive lotion I have ever bought for myself. Felt bad at first for the price but then my skin was saved! Never have I felt so happy the past winter when there is no crack, irritation on my skin. The lotion smoothes and make my face feel great. Better than ever!

The pump won't do any difference and it is more expensive, just to let you know. I have both the lotion and the gel but prefer the lotion.

It does work really well in the set of 3 but it's ok to get only the lotion. I guarantee that you won't regret

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion Oil-Free Formula: Beauty
title: Fight Back Against Oily Skin
review_text: A lifesaver for oily skin, this lotion goes on smooth and fights back against those oil-producing glands that force you to wash your face several times per day

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion Oil-Free Formula: Beauty
title: Lifesaver for oily skin
review_text:
I have extremely oily skin.  It wasn't unusual for me to wash my face three to four times a day to keep it from shining.  As a result of the oily skin and humid temps (I live in S. Georgia), makeup would just slide down my face and I'd end up feeling like I stuck my head in Crisco by the end of the day.  A friend suggested Clinique and though the oil isn't completely gone...which wouldn't be desireable anyways...it is finally manageable.

I got the DDM lotion as part of the three step program Clinique offers, but I think that the lotion is solely responsible for the changes in my skin.  I could leave or take the toner and soap, which don't seem to be any different than less expensive versions readily available at drugstores.  The lotion though...Wow!  It doesn't go on greasy or watery.  Instead, it has a nice and light consistency that is easy to smooth over your skin but is thick enough that it's not hard to contain or control with your fingertips.  As soon as you rub it in, you notice the mattifying properties.  The lotion actually helps to reduce shine by itself, but without any tightness or by depriving your skin of its moisture.  Some of the stuff I've tried in the past only dried my skin out temporarily and then the oil glands would really start to kick in with a vengence, but with this lotion I haven't had any of those problems.  My skin is now smoother than it's ever been, and the oil glands are apparently appeased as well because I haven't had to wash my face in the middle of the afternoons anymore.

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion Oil-Free Formula: Beauty
title: great moisturizer for day wear
review_text: This is a great moisturizer. It does not leave your skin feeling like it has an oil slick and also does not make it feel dry after it absorbs into it. It is great under makeup as it does not make your makeup slide off your face. I have been using it for years. Best moisturizer I ever tried.  It isn't great for night time wear, as I like something a little heavier at night/ I am in my forties and night time I need something a little heavier to moisturize my face. If you are twenty something you probably could just use the Clinique product

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion Oil-Free Formula: Beauty
title: Perfect Lotion
review_text: Goes on smooth, absorbs quickly, doesn't feel dry 30 minutes later.  This is an expensive necessity in my book.  Nothing works this good.

product_name: The Body Shop Mango Body Butter: Beauty
title: My favorite product for very dry skin
review_text: This product really does apply like butter and is very rich in moisturizers. I have been using it for years and giving it as Christmas gifts. I use it as a very rich treatment for dry legs, heels, elbows. I love the fresh mango fragrance. Before bed, I often cover my feet with Mango Body Butter, slip on socks, and let the good stuff soak in overnight. Then I feel very pampered and I wake up with soft feet

product_name: Savon de Marseille (Marseille Soap) pure olive oil soap from the South of France.: Beauty
title: Great soap and excellent vendor.
review_text: I am very please with this soap. It is a wonderfully mild soap that is non-itchy!  Vendor shipping and service is excellent.  Very quick shipping.  Will purchase from again.  Thank you

product_name: Savon de Marseille (Marseille Soap) pure olive oil soap from the South of France.: Beauty
title: I am so glad to find this soap online!
review_text: I found this soap in a honey shop in Paris in winter 2006 and after the first use I told my friends about it and afterwards they bought the same soap and continue to buy it today.  It smells like olive oil, but it doesn't smell strongly.  I recommend people using this soap lather and rinse twice in a row for best results, it will make your skin soft and smooth and the natural ingredients make the results long lasting, I use it once every three or four days but it's gentle enough to use every day.  I wish I had bought more while in Paris because it is impossible to find in California

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Moisturizing Conditioner with Shea Butter: Beauty
title: WHAT A DIFFERENCE FEKKAI MAKES
review_text:
It seems no one can escape.  There are times when even the best tressed need help with their hair.  Sun, sand, and surf may leave you with many happy memories, but it can also leave hair looking like...well, let's not talk about it.

	Perms, coloring, all intended to make us look better - let's face it, can sometimes leave hair dry and lusterless.

	Time to get serious with Shea butter.  Frederic Fekkai's Moisturizing Conditioner with Shea Butter is a rich, creamy healing potion for less than healthy locks.  It truly hydrates, smells delicious, and nourishes damaged hair.  If your hair is thick, it's also a marvelous detangler.

	Only a small amount is needed - simply apply after shampooing and comb through.  What a difference Fekkai makes

product_name: CARGO PlantLove(TM) Botanical Lipstick: Beauty
title: This is an excellent sheer lipstick!
review_text: I love that it is not only environmentally friendly, but it is also an incredible moisturizing lipstick. It's very sheer color but you can use a lip liner for a little more pizazz. And we grew the wildflower seeds from the box! Fun and well worth the money. I have 3 shades, Nahinni, Sagarmartha, & Mariska. I prefer the more neutral Mariska

product_name: CARGO PlantLove(TM) Botanical Lipstick: Beauty
title: Amazing Lipstick
review_text:
WOW ...
Now This is an amazing lipstick..
I only bought the color "Mariska", but I am planning to get more of these..

beside the fact that the color looks amazing in my medium tone skin, 
The lipstick also stay for a very long time, without any feeling of dryness

product_name: philosophy amazing grace perfumed salt scrub: Beauty
title: Great Exfoliator
review_text:
I am a believer now.  

I bought this because I saw a demonstration on QVC.  I really needed a great scrub since I use a spray tan and a great exfloliator helps.  

I'm not sure what amazing grace really smells like, but I liked this smell.  Its not over-powering and not over-perfumed.  Its got a nice clean smell.  I have a bottle of the expensive Peter Thomas Roth scrub but find that the philosophy brand actually holds together and you can feel the scrub.  There is no dripping.  This is truly a great rough exfoliator.  As for the warming sensation, I didnt feel it.  

Buy it at sephora where you can return it if you're not satisfied.

product_name: philosophy amazing grace perfumed salt scrub: Beauty
title: Out of this world!
review_text: This scrub is probably THE best scrub that i have ever used.  It smells very feminine (without being too strong) and it made my skin incredibly soft, even in the coldest winter months last year.

product_name: philosophy amazing grace perfumed salt scrub: Beauty
title: A classic scented scrub for the shower!
review_text: A friend of mine purchased the entire Amazing Grace line for my birthday and I love it!  It's a fresh clean and girly scent.  And the warming salt scrub makes my skin soooooooooooo soft.  It can be a little messy, but silky smooth skin and glowing skin is worth it

product_name: Hybrid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Good...but noxious and drying
review_text: This stuff has the biggest "ying and yang" affect that I have ever witnessed with any Lush products so far...the good part about this is that is has eliminated my need to use a cream conditioner along with my shampoo bars that I usually buy from Lush and the smell really lingers in your hair for days...plus my hair seems shinier than usual...the bad is that, after a few days of use, the ends of my hair started to feel very dry and dehydrated and are splitting and also the smell...after you use the product and the day passes by the smell softens to a smell that's quite nice but when you first use it you get almost knocked over by a very overpowering smell of black licorice!!  I haven't decided if I will continue to use this product..I like the fact that the smell evens out and (eventually) makes my hair smell great but If I do still use it then I will most defintely go back to my cream conditioner

product_name: Hybrid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: A definate buy!
review_text: I was alittle hesitant at first...as this was my first LUSH experience, but was soon well rewarded. I have thick, curly, long color treated hair. So to say its damaged is an understatement. Hybrid worked major tho. I doesnt lather like your normal shampoo does, so I was concerned if it was really working. It does...have no fear. I have to use quiet a few swips tho, because of how much hair I have - but still - ive had this bar a month now, and can barely see where its been used. I store mine a traveling soap case and always let dry before closing and dont store in the shower. I still did need a condition afterwards, but not as much as normally. When dry...my hair just feels healthier and less frizzy, but not caked down.

product_name: Nioxin System 5 Cleanser: Beauty
title: soft, healthy, shiny hair
review_text:
I have had a problem with thinning hair for a while, and wasnt sure what to do about it. I heard from a couple of people that this line was quite good so I thought I would give it a try. I didn't get it from Amazon but a salon in my town. I actually wanted the shampoo for fine thinning hair (system one I think), and they didn't have any left. They told me that all of the Nioxin products were for thinning hair, and to try this one first.  

I have only been using it for a couple of weeks so I can't say for sure that it's regrowing any hair, but my hair looks thicker and it feels alot softer and a lot less greasy, more bouncy. I have noticed that my hair is not falling out and breaking as much also.  I really like the products and I am going to continue using them.

product_name: Stella McCartney Stella Eau de Parfum Roll-On: Beauty
title: Stella Rocks!
review_text: Stella McCartney's "Stella" Parfum spray was an absolute hit with my wife. She loves it. What a wonderful fragrance!!! You can't go wrong with this one fellas!!!!

product_name: Stella McCartney Stella Eau de Parfum Roll-On: Beauty
title: JUMJUM
review_text: I love this smell! something you can wear all the time everywhere, it's not too much. I have it myself and just ordered one for my sister in law's birthday, hope she likes it

product_name: Stella McCartney Stella Eau de Parfum Roll-On: Beauty
title: Addictive!
review_text:
Before Stella came along, I was a Marc Jacobs girl.  I found Stella this month while reading magazines...normally, I hate perfume inserts as they give me a headache, but everytime I would open my magazine, I would wonder, what is that smell?  

I usually do not like rose-based scents, although I do like florals.  I bought a sample size of Stella and tested it on my husband.  I really think there's something in it that makes him crazy....he loves it, and he's not a big fan of perfume!  And I can't stop smelling my wrists....it's feminine without being girly, and "dark" without being musky.  I think it's a perfect scent for a professional woman

product_name: Stella McCartney Stella Eau de Parfum Roll-On: Beauty
title: Beauty in a bottle
review_text: This perfume is sooo amazing, it's a feminine and sensual, beautiful scent. Every woman should at least try it once, it is perfect

product_name: Philosophy Shear Splendor Extra Silky Daily Conditioner: Beauty
title: good detangler
review_text: This product detangles my long hair immediately after I put it on. I love this product and ALL philosophy products

product_name: Ne Worry Pas Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Relaxation in a Bath Bomb
review_text: Relax your skin and your entire being with this amazing bath bomb.  It moisturizes for up to 24 hours, and you'll love the delicate scent

product_name: Ne Worry Pas Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Send your worries down the drain...
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Ne Worry Pas is a clever little item with skin calming and moisturizing elements to make you feel good for at least 24 hours. Soya Milk, Bergamot oil, Jasmine and Cedarwood are lovely, but you may also want to add a few drops of lavender (Forces of Nature Organic French Lavender is a favorite) and Egyptian musk (an artificial one you can buy from Caswell-Massey). I also added a little bag of oatmeal, rosemary and two rooibos tea bags. I think I like this as much as Tisty Tosty or Dream On. This bath will make you silky soft all over and leave you delicately scented with delicious essential oils. Your skin will radiate the fragrance for about 24 hours. Alkmaar body soap seems perfect with this experience. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Ne Worry Pas Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Long lasting scent!
review_text: This bath bomb had the longest lasting scent of any Lush product I have used. In fact, I used it this morning and this evening when I got home, my bathroom still carried the scent. I can even smell it on my skin hours later! It also made a lovely, creamy white bath that was utterly calming and relaxing. I think I stayed in for an hour without the scent, look or feel of the bath changing at all (Except for the fact that my water got cold. Wouldn't it be great if Lush could make a product that would be make the warm water last as long as their scents?

product_name: Philosophy Amazing Grace Firming Body Emulsion 16oz: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text: This lotion is wonderful!  It smells incredible and it really DOES replenish my skin with moisture and an amazing scent!  I get compliments on this stuff all the time!  The scent is clean and fresh!  It does NOT over power!

product_name: Savon de Marseille Palm Oil Soaps: Beauty
title: savon de Marseille
review_text: This is an excellent product to do hand laundry or rub some in on shirt collars or stains before putting the laundry in the washer. I have used it for many years and wouldn want to do without i

product_name: Philosophy Raspberry Sorbet: Beauty
title: Terrific Three in One Product
review_text: Not only does this gel smell terrific, like real raspberry sorbet, it is functional as well.  This lathers up nice and you don't have to use a lot of product.  You use it as a body wash, a shampoo and a conditioner and I suppose for a bubble bath too.  So that makes it four in one.  I take this on trips because its easy to grab and put in my overnight bag and I can take less product with me. I also will use this when I'm running late and have to take a quick shower.  This also comes in many other yummy scents.  Try them and you will not be disappointed.

product_name: philosophy pure grace perfumed shower cream: Beauty
title: I'll Never Wash With Anything Else Again
review_text:
My title says it all. This smells so amazing, and is such a lush and fabulous lather, that I will never wash with any other soap again. I even bought the perfume because I found myself sniffing my arms all day long after a shower. 

It's fantastic, it's totally worth the money, and it lasts a long time. One bottle lasts me 2-3 months, bathing every day. I've even used this in my hair before... but it tends to dry out my hair a lot and I need a lot of moisture because I have blonded curly hair.

product_name: philosophy pure grace perfumed shower cream: Beauty
title: Great Stuff
review_text: Of all the Philosophy line, I find that this is the best consistency-wise.  It's much thicker than the Amazing or Baby Grace gels, and leaves your hair and skin much softer, and smelling like Ivory soap.  Very clean scented, not too girly.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Shower Cap: Beauty
title: hot little hat
reviewer_location: Fond du Lac, WI United States
review_text:
This is a great cap and a great fit. I have a lot of hair and it fits with room to spare in the cap!
Nice quality

product_name: Blackberry Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: My favorite all time product from Lush!!!
review_text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE the Blackberry Bath Bomb!!!!!  It turned my bath water a very pretty purple color and the smell was WONDERFUL!  I can't really describe it.  It didn't smell fruity to me at all but was very relaxing and soothing.  Once I got out of the tub the smell stayed on my skin for several hours.  When I was putting my daughter to bed she snuggled her head in my arm and just kept smelling.  We both laid there smelling my arms :)

product_name: Blackberry Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Creates a very relaxing bath. . .
review_text:
This bath bomb was a little deceptive.  It fizzed fast and made the water a beautiful color.  It smelled great.  Then I thought, OK this will be enjoyable for about three minutes until I get used to the smell and the novelty of bathing in purple water wears off. 

Boy, was I wrong.  After a few minutes I started to feel sooooo much more relaxed.  I had already been bathing in plain, hot water for awhile, so it wasn't just the effects of a hot bath.  This little ballistic has something.  And my skin smelled great until I took a shower the next morning.

product_name: Blackberry Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Relaxing, purple, fruity bath
review_text:
This is my favourite Lush bath bomb! It does everything you want a bath bomb to do - it smells great, a fruity (but not blackberry) scent, it turns the bathwater into a cool purple colour, and it fizzes lots! Also it's very relaxing which we can all do with these days. And in the end of the fizzing - you get a small surprise... Don't read this next bit if you want to find out for yourself. It's a little piece of paper that says "BOMB!"

I prefer the bubble bars because I like bubble baths and also they are more economical as you can break them up and use them for more than one bath, but sometimes throwing a whole bomb in is a treat in itself.

For a really indulgent experience, try 1/3 of a Creamy Candy bubble slice with the Blackberry bomb - it makes purple bubbles and smells so yummy. But only for those who like strong scented baths I think..

product_name: Blackberry Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Not quite blackberry, but just as nice
review_text:
This bath bomb does not really smell like blackberry; nonetheless, it has a sweet, fruity smell that I cannot quite place my finger on. It smells a bit like grape Kool-Aid, but not as sweet or syrupy. The smell is not as strong as some of Lush's other bath bombs, but it is quite pleasant.

The bomb turns the bath water a wonderfully relaxing purple color. As with  most bath bombs from Lush, it will leave a ring around the tub. In order to remedy this, I usually wipe the tub down with my washcloth after I am done with my bath. Granted, this is not the way that one wants to cap off a relaxing bath, but it will save the agony of having to scrub the tub the following morning. 

The bomb turns the water quite soft and will leave your skin feeling delightfully supple. I was quite pleased with this aspect of the bomb. The scent it leaves on your skin is subtle and lasted for a couple of days.  This is definitely one of Lush's more simple bath bombs, but it is definitely not boring. The small surprise that accompanies the bomb somewhat compensates for the lack of glitter and more powerful floral/fruit scent. 

Not one of the more memorable bombs, but really quite pleasing. If you want to take a break from some of Lush's more overpowering products, this bomb is for you.

product_name: Blackberry Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: worth the wait
review_text: this item was out of stock for months...when I was finally able to order it I understood why...it is amazing...the scent is awsome...the water turns a wonderful purple color...I have already placed my reorder..

product_name: Blackberry Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Lovely
review_text: Blackkberry bath bomb is a treat for the senses. The fragrant oils in it soften your skin and smell rich and sensual. My house smelled great for a few days from towels and pajamas left scented after the bath. The water turns a purpley tea color. It is just lovely. Go for it!

product_name: Estee Lauder Idealist Skin Refinisher 50ml/1.7oz: Beauty
title: Skin like silk!
review_text: I am in my 40s and have used Idealist since it was introduced.  It is the only moisturizer I've ever LOVED.  It truly makes my skin like silk.  It feels light going on, I can use it daytime or night, it never irritates or contributes to a breakout.  I use about 1.5 bottles a year, and while I'm generally thrifty with cosmetics and skin care, nothing cheap (or expensive) surpasses Idealist.

product_name: Estee Lauder Idealist Skin Refinisher 50ml/1.7oz: Beauty
title: Idealist Works
reviewer: M. Sewell "I work for Estee Lauder so I should know!"
review_text: I'm 19 and I work for Estee Lauder as a Beauty Advisor and this stuff does work.  I'm lucky enough to receive it free of charge but if I would spend my money on it. Its worth it.  I use it w/ my Proactive and its making my skin beautiful.  They actually have a larger size which is a 2.5 oz which retails for 90 bucks.  I would recommened that one

product_name: Estee Lauder Idealist Skin Refinisher 50ml/1.7oz: Beauty
title: I just wish it wasn't so expensive!
review_text: I received about 100 tiny bottles of this from a neighbor...thought it was worth a shot. I'm 27 and have had problems with breakouts since I was a young teenager. Idealist made my skin baby soft, reduced the number of breakouts much better than Clearasil or any other anti-acne treatment did, and also evened out my complexion...I has less blotchiness. I absolutely love this stuff! But alas, I used up all the little bottles and I just can't seem to get myself to pay $40 or more for it...even as much as it worked. I just wish it wasn't that expensive

product_name: Clinique Long Last Soft Matte Lipstick: Beauty
title: Hard to find discontinued product!
review_text: I was thrilled to find my favorite lipstick here since it is discontinued everywhere else. The quality and pricing were perfect!

product_name: The Body Shop Vitamin E Moisture Cream: Beauty
title: The Body Shop Vitamin E Moisture Cream
review_text: Can be used as a night cream or a moisturizer under makeup.

product_name: Aquis Adventure Microfiber Towels - Small 10x14: Beauty
title: Nice little towels
review_text: Love these towels! They are wonderfully soft and absorbent, but this size is pretty little. So, before you buy, measure out 10" by 14" to make sure this is the size you want

product_name: philosophy empowermint flavored lip shine: Beauty
title: Want Minty Lips?
review_text: This lip shine is fantastic if you want both shine and a slightly minty scent and taste on your lips! It's not sticky at all and also can be layered over lipstick for added gloss. This one's a keeper

product_name: Rock Star Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Candy-scented lather
review_text:
Rock Star is a creamy pink soap that produces and abundance of lather.  I've found it to be less drying than many other soaps, and less drying than certain of Lush's other soaps (the glycerin ones, like Bohemian and Sea Vegetable.)  While the creaminess is certainly an asset, it also means that the soap melts away quickly, as another reviewer mentioned.  As this is a somewhat expensive soap, more than $7 for about 3 oz., this is definitely something to consider before purchasing.  A bar of this soap lasts me about a week, showering every day.  Admittedly I'm a fairly enthusiastic user, and it's likely possible to use a bit less, but I'm not sure that would make a huge difference.  And this brings us to scent.  If you like sweet, candy-like scents, Rock Star is amazing.  It's very sweet, very pink, and very girly.  Overall, this has a lovely candy scent (the same as Lush's Creamy Candy bubble bar).  It's a bit of a hard scent to explain, but very much sweet and candy-like.  

Overall, this is a lovely, luxurious soap.  It is also an expensive soap.  These are the main benefits/drawbacks.  I gave it 5 stars because I love the scent and texture

product_name: Rock Star Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Rock Star Soap Rocks
review_text:
Loves it. I love Lush soap products. The Rock Star soap is fragrant and that is what makes this product unique and fun.

Delivery of this item was quick. I hope to order from them again in the future

product_name: Le Papier d'Armenie-Set of 3 Booklets: Beauty
title: Different!
review_text: A very unusual room deoderiser after cooking. animals or le lavatoir! No chemicals and the terra cotta holder is a must.Buying more and it makes a great gift

product_name: Insolence by Guerlain Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 oz: Beauty
title: adorable
review_text: very sweet and sensual.  I love the bottle, and so does my little daughter :)

product_name: Insolence by Guerlain Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 oz: Beauty
title: Insolence Perfume
review_text:
This perfume smells so good.  It is not too overbearing but it does not wear off easily either.
It is sort of sweet and light.  I got the sample from Macy's and i finished it ASAP and now I need the bottle! 

I love it

product_name: Sephora Roll-Up Blotting Papers: Beauty
title: One of the best
review_text: This is one of the best blotting papers. It does not interfere with my make-up because it has no powder at all and it absorbs oil from skin very well. This paper is rolled-up, so you can cut a piece of paper of the length you desire. I widely recommend this product. Thank you

product_name: Sephora Roll-Up Blotting Papers: Beauty
title: toilet seat covers on a roll!
review_text: Ok, if you weren't already aware, blotting papers are merely the same material you use to separate your bum and the public toilet. However, I am not inclined to stuff a few seat covers in my purse. Sephora has put their blotting papers on a mini roller in an attractive light blue container. This is better than other packaging options, where the too small papers are offered in kleenix-box style. Sephora's rolling sheet option allows you to take as much as you need, and offers an efficient cutting edge for easy tearing. Now that's what I'm talking about

product_name: Sephora Piiink My Mobiiile Gloss: Beauty
title: Tiny but cute
review_text: The lip gloss was tiny but it was a gift for my Kindergarten aged niece, who loved it. She clipped it on her backpack and felt very grown up. The disco ball is cute, I don't know what the purpose of the other part is though

product_name: Tea and Sympathy Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: When you need a calm night!
review_text: I loved this bath bomb but it doesn't have a lot of "pow" so if that's what you are looking for, go elsewhere with this one.  In the middle is a hidden surprise which I did like - a tea bag.  I didn't think the scent was all that strong and the water wasn't exceptionally softer but it was an OK experience.  I don't know that I'd get it again though

product_name: Tea and Sympathy Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Skin Calming with Antioxidants
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
So when your best friend calls and tells you she is off to Europe and can't stay and chat because she will miss her plane...what is a person to do? Well, hop into the bath with a little "Tea & Sympathy" and call your new best friend. Tea and Sympathy is filled with soya milk, Calamine Powder, Clary Sage (lots and lots - so if you don't like this essential oil - it is very strong), Gardenia Oil, perfumes, Olibanum Oil, Chamomile and a Chamomile tea bag. Something about this particular product soothes the soul and all your problems go down the drain with the water. 

Of course, if you are feeling very wicked, you could always send this to a friend with the note: "Oh, darling, I'm off to Paris, sorry I didn't have time to call." Thankfully LUSH has a solution to every problem and if you like this product, you may also want to try Ne Worry Pas with sweet orange and tangerine. 

Some of my favorite finds include: "Butterball" with Ylang Ylang and Vanilla, "The Happy Pill" with delicious citrus oils and Bergamot, "Youki Hi" with exotic Jasmine and "Golden Slumbers" for a lovely sweet sleep. Looking for something romantic? Try "Romance in a Stone" with a love poem/note or "Tisty Tosty" which is like a love spell so powerful that your true love may even call you when you are in the tub. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: WHITE LINEN For Women By ESTEE LAUDER eau de parfum: Beauty: Estee Lauder
title: This may just very well be the most amazing smell ever made
review_text: Polite smell, with a hint, slight hint of sexiness only to be detected by someone who actually looks for it :) (not obvious).  Love this for travelling to warmer climates, great on the airplane.  For some reason I don't do well wearing this outside of travelling.  Like any perfume, the time of day it is, as well as the place on earth you are has a lot to do with it.  LOVE this... however it's not to be brandished for all occasions

product_name: WHITE LINEN For Women By ESTEE LAUDER eau de parfum: Beauty: Estee Lauder
title: Best fragrance ever made!
review_text: White Linen is a lovely, soft, exquisitely feminine fragrance. It's floral notes tone down to true soft lingering beauty. This is one of my favorite Lauder fragrances and one I really recommend. 5 stars Estee!!

product_name: WHITE LINEN For Women By ESTEE LAUDER eau de parfum: Beauty: Estee Lauder
title: Classic and Light
review_text:
White Linen is a classic fragrance for daytime use. It's fresh, crisp scent is perfect in summer, when heavier scents can "turn"
This was my first "young ladies" scent, and remains one of my favorites.

The other White Linen items: powder, body lotions and soaps are wonderful for layering this perfume. Because it is so light, you can't overdo it.

 With its crisp white and blue packaging, it makes a lovely gift for anyone

product_name: WHITE LINEN For Women By ESTEE LAUDER eau de parfum: Beauty: Estee Lauder
title: Subtle but special...
review_text:
Why would anybody review a perfume?. In my case, this is the first time I have done that, and the reason to do so is to recommend it. "White linen" is simply wonderful. Am I exaggerating?. I don't think so...

Truth to be told, I didn't buy it for myself: it was a gift. Notwithstanding that, I have gone on buying it ever since that lucky day in which I discovered it. Why?. Well, because I like it, and due to the fact that it goes well with my personality. I know, that seems a strange explanation, but it is the truth. 

This perfume isn't new, in fact EstÃ©e Lauder created it in 1978, coincidently the year in which I was born. All the same, who needs a new perfume, specially when there is a old one that works so well?. This one includes, among other fragances, citrus, peach, jasmine, lilac, rose and amber. The result is unique, and very pleasant.

On the whole, I can say I recommend "White linen" for those who can appreciate a subtle but special perfume. If you want more words to describe it, I suppose I will have to look them up in my dictionary. But I guess the best course of action would be trying a sample of "White linen": then you will have no doubts of what I am talking about  :)

Belen Alca

product_name: Romance by Ralph Lauren for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: a winner
review_text: This is one of my favorite perumes. VERY romantic..just as the name implies. A scent a woman would wear for a sexy night out with her man..or to wear when getting married!! Reminds me of soft pink roses....but not overwhemlingmy "rose-y".... which is good.

product_name: Dior DiorSkin Sculpt Lifting Smoothing Concealer: Beauty
title: It Lifts!  It Smooths!
review_text:
This product really does what it says - it lifts and smooths, and conceals too.  It's the best concealer I've tried, and I've tried many.  One note though - the lightest shade is very light.  I have very fair skin and found it to be too white, so I exchanged it for the 2nd shade, which would also work well on fair to medium skin.

Great product

product_name: Think Pink Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: So Cute
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
There I was waiting shaving my legs and the water in the tub was draining away when suddenly I looked down and noticed all these little glittery confetti hearts. So cute! That was a nice surprise and I didn't see them while I was taking a bath. I did see the little candy flowers floating about. 

This bath has a high "cuteness" factor and if you are in one of those "everything has to be pink" moods, then Think Pink may suit your candy mood. Lavender oil, Tonka absolute, vanilla and neroli oil makes this a calming bath that leaves you a little happier. You may enjoy this bath even more with the calming sweet "Honey I Washed the Kids Sweet Honey Soap" or the "Sultana of Soap" bar which is sumptuously smooth and leaves a fragrance on your skin that lasts all night. 

If you want a pink/vanilla soap, then you may want "Rock Star." If you are into mixing and matching according to scents, then the Trichomania is mildly scented with coconut and looks like a vanilla shampoo bar and it goes well with the vanilla scented American Cream conditioner. 

I vote for a tad more vanilla, although you can toss a little vanilla oil in the bath or some vanilla from the kitchen also works well. Eating sugar cookies in the tub is optional. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Think Pink Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Mmmmmm, pink!
review_text: It turned the water a pretty pale pink, and I loved the heart confetti. Could have been more of it, though, and the scent could have been stronger. Still, I stayed in that bath for a long looooong time! :

product_name: Think Pink Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Pretty in Pink
review_text:
Ohh, what a lovely product for the time most of us love; bath time.
This marvel melts into a soft pink Tonka Vanilla Bean scented bath that smells like a cake and makes you hungry for sweets!

This lovely product contains Pefume, Lavender Oil , Tonka Absolute, Vanilla Absolute, Neroli Oil , Pink Heart Confetti & Candy Flowers!

At the end you have to flowers gliding through your bath water, small but adorable memory that lingers long after the pink bon bon has dissolved

product_name: Think Pink Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: MMM Pink Candy Goodness
review_text: This bomb has the lovely smell of a just opened bag of Valentine's conversation hearts.  It's a sort of vanilla that isn't overwhelming (actually it's Tonka).  The tiny paper heart confetti that fills your pink bath water just brings smiles to the face!  I didn't give it 5 stars due to the scent fizzling out once my bath ballistic was in the water

product_name: Sephora Indulgences Body Wash: Beauty
title: one of My boys bought this and....
reviewer: Goddess Electra "submissive's visit My amazon wish list like good little boys...  http://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/EI7F946F5PJ7"
review_text: This soap is great, exspecially for morning showers when you want to get a little pick me up!!! it does smell exactly like coffee and cream

product_name: NeoStrata Facial Cleanser - PHA 4 6 oz: Beauty
title: Neostrata facial cleanser 4% Pha
review_text:
I have tried just about every over the counter face wash available. I found flaw with each one as they either dried my face out too much,or irratated my face,or just didnt clean my face enough.
This cleanser is the perfect answer! It is fragrant free,and doesnt dry out your face.The PHA gently exfoilates dead skin cells with no scrubbing and leaves face smooth and fresh.
It is an absolute must for those of us with oily and acne prone skin.My dermatologist reccomended it to me a year ago,and I will never go back to anything else again

product_name: NeoStrata Facial Cleanser - PHA 4 6 oz: Beauty
title: As advertized, as promised - and at a savings!
review_text: As advertized, as promised - and at a savings

product_name: BABY PHAT GODDESS For Women By KIMORA LEE SIMMONS eau de parfum: Beauty: Kimora Lee Simmons
title: Love it!
review_text: This Goddess perfume has a clean,fresh scent,but wears off quite easily.Although it smells good,being Baby Phat,it is kinda pricey.But I adore Baby Phat and I'd say it's a nice choice.I'm so glad I got it for Christmas

product_name: BABY PHAT GODDESS For Women By KIMORA LEE SIMMONS eau de parfum: Beauty: Kimora Lee Simmons
title: Love it...Almost
review_text: A little heavy on the hyacinth, byt thats my own opinion. Everyone else seems to love it when I have it on.

product_name: BABY PHAT GODDESS For Women By KIMORA LEE SIMMONS eau de parfum: Beauty: Kimora Lee Simmons
title: best gift ever
review_text: The shipping was so fast, the condition stated as new and it was beautiful.My daughter loves i

product_name: BABY PHAT GODDESS For Women By KIMORA LEE SIMMONS eau de parfum: Beauty: Kimora Lee Simmons
title: MMMMMM!
review_text: I like the clean fresh scent.   It's not too heavy and not overpowering.   And it comes in a cute pink bottle

product_name: Bourjois Automatic Eyeliner Pencil: Beauty
title: Doesn't smudge!
review_text: This is a great great eyeliner! I have been on a quest to find an eyeliner that can last a whole day without smuding or clumping in the corners of my eyes and I have found it! It's not too pricey, either. If they ever discontinue this product, i'll be a very sad camper.....it's GREAT

product_name: H2O Plus Raspberry Guava Shower & Bath Gel: Beauty
title: Yummy Body Gel
review_text: This is a very concentrated, rich body gel.  You only need a little to get a lot of lather.  The smell is of raspberry as in the name of the product. You feel clean and fresh after you use this shower gel. It leaves no film on your skin.  It also leaves a light scent of the gel.  I've made the mistake of using too much and had to really wash it off.  This is a fantastic body wash and I highly recommend it.  Also try it out in the different scents, they are all heavenly

product_name: Chanel Cristalle Gloss Waterlight Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: The perfect lip gloss
review_text: I absolutely love this lip gloss in sorbet.  It gives a nice shine with a hint of red and the subtle color goes with everything.  I wear it all the time and keep it in my purse.  (Please note that this lip gloss is not very long-wearing and needs to be reapplied during the day.

product_name: Philosophy Acne Kit Kit: Beauty
title: I love this stuff, but . . .
review_text:
I have had acne since age 12, and though it's never been severe, I hate it. I've tried lots of over the counter products of various prices, and this is the first stuff I've used that works. However, (and this is a huge however) like most companies Philosophy assumes that acne prone skin is always oily skin. This is not so. My skin is very dry and sensitive, even in the areas where I am most likely to break out. I did notice when I bought the kit that it was likely to strip the oil from my skin, but I assumed that moisturizing would help with that. Not so. The acne cleared up nicely, but now I have a sizable (to me anyway) flaking patch next to one of my eyebrows.
I was using an aveno moisturizer after the h202 cream, and the blemish syrum only once a day (and that sparingly) but I am now going to try the Philosophy Hope in a Jar for Sensitive Skin and put it on after everything. Hopefully (no pun intended) this will help

product_name: Philosophy Acne Kit Kit: Beauty
title: Best I've found so far
review_text:
I never had a problem with acne until my late 20s, when suddenly my skin seemed to turn on me. I found myself with bumps on my cheeks (where my skin was dry), around my nostrils (where my skin was super red and inflammed and raw looking), my nose (oily and prone to blackheads), and my forehead (also oily). I tried several high-end drugstore brands and none of them seemed to work. For months it was this way no matter what I did. I tried Proactiv, which dried my skin out horribly, and stung while I applied the products - I even used those products only every other day and my skin still peeled! I was all set to go to a dermatologist when I decided to give the Philosophy line a chance after hearing so many good things about it from family and friends. 

I've been using it religiously for two weeks, and while I can't say my skin is flawless, it's considerably improved. The bumps have gone down in every area, my nostrils are no longer red and unsightly, no more blackheads, and best of all it feels great while applying and after. Each product also has very little scent to it which I liked as well - no antiseptic smell here! I did find that the moisturizer wasn't quite enough for me so I started using Philosophy's Hope in a Jar for sensitive skin on my cheeks and neck. That and the fact that it cleared up my acne mostly but not completely are my reasons for giving it four stars rather than five.

Overall, I've very satisfied with the product and intend to continue using it for quite some time.

product_name: Philosophy Acne Kit Kit: Beauty
title: Off to a good start
review_text:
I bought this kit with low expectations.  Being in my 30's and having dealt with moderate acne problems since my early teens, I've literally tried everything.  

I've been using this kit for over a week, and I have definitely seen progress.  All of my existing blemishes cleared up much faster than usual, and I haven't seen any significant new breakouts.  

The only downfall is that this is a 4 step program which is a tad time consuming and tedious, but at this point I'm willing to do it if the results continue at this rate.  I also note that I need to put a top layer of moisturiser on my face as the protection creme doesn't do the trick to keep my skin from drying out in certain areas.  Which makes it actually a 5 step process.  

I've had short term success with other products in the past, so I'm only giving 4 stars for the good start. I am reserving judgement on the last star pending long-term results.  If the system continues to work for me I'll re-review

product_name: CHI Silk Infusion Silk Recontructing Complex: Beauty
title: Touchably Soft Hair!
review_text: My hair looks great after I straighten it.  But once I put a little bit of Chi Silk Infusion in it, it's amazingly soft and silky!  I can't stop touching it for hours afterwards.  And it smells great too.  You have to try it

product_name: CHI Silk Infusion Silk Recontructing Complex: Beauty
title: WOW!
review_text: I'm addicted! My hair is naturally curly so when I straighten it it always feels dry and it looks dull. But this makes my hair so shiny and soft! I bought a 2 oz bottle at walgreens but I will be buying a much larger bottle when this is all gone! Go buy it! You won't regret it

product_name: Laura Mercier Lip Colour - Sheer: Beauty
title: Great shades
review_text:
I'm picky about my lipstick.  Not only does the shade have to be great (not garish or sparkly) but I want it to smell pleasant (or not at all), taste pleasant (or not at all) and I want the case to feel substantial and click when I close it.

OK -- so how does this one measure up?  The shades are awsome.  I like Baby Lips and Natural Lips.  It smells ok -- kind of like vasaline -- but only faintly.  Estee Lauder lipstick has a much stronger perfume smell and Lacome tends to smell fruity.  It tastes faintly like a chapstick.  The case is relatively heavy and it clicks.  Neither the taste nor the smell are off-putting but because I'm so picky it only gets 4 stars.  (The texture is smooth as well and it doesn't feel heavy on your lips.)

If you want natural (not sparkly) lips for everyday this is a good choice

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Perfume Armani Code Women
review_text:
I have no complaints, only praises!   Good, fast order reception, processing and dispatch.  Delivered within expected times in excellent conditions and with a friendly smile!  Keep up the good work!

Regards,

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Best Armani Ever!!
review_text: I was looking for a new scent and stumbled upon this.  I was sold instantly and have never gotten so many comments on any perfume that I have ever worn before.  Well worth it!!

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: A new favourite @}->---
review_text:
I love trying new fragrances, and when I came across this yesterday and tried it on, - I became hooked instantly.  It's a beautiful perfume that is somewhat floral and fruity at the same time, but isn't too overpowering and for me, lasted quite a while.
The packaging is great.  It's fresh looking and pretty, but it's the fragrance itself that hooked me.  I got a few comments on it right away, so I think I'm going back to the store to buy some.  It might be a little too heavy for hot summer days, but perfect for winter.  I think this will definately suit cooler climates better, or if it's too hot, it will probably become sickly and too strong.  If you like the blend of fruit and floral, this is for you.  It's stunning and different.  I love it

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Sweet
review_text:
Men will love it.


Only complaint: scent doesn't last too long. It deserves to last long

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Armani Code
review_text: While in Sephora planning to buy Fantasy By Britney Spears I came across the Armani Code. It was kinda hard to miss since there was this GIGANTIC Poster advertising it. So I thought there's no harm testing it right?? I sprayed a little bit on a test strip and fell IN LOVE with it. It smells amazing!!!! It mainly smells like Lavendar to me which is one of my favorite scent. It lasts for about maybe 4 hours so if you go to school or work you might need 1 or 2 refreshes. I spray about 2 squirts each. Also on the days that you want to try something different I recommand the Pink Sugar by Aquolina and Miracle Intense by Lancome

product_name: Laura Mercier Stickgloss: Beauty
title: SUBTLE, REFINED, AND VERY FLATTERING!
review_text:
Love all of the items in Laura Mercier's spring collection - Sheer Madness.  "Sheer" is the operative word here - the makeup is subtle, refined and very flattering.

	The stick gloss rates a ten and all A's from me.  What's not to like about a lip treatment that soothes, smooths, plus adds color and fullness?  Stick gloss is a combination of lip balm, lip color, and lip glaze - a three in one winner.

	My favorite colors are Peony, a deep rose, and Poppy, a festive crimson.   When applied each color is much sheerer than the tube color indicates.  For instance, the Peony appears to be a burgundy tone yet on the lips it is a lovely rose.

     Perfect warm weather tones.

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: I Love It!
review_text: I started college this year and because of my dorm's terrible softened water and the dry air that I wasn't exposed to at my home, my hair turned into a dry, frizzy mess. I came home at Christmas and had to have a foot taken off the bottom of my hair! (it needed a trimming anyway...but still) I still had two feet of damaged hair left. My mom gave me the Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment to use over my winter break and after just a few times using Ojon, my hair became smooth and silky again. Now I use Ojon about once every three weeks and my hair is in such better shape than it was before! When I use Ojon I usually sleep with it in, then wash it out in the morning. I find that it's most effective that way. I have to admit that the first time I used Ojon the strong smell gave me a headache, but now it doesn't give me headaches at all, in fact, I love the burnt chocolate/coffee smell that is has! I would recommend Ojon to anyone with long and or damaged hair. It is a wonderful product

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: WOW LOVE THIS STUFF
review_text: I have always wanted to try Ojon Restorative Treatment and I finally bought it.  My hair has never looked or felt so good in years.  I color my hair and use a flat iron several times a week so it was so so dry.  I put it on last night left it in overnight.  I also got the shampoo and conditioner once I started brushing my wet hair I could tell that this stuff is good.  I will never buy anything other than Ojon again.  Truely it is the best

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Play Sticks: Beauty
title: Finally!
review_text: I've used others in the past, but they end up losing their concealment power in a short time, or end up making me look shinier. This one is easy to apply (it's like drawing on your face) and it stays on a long time. I really love it. :

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Play Sticks: Beauty
title: convenient and a problem solver
review_text: What this description doesn't say is that this foundation has vitamin b which STOPS oil production! This is an amazing product for oily skin girls. It's customizable coverage and you can put it where you shine or need to cover

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Play Sticks: Beauty
title: This is great stuff!
review_text: Coverage is great if you have playsticks! It is a great foundation and goes on nicely

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Play Sticks: Beauty
title: LOOKING NIFTY AT FIFTY!
review_text: Thanks to the coverage of PLAY STICKS, that is!  The coverage is significant for my emerging age spots, yet PLAY STICKS does  not look heavy, chalky or cakey at all. Using PLAY STICKS, my face looks like I am using  little make up, and it has a sheer look and dewey finish. PROBLELM:  Finding my color with online shopping!  It is out of stock and I don't live up North where the department stores carry BENEFIT!!!! It is so worth the effort!  I LOVE THIS FOUNDATION, and I have tried the regulars: Bobbie Brown, Este Lauder, Clinique, etc

product_name: Cris Notti Green Kimono Med. Toiletry Case: Beauty
title: Beautiful and unique beauty case
review_text: This is a beautiful makeup case.  Although made in China it is very well made.  The kimono silk is really beautiful

product_name: Clinique Superfit Makeup: Beauty
title: The only foundation I use...
review_text:
This is the only foundation that I will ever use.  I have very oily skin with large pores.  My main problem was that 3 to 4 hours after I put on other foundations, my face would be so incredibly shiny it was gross.  Superfit does not do that.  It also doesn't make my skin break out.

Additionally, it's an exact color match.  I have brown skin and finding an exact color match was very difficult for me.  I use "nutty".

The only problem that I have with this foundation and why I didn't give it 5 stars is the fact that it will rub off on your clothing.  So careful, for those of you, who apply makeup before putting on clothing.

product_name: Clinique Superfit Makeup: Beauty
title: BEST foundation EVER!!!
review_text: I've used a ton of different foundations, and this by far is the BEST!!!  I went to the store and they matched the correct shade to my skin, so I  don't have to worry about make-up lines.  I also got the consealer for under the eyes--great stuff

product_name: Clinique Superfit Makeup: Beauty
title: Best Stuff
review_text:
This is the only thing I will use on my face. I always have problems with foundations not blending in or splotching. This the first foundation I have come across that looks great on my skin. It doesn't cake up or look unnatural.
Ive been using this product for the last 5 or 6 years and I won't change

product_name: The Body Shop Tea Tree Oil Face Mask: Beauty
title: Refreshing!
review_text: I have nothing but positive things to say about this face mask!  It is very refreshing and makes my skin feel smooth and refreshed.  It also keeps blemishes from acne under control, so less breakouts

product_name: Rene Furterer Forticea Stimulating Shampoo: Beauty
title: Great shampoo
review_text: I love this shampoo. I havent been using it long enough to see a differece with hair growth, but it definitely leaves my hair clean. My hair actually feels stronger. And even though it states that it has oils in it, my fine hair is not weighed down at all. Leaves my hair shiny and feels good when massaged into the scalp. Helps with oiliness of the scalp. I love it

product_name: Bobbi Brown Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: One of the Best Colors & Glosses
review_text: I bought the lip gloss in chocolate and love it. You can wear it alon or over matte lipstick.  The color looked dark in the tube but looked very natural.  I'm going to order it for some friends as gifts

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Hair Mask with Shea Butter: Beauty
title: Perfect for the curly girl
review_text: I use a small amount of this stuff as a leave in conditioner.  It keeps my curls in line and they do not get frizzy

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Hair Mask with Shea Butter: Beauty
title: This is it!
review_text: this has to be the best product out there. The bottle says you can leave it on overnight, so i did the first time. The smell is so fantastic you won't mind having it on your hair for a long time. After i washed my hair, i was extremely pleased with the results. Super shiny soft hair. Worth every penny

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Hair Mask with Shea Butter: Beauty
title: A WONDERFULLY RESTORATIVE TREATMENT
review_text:
Ever think about how much time most of us spend taking care of our skin?  We use potions, creams, and masks on our faces to keep complexions glowing but often neglect our hair save for a quick shampoo and blow dry.  Then, all of a sudden, we look in a mirror and realize these tresses need a treatment! 

     Let's face it, blow drying, hot rollers, curling irons, coloring, the sun all take their toll on even the healthiest of heads.  

     Hair Mask with Shea Butter is both a treat and a treatment for dry, lifeless, lusterless hair.  Shea Butter is, of course, the key ingredient, working its magic to restore lackadaisical locks.  

      It's simple - work a palm size dollop through damp hair and leave on for up to 20 minutes.  Then shampoo and rinse hair well.  I'd also recommend using Fekkai's Apple Cider Clearing Rinse.

       The results are immediate - what a difference you'll see and feel.

       - Gail Cook

product_name: Takeouts - The Better Boob Job Silicone Bra Inserts: Beauty

review_text: This product is AMAZING!!!  I did a lot of research before buying these and they certainly seemed like the best option for the price-definitely so!  They came soooo fast and the minute I used them I was floored!  I have a 32B chest and these inserts are awesome for giving me a little more volume without being overwhelming.  They feel incredibly natural too!  I can't express to you all how overjoyed I am and soooo happy that I chose to go with Takeouts.  I would recommend them to anyone looking for a boost!

product_name: Pouf Mesh Sponges: Beauty

review_text:
Listen, I ran out of my bar soap, and all that was left was my wife's liquid stuff and this 'poofy' thing.  So I used it.  No big deal, right?  Except... except, I... I liked it...  I actually felt more clean.  Now I've got my own (white, if you must know), but I use some of the more manly liquid soaps to balance things out.

I've since learned that the extra clean feeling was due to something called 'exfoliation'.  You should pick up a copy of Seventeen Magazine if you want more info

product_name: The Body Shop All In One Face Base: Beauty
title: all in one face base
review_text: This is great either as a face powder to soak up the shine over your foundation, or in the summer as a light foundation.  I have purchased before and will again as it is one of my favorite powders.  Very silky

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Luscious Curls Cream: Beauty
title: Part of my hair regime
review_text: When I want to make my hair as wavy/curly as possible, I mix this with the glossing cream and apply to damp hair then dry with a diffuser. i finish with the curl spray. My hair gets big pretty curls and waves and isnt all dry and sticky. ;

product_name: philosophy hot cocoa lip shine .5 ounce: Beauty
title: Must Have!
review_text: If I could pick one lip gloss to use for the rest of my life, it would easily be this.  (And as a lip gloss junkie, that's saying a lot.)  It tastes fantastic, smells equally amazing, and shimmers on your lips.  Plus, its decadent tint gives your pout added sheen and mixes well with any complexion.  The best lip gloss you'll ever buy

product_name: Shiseido Pureness Oil-Blotting Paper 100 Sheets: Beauty
title: Great Blotters
review_text: I have these and rice paper blotters and these are by far my favorite as not only do they blot oil but they add a bit of powder to keep my makeup looking fresh.  Don't leave home without the

product_name: Shiseido Pureness Oil-Blotting Paper 100 Sheets: Beauty
title: Pretty good
review_text: I got these in the mail today and I was very excited. The packaging is very thin and sleek (soft rubber) which is a bonus since I hate being able to feel those hard packages in my purse. Now, the sheets are very good. The only thing is that they're a bit too rough (for my taste), but they remove the oil and leave a transparent powder on your skin. The powder doesn't even come off of the sheet until it hits the oil! Really neat. Plus,the powder actually stays on my skin for a while, about an hour (I have combination skin; that might be why), so I won't look all icky and shiny. If you have sensitive skin, these might bother you a bit but they DO work very well, a lot better than any I have ever tried.

product_name: Shiseido Pureness Oil-Blotting Paper 100 Sheets: Beauty
title: Best Oil Blotting Sheets EVER!
review_text:
I've got pretty oily skin - I always have.  These are my absolute favorite oil blotting sheets.  I've tried a wide assortment of other brands, and the Shiseido ones are truly the best.  I really like the light powder on the sheets.  You know it's absorbing without leaving tons of make-up left on your face.

I DETEST those oil blotting sheets which are "rubbery".  Hopefully you know what I'm referrring to.  I don't feel like those sheets actually absorb anything - more like push the oil around.  

After using this product you can visably see all of the oil and grime REMOVED from your face.  I haven't found anything I like better than these.  5 Stars

product_name: Shiseido Pureness Oil-Blotting Paper 100 Sheets: Beauty
title: Love!
review_text:
I have very oily skin, and I like to go powder-free in the summer. These tissues work great, they are the best tissues I have tried and the price is good.

Oil Absorbtion - absorbs LOTS of oil. And believe me, I have a lot.

Powder - There is a little powder on the tissue, and it's light blue. Maybe to make sallow complexions look less sallow? Anyway, it goes away after a few minutes, but it makes my skin nice and non-oily.

Portable - Nice lil foldover packet to take anywhere.

I recommend these tissues for any woman with very oily skin. I use them in the winter and summer. They work better than napkins, are more conveneint that face washing and are a great value for the price

product_name: Sephora Piiink My Lip Shiiine: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: This lip gloss is amazing. It's not sticky  but it doesn't wear off fast, and comes in fantastic flavours. My favourite is Coconut flavour as its smells and tastes like coconut oil which I use at the beach therefore reminding me of the hot beach! Its also really fun to wear. The coconut colour is a hot pink but don't be fooled, It does not come out hot pink on your lips, it comes out a nice light sparkely pink! Its fantastic and my favourite lip gloss ever! the packaging is really cool and its cheap unlike most things!!! Quality buy

product_name: Burberry Burberry Classic: Beauty
title: One of my favorites!
review_text:
Burberry London is definitely a compliment-getter.  It's also versatile, as it can be worn in any weather and with any outfit.  It has notes of peach, black currant, vanilla, and cedar.  

Please do not judge this scent by only sniffing the nozzle or smelling a scent strip of paper.  It smells NOTHING like it does on skin.  Allow it to settle for 5 minutes, and if it works with your body chemistry, you'll know right away. :o)  At first sprtiz, I get a peachy/cedar blast that quickly mellows into a gorgeous, clean, but warm scent.  The vanilla isn't sweet at all.. just warm and inviting.  I have received a lot of compliments on this.

The lasting power is wonderful!  By the end of the day, it can only be sniffed by anyone who gets close to you, but it has developed into a super soft, clean vanilla.  Burberry London can be expensive, but there are lots of places where you can find great deals on it.  The bottle is very sophisticated, simple, and classy.

Try it!

product_name: Burberry Burberry Classic: Beauty
title: Very very nice
review_text: I was really surprised by this one. I'd seen all the hoopla surrounding Burberry's other fragrance, Brit, and yet I found it too heavy. This one, however, is wonderful. It's not too much of anything. It's got a wonderful clean, modern scent that is very easy to wear year round and I've gotten lots of compliments. This is a good everyday scent that will allow you to smell wonderful without intruding upon others.

product_name: Bare Escentuals Essential Brow Color: Beauty

It's really hard to see what the color is online, and I couldn't decide which color to buy.  So I bought the dark blonde color, and had to go back to get the pale blonde one.  If your hair is in between the two colors, go with the lighter one

product_name: Bare Escentuals Essential Brow Color: Beauty

product_name: StriVectin-SD Eye Cream, 1.3-Ounce Tube: Beauty
title: StriVectin SD Eye Cream 1.3 oz
review_text: sadly i bought this product because i heard jennifer lopez uses it, i have no idea if that is the truth but i wanted it anyway. i live in the uk, so the delivery took about three weeks, that said , the wait was worth it. i am twenty five with bad crows feet, due to late nights and alcohol a plenty, so i really did need something to help me out. after a few days of applying day and night i could tell that the lines had softened, enough to make me feel good.the dark circles under my eyes are looking lighter as well so that's a bonus. i dont think this is going to make my lines dissapear but they are hardly noticeable anymore. the cost of the product doesn'y seem that steep as the cream will last for ages, i only use a tiny drop and it's twice the size of normal eye cream's you can buy. overall i am more than pleased with the result's and i will definately be purchasing more, when the time comes.

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Protein Rx Reparative Shampoo: Beauty
title: Great conditioner...
review_text:
I purchased this conditioner after having used the Fekkai color-treated (the pink one) version thinking it would be even better for my high-lighted and damaged hair.  While it is still a fantastic conditioner compared to most on the market, I really thought that the pink one did a better job.  Both leave my hair smooth and relatively healthy, but my hair is honestly gorgeous after using the pink Fekkai conditioner--shiny, bouncy, like I never colored it.  Maybe this one is a little too heavy for my hair?  I haven't quite figured out the difference.  

As previous posters have noted, this does have a rather strong smell--sort of a floral, almond fragrance--which is a little stronger than most hair products.  I didn't find it particually off-putting, but I do prefer the clean, simple fragrance of the pink Fekkai conditioner.

All in all, a great product, but I'll go back to my original Fekkai conditioner when this one runs out.  I never thought I would say this about a $20 tiny bottle of conditioner, but it's totally worth the $$.(For comparison purposes, I have medium-length, straight, dirty blonde hair with highlights)

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Protein Rx Reparative Shampoo: Beauty
title: Great stuff, but very smelly
review_text: Okay, I know fragrance is a personal preference. This shampoo and the conditioner and hair treatment mask have done wonderful things for my damaged hair. However, I hate the smell. It has a very heavy fragrance that I can only describe as being like incense or myrhh. Very overpowering and gives me a headache. I prefer my hair products to have light, clean, fresh scents that won't interfere with my perfume and won't give me a headache. Thus, only 4 stars. I wish the people at Fekkai would consider changing the fragrance for this product line to something less intrusive

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Protein Rx Reparative Shampoo: Beauty

It's wonderful, it smells great(my boyfriend loved it), it got my hair really clean and left it soft and with some body, not limp and greasy feeling.  I will only use Fekkai products from now on, they really are the best for your hair

product_name: Bare Escentuals Buzz Latte Lip Balm: Beauty
title: THE BEST LIP BALM EVER!!! Will never use another!
review_text: I've always had really dry, chapped lips and was always putting on lip balm under my lipstick, before bed, and probably a million times throughout the day.  But nothing seemed to help...lipstick always seemed to dry them out even more and nothing looks worse than dry lips with lipstick on.  It just makes your lips look even drier.  Buzz Latte Lip balm is the most amazing product ever!!!  It smells like coffee really strong at first but then goes away.  It doesnt taste bad either.  Yes, its $8 bucks for a tube...but the tube is twice the size of normal chapsticks so the cost evens out.  This product lasts forever...why?  Because it stays on so long...even with lipstick or lip glosses.  The first time i put this on was when I tried a friends.  Within hours i noticed a dramatic  difference so I went out and bought my own.    My lips have NEVER been so smooth and full.    Bare Escentuals continues to suprise me with all of their products!!! I dont think I will every try another makeup line.  I think what makes this product work so well is that its got a lot of shea butter in it.  But this product is amazing!  You can even dip it in bare escentuals blushes or eyeshadows and create a matching lipstick.  This is an absolute MUST for any makeup collection or anyone who suffers from dry, chapped lips.  You wont be sorry....you'll notice a difference right away

review_text: This product does as it claims and then some. I have only needed to apply minimal applications, and within days my ingrown hairs were no longer. Extreme caution must be taken if you intend to use this product on your face or neck. The label reccomends not to, however With my sensative skin, I have not exeprienced any negative side effects. Worth the price of admission

product_name: Sephora Matte Blotting Film: Beauty
title: Oil, begone!
review_text:
Like many other oil strips, this locks up all the oil on your face without removing any makeup.  This is perfect for those with oily skin like mine, who need to blot often.

Although I'm sure there are cheaper brands that would do the same, when you blot with these sheets it seems to last longer than others I have used.

Check out your Sephora stores, sometimes they sell them 2 for $10

product_name: EvianÂ® Brumisateur Mineral Water Sprays: Beauty
title: Just water, but that's all I want.
review_text:
Yes, this is just water, but packaged wonderfully.  I have very dry, sensitive skin, and the little Evian spritzers (I carry one with me all the time in the winter) help immeasurably.  I spray a little on before moisturizing, or when my skin is flaking.  I always take these on planes--and spritz my face every two hours--and find that this keeps my skin from drying out and from becoming too oily (in reaction to the dryness) on long flights.

Some reviewers have scoffed at this product, pointing out that it's just water and speculating that the brand name is the draw.  I don't drink Evian water very often (I prefer other brands, if I'm drinking bottled water), and if I could find a comparable product I would definitely try it out.  Similar products, like the Body Shop face mists, tend to be scented and irritate my (very sensitive) skin (the exception to this is the face spritz from the Boots Botanical line, but that is hard to find outside of the UK); I've considered just getting a spray bottle and putting regular water in it, but those tend to have larger, more forceful sprayers and I don't want to point one at my face.

With the Evian brumisateur, you're getting just water, but that's all you need; it's conveniently packaged, lasts a long time for such a small bottle, and I love the way it feels.  Highly reccomended (and thank goodness they're carry-on approved, if you buy the small size!

product_name: Philosophy Shear Splendor Age-Defying Hair "Marinating" Oil for Chemically Treated, Chronically Dry Hair: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text: iv'e been using shear splendor marinade for a month and it is making my hair softer, shinier and healthy looking.  i dont usually style my hair(rollers, blowdry etc.) only when i go out. Since I've been using the marinade my boyfriend always thinks i've been to the salon.  It really is great.  the shear splendor shampoo and conditioner are ok nothing more than just what it is.  But this marinade really works.  Try the 2 oz trial  size in the kit. Ive used it for 4 weeks and I still have more than half the bottle left and my hair is down to my waist

product_name: Philosophy Shear Splendor Age-Defying Hair "Marinating" Oil for Chemically Treated, Chronically Dry Hair: Beauty
title: Great for hair!
review_text: This hair oil is amazing! My hair was severely damaged from bleaching, dying, chemical straightening, and heat styling. I've tried everything from cheap store brands to salon products to repair my dry, brittle hair; but nothing has made any real difference until now. Philosophy Marinating Oil has brought my hair back to life! After just one use it was softer, smoother, less dry, and much, much heathier looking. I have been using it for about a month now and my hair looks better than it did before I started dying and straightening it. This product is worth the money

product_name: Philosophy Shear Splendor Age-Defying Hair "Marinating" Oil for Chemically Treated, Chronically Dry Hair: Beauty
title: Color Your Hair? You'll Love This!
review_text:
Don't be afraid of the word "oil". This treatment reversed years of damage from my color-treated very long hair after the first use. I love Philosophy products so when I heard about Shear Splendor I didn't hesitate and purchased the entire system. The shampoo and conditioner are the best things I have ever done for my hair. The effects are cumulative and after a few months of continued use, I'm still impressed. I use the Marinating Oil once a week and it's now a "must have" for me.  

The "Marinating" Oil is not what you might imagine an "oil" to be. It penetrates the hair, treats the scalp, smells really good (very subtle) and doesn't feel heavy. It's easy to leave in all night, washes out so quickly and it's instant gratification - beautiful hair. 

Leave it to a great skin care company to apply beneficial treatment properties to hair care.  

This Marinating Oil also multi-tasks for me. I use a tiny bit and rub it into my cuticles and nails.  I use a few drops to tame frizz before I use my flat-iron. I've rubbed a few drops onto my hands and feet when I've felt extra-dry.  This is good stuff!

I highly praise this product.  This is not just another random addition to the confusing mass of hair care lines.  This is serious *treatment* that won't be put on the shelf with the rest of the "things I've tried".

It's worth it. I actually love my hair again.  My color lasts longer, doesn't fade, and the shine just won't quit.  It's taken years and years of damage away.

I can blow-dry, flat-iron, curl... without the fry-factor.  

The shampoo and conditioner last forever. A little really does go a long, long way.

Thank you again Philosophy, you've yet to let me down.

product_name: Philosophy Shear Splendor Age-Defying Hair "Marinating" Oil for Chemically Treated, Chronically Dry Hair: Beauty
title: Great For Over Processed Hair
review_text: My hairstylist accidentally bleached my hair too much. As if that wasn't bad enough, by the end of that week I noticed my hair was visibly dryer and had lost its shine. I used this "Marinating" oil overnight - slept in a plastic shower cap. I was surprised how easily it washed out in the morning. There was no "oily" residue weighing my hair down either. I was very impressed with the results, it put shine and body back in my hair - and I've only used it once, as they recommend overnight treatments once a week - I'm expecting even better results by the end of the month. I'd definetly recommend this product.

product_name: StriVectin SD (Better than Botox?) - 6 oz: Beauty
title: My One-Month Trial
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
"Strivectin-SD is much less expensive than surgery, but it's not cheap. Finally, for maxium efficacy, StriVectin-SD must be applied three times a day, every day for 4-6 weeks...StriVectin-SD works, but you have to use it. So unless you're committed to getting rid of stretch marks, don't waste your time, your energy, or your money." 

After months of thinking about an incredibly large skin care purchase, I splurged and purchased the StriVectin-SD cream. If you have ever gained and lost weight or have been pregnant, then you know that you can get stretch marks and they never seem to go away. How do you heal your skin so they literally disappear? Well, to start with, you need a cream that will produce dramatic results in a short amount of time. Especially as summer is approaching. 

I gave this cream a one-month trial. You need very little because this cream is very concentrated. It seems to increase the skin's thickness and firmness, therefore making the depths of indented surfaces much less apparent. 

Results you should see in 4-6 weeks: 

Decrease in the actual length of the stretch mark 
Decrease in the depth of the indented surfaces 
Increase in skin smoothness, thickness and firmness 

What is actually occurring? 

The cream stimulates glycosaminoglycan and collagen synthesis. It will also correct irregularities in skin coloration. The Peptide solution helps to thicken the skin. 

How often did I apply this? 

Just one to two times a day. At first I tried to apply the cream three times a day, but found it was easier to remember to put this cream on after a shower and/or before bed. It seems to work very well with only two applications a day. 

You may also find yourself using this on your face or on areas where you want to see a decrease in wrinkles. 

Not for use by pregnant or nursing women. Consult with your dermatologist before using this product. Do ask your doctor if this product is right for you and start using it as soon as possible after pregnancy/nursing. You will be amazed at the results after 1 month. My main reason for using this product was due to weight gain and monthly weight gain. It seems to have been very effective and I will continue using the product over the long term for maintenance. 

The ingredient list is long (a proprietary combination of skin firming agents, elasticizers and hydrators) but some of the main ingredients include: Sesame oil, sweet almond oil, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-3, Algae Extract, Coneflower Extract, Licorice, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Peppermint Oil and retinyl Palmitate. 

This product has been clinically proven to dramatically reduce stretch marks and you will find many additional uses for this product. Is it better than Botox? I have never used Botox, but I can say there was a definite reduction in facial wrinkles after a month of use on two main areas of my face. 

What else does this product promise? It will reduce acne scars, burn scars, chicken pox marks and scars from old injuries. If you are looking for even faster results, go to your local esthetician and have a microdermabrasion peel. That will help this product absorb better and you will see even faster results. 

I also just found the Derma E Peptides Plus Double-Action Wrinkle Reverse Creme. It also has the Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-3 and is perfect for use on your face if you are allergic to nut oils like almond oil. Once you realize the benefits of this ingredient, you will start to recognize the name in many skin products.
