This really makes me hair feel luxurious and Im thrilled that I did spend the money on it, for now no matter what I do to my hair, its always a good hair day! As an added bonus I don't need anything else in my hair, which saves more time and money, it's incredible how this one product does such an incredible turn around on my mane, love it

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: Frizzy hair? Not with Phytodefrisant!
review_text:
This is my "Holy Grail" haircare product -- I could use almost any other shampoo, almost any other conditioner, almost any other hairspray, but I could *not* ever use any other styling product on my hair, now that I've had a chance to use this. There is a Very Good Reason why Phytotherathie's Phytodefrisant has long been a mainstay of top professional models & has been voted the #1 haircare product by readers of "Allure" magazine more than once -- try it & if you have frizzy hair I guarantee you'll understand, too.

My hair is thick, naturally wavy/curly & prone to extreme frizziness in the slightest humidity, & I've spent most of my post-pubescent life trying to figure out how to straighten it & control the frizziness. Until I discovered Phytodefrisant, the most effective product I had found was Sebastian's "Laminates" (I've tried virtually *every* product promoted to control frizziness that's been on the U.S. market in the last 30 years), but the silicone eventually built up on my hair & on very humid days I had to use so much of it that my hair was weighed down by the coating & felt "dirty". It "looked" reasonably good (for most of the day), but it certainly didn't feel very good to the touch. However, letting my hair go "curly" was a non-starter because the "curls" became nothing but frizz unless the humidity was close to 100% & if I used the "Laminates," it only destroyed my hair's ability to curl & simply made my hair look "dirty" & unstyled.

By contrast, just a teaspoon of Phytodefrisant allows me to blow-dry my hair to soft, sleek, straight smoothness, with no residue detectible at all to the touch. The first time I used it, what struck me the most was how "natural" & "bouncy" my hair felt to the touch (I know, I know, I sound like a TV commercial, but this is *really* true!). I could run my fingers through my smooth, straight hair without detecting the slightest residue of the product & even after a month of daily use there is absolutely *no* build up whatsoever. On days when I want to wear my hair "curly", a single teaspoon allows my hair to dry naturally into crisp, bouncy curls without the slightest evidence of frizziness all day, no matter the humidity.

My hair is shoulder-length & this tube lasts me for about 6 months, which breaks down to a cost of 13 cents a day. If buying a tube for this price seems daunting, Phyto includes a small travel-size tube in its "Petites" travel collection, which would allow you to try a variety of their products & which is also sold here at Amazon.com last time I checked. If you want more reviews from people who take their haircare seriously, check out the numerous rave reviews for Phytodefrisant on makeupalley dot com, where this is one of the highest rated products by a picky demographic group that takes personal care products very, very seriously! ;

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: And I thought it was just another half-assed product...
review_text: ...to my suprise though, it was wonderful!  I didn't buy this product on Amazon.com, I picked it up at Sephoria at the mall.  This product is a bit expensive, but so far, it's been worth it.  I've been using for 5 days now, you apply it to wet hair, after shampoing.  When you do, you can feel your hair becoming so smooth and shiny.  I love this product so far, it's all natural too and it really does work.  It isn't going to make your hair 100% straight, no, I gave up on that a long time ago.  What is it going to do is straighten the hair enough, make it managable, and beautiful.  For once, I don' thave to hide behind my hat :)  Will buy again

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: Even MY hair can be sleek?
review_text:
I have used this a total of 3 times so far and I can already see a difference.
My hair is kinky/curly/unruly. It's fair and I do highlight so I am prone to dryness on the ends.  And frizz?  My worst enemy. The real test will be when the hot/humid weather comes to town.  
But so far, so good.  It's worth every penny

product_name: Phyto Phytodefrisant Botanical Hair Relaxing Balm: Beauty
title: This really is a wonderful product!!
review_text: I have horrible hair. And I live in Florida, where non-frizzy hair is impossible for me....until now. I am not happy about the price, but will continue to buy. If you have frizzy unmanageable hair, this product will help you out a lot

product_name: Philosophy Amazing Grace To Go: Beauty
title: Love this product
review_text: It arrived on time and in great shape, very protected mailing, I will be buying more

product_name: Clinique Exfoliating Scrub: Beauty
title: Exfoliate your way to better skin!
review_text: Love this product, with the anti-bacterial soap and cleansing toner, my skin has never been clearer! love it:

product_name: Dermablend Quick Fix - 0.2 oz: Beauty
title: Excellent coverage!
review_text:
This is an excellent product!  Just hard to find!
Does exactly what it says it will do.  Covers scars & imperfections.  I am able to get a smooth finish on my face after covering bad spots with this & then regular makeup on top.  Doesn't cake up when covering "black eyes" either

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Women 3.4 oz Perfume Spray: Beauty
title: Perfectly Happy
review_text: This is the best smelling perfume I've ever encountered--and the only one I've gotten compliments from strangers on.  It's fresh & clean--not heavy and overpowering like many other fragrances.  I keep trying other perfumes out of curiousity, but I always come back to `Happy'

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Women 3.4 oz Perfume Spray: Beauty
title: Yes!!
review_text: I got this perfume as a gift, and I'm absolutely in love with it!  It's light, refreshing, citrusy, but it's wonderfully softened by pretty floral notes. Nicely feminine, but very contemporary and sophisticated--it's not like the heavy floral perfumes of the old days. I like it so much I went out and bought the Happy body wash--it just brings my mornings alive and takes some of the pain out of getting up for work.  I also bought the Happy body lotion which I smooth on after my shower.  This gives me a fragrance foundation that I then top off with the perfume.  It's a wonderful way to set out into the world, wrapped in a beautiful, light, refreshing fragrance, and it's not overpowering for everyone else--in fact, I've gotten lots of compliments on my perfume.  It's nice to be noticed!

product_name: Bobbi Brown Eye Shadow: Beauty
title: Nice Eye Shadow
review_text: Nice eyeshadow that works as an eyeliner. I don't use it much but when I do it lasts and looks great

product_name: Kerastase Nutritive Bain Oleo-Relax Shampoo - 8.5 oz: Beauty
title: Best Shampoo Ever
review_text: I have thick wavy hair that frizzes at the drop of a hat.  This shampoo work great.  My hair is softer and smoother than I have ever been ever to get it.  Love this product!!

product_name: Estee Lauder DayWear Plus Cream: Beauty
title: daywear plus
review_text: a great moisturizer and sunscreen--necesary in the New Mexico climate. Goes on like silk; not greasy

product_name: Chanel Levres Scintillantes Lip-gloss: Beauty
title: Miracle lip gloss!
review_text: This is excellent lip gloss. I agree with the previous reviewer. It lasts for a very long time, doesn't feel sticky or liquidy, and doesn't taste bad. Unfortunately, the price is painful at which to look and on the wallet, but it's worth it. I've only tried one color (because of the price) and I think it works very well with my natural skin tones (I use 'Cry Baby'). Next time you're looking for a new lip gloss, check out this one. It's definitely worth it

product_name: Chanel Levres Scintillantes Lip-gloss: Beauty
title: Luxurious
review_text: This lip gloss is so wonderful, I don't know where to start.  Long lasting shine, perfect color, goes on smooth-doesn't feel sticky or gummy like some glosses do, mild fruity flavor.  I HIGHLY recommend this lip gloss to anyone-the expense is worth it 100X over

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: amaziingggg
review_text: Kiss me Mascara does exactly what it tells you. try it you'll LOVE IT. its totally worth the $25!!!

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: The best mascara I have ever used
review_text: This mascara truely is smudge and flake proof.  It is also waterproof.  The best part is you don't need to buy make up remover.  An amazing product and you will love it.  I have been using it forever.  Try it and you will love it.

product_name: Blinc Kiss Me Mascara: Beauty
title: Really stays on.
review_text: This stuff was great. It wasn't too thick going on, so it separated my lashes really well. I forgot to wash it off and went to bed, and I didn't have any smudges on me in the morning

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Pour Homme: Beauty
title: I AM WEARING IT RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!
review_text: I love this cologne.It has a great first spray smell and smells even better when you let it sit for a while. I like to were it when i work out cause when i start to sweat the smell gets stronger. I'm no scientist but this is the only cologne that has ever done that for me. I honestly come out of the gym smelling better then when i went in. I love this colonge and it drives girls crazy!!!!!!!!!!

product_name: Dolce & Gabbana Pour Homme: Beauty
title: Have you ever been in heaven?
review_text: If no, then you will definitely experience this feeling with Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Toilette.. My dad, my boyfriend, two of my cousins are using it as an everyday luxury keeping my mom, me and two of my cousins' wives in heaven.. This perfume is the best money can buy! Strongly recommend

product_name: Philosophy Empowermint Hand Wash: Beauty
title: Well-worth the price!
review_text: This is the most energizing, clean, refreshing hand soap I have ever used; in fact, I am replacing all my other stinky hand soaps!  The hand cream is great as well. I don't usually go ga-ga over stuff like this, but I LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff.  What a great find

product_name: Philosophy Kiss Me: Beauty
title: a good kiss
review_text: its a very good product. seems like i am becoming loyal to the philosophy brand. i have severe allergy conditions and do not use any makeup and other cosmetics. but philosophy products have suited me. if this gloss suits somebody its great. try it

product_name: Philosophy Kiss Me: Beauty
title: best lip balm
review_text: i have tried everything to make my chapped lips go away. regular chapstick does not work for my dry flaky lips.  i tried this for three days and no more chappedlips. instead i have nice luscious soft lips:

product_name: Philosophy Kiss Me: Beauty
title: The lip balm for lip balm "addicts"
review_text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this lip balm.  It has a great texture- doesn't get gooy or sticky after you wear it for a while.  It really melts into your lips.  I have tried A LOT of different lip products- I always have to have something on my lips and this is the best I've tried.  Can't live without it..

product_name: Philosophy Kiss Me: Beauty
title: Soo Soft
review_text: This super balm makes my lips so soft. I usually put it on right before bed, because the taste is kind of nasty, but I forget about my slight taste-discomfort after I wake up with the most supple lips imaginable. No matter how flaky your lips are, Kiss Me conquers all! This is especially good for before/during/after skiing or snowboarding. It's also good for summer as it is somewhat light. I reccomend it, but beware if you get nauseated easily as the taste is enought to do it to you

product_name: philosophy amazing grace gift set (2 piece): Beauty
title: DIVA, RN
review_text:
I LOVE THIS LINE, ESPECIALLY THIS FRAGRANCE. I HAVE PEOPLE ROUTINELY ASK ME WHAT I AM WEARING. ONCE YOU START WEARING THIS LINE OF FRAGRANCE YOU WILL BE HOOKED. I ALSO LIKE PURE GRACE, IT SMELLS LIKE FRESH LINEN OFF THE CLOTHES LINE. THESE ARE THE TWO MOST UNBELIEVABLE SCENTS. TRY IT AND  YOU WON'T BE SORRY. I AM ON MY FOURTH BOTTLE AND I HAVE BEEN WEARING IT FOR ONLY A YEAR! 
IT IS NOT OBTRUSIVE, MY CO-WORKERS AND PATIENTS COMMENT ON THE CLEANLINESS OF THE SMELL. NOT FLOWERY, FRUITY, OR MUSKY. A SMELL ALL ITS OWN.

product_name: philosophy amazing grace gift set (2 piece): Beauty
title: Heavenly!
review_text: I received a sample of the Amazing Grace Shampoo,Bath and Shower Gel and was smitten by the singularly heavenly scent!  This prompted me to order a full-sized bottle.  Then I had to have the fragrance to layer with it, so I ordered this.  It's the best! It's like no other scent on the market: very clean and sexy. I've recently added the conditioner to the mix...it's hard to stop

product_name: Bobbi Brown Foundation Stick: Beauty
title: Swear by it
review_text: An awesome product that sells out - and that's the only problem!  I had to call around the US to find it in a department store, in stock and that would ship.  Amazon's supplier was sold out.

product_name: Anthony Logistics Deep Pore Cleansing Clay 4oz: Beauty
title: Deep Clean
review_text: This stuff does exacatly what it says. I have put in on for the past 2 weeks 2x a week. I have a mild case of acne and it seems to get rid of the oil in my skin really well. One thing I will say is that it does dry out your skin. I also sort of wonder why there has to be so many oils and stuff like that in it. I guess it all works together somehow. Overall a very good cleanser.

product_name: Clinique Long Last Soft Matte Lipstick: Beauty
title: Hard to find discontinued product!
review_text: I was thrilled to find my favorite lipstick here since it is discontinued everywhere else. The quality and pricing were perfect!

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: Lolita is right!
review_text: Sexy, young, VERY sweet..a little bit overbearing if not applied with a light touch. A little goes a long way. Absolutely adorable bottle! ( definitely one you don't throw away)  To me this scent is best described as " cotton candy with an attitude!" I have to be in a certain "mood" to wear this one, but..it IS one of my favorites!

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: a remembered scent
review_text: I have worn Lolita for many years,  and everyone always wants to know what I am wearing because they love it.  I have had 2 X-boyfriends, that I am still friends with, tell me they have never forgotten the smell of my perfume.  One of these guys dates back to college and I have been outta there for 8 years now.  I broke down and told them the name of  " that smell they loved" because they want to buy it for their new significant others.  The scent made an incredible impression on me,  but apparently on the other people that have been in my life as well. The scent is dark, seductive, and delicate at the same time.  I notice the scent changes more as the day wears on which I love because it only gets better.  I am told this is called the dry down phase.  Of course I am no professional perfumer,  but out of my collection of scents,  this one is my Annie Hall.... beautiful but different..  and not to be missed.

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: Catch a Guy
review_text: Now i'm a guy, but I buy this for my best friend back home whenever she runs out. Why? Cause from the male side of it, its literally the best fragrance I've ever had the pleasure to smell on a woman. And once you've experinced this smell guys, you'll never forget it. So don't waste time and go spend the cash and by your girl this gift

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: The best
reviewer: Evelyn Elizabeth "Just like hopes springing high..."
review_text: I love this perfume! I was dying to buy it, when finally someone got it for me as a gift. It's a great fragrance, it doesn't wear off quickly and it's smell is DIVINE. I get compliments on it just about every time I wear it..

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: People Love It or Hate It
review_text: I like it, but it is VERY sweet and VERY strong.  Cute bottle, too--best I have seen in ages.  Probably should be worn by younger (than I) women and not if they are going to be riding in a plane or an elevator.  This scent elicits some strong reactions

product_name: Lolita Lempicka Lolita Lempicka: Beauty
title: Dreamy, dark, and completely unique
review_text: This is one of my all-time favorite scents. If you love dark fairy tales and you like deep, rich fragrances that last but are not overpowering, this is for you. Wearing this is like entering a shimmery gothic dream. For me the best aspect of this fragrance is the slight licorice undertone, which gives it an edge I haven't come across in another fragrance. And did I mention it's romantic? Just look at the amethyst and gold apple bottle! They're too pretty to get rid of

product_name: The Body Shop Brazil Nut Body Butter: Beauty
title: My favorite product
review_text: I love the Brazil Nut Body Butter! I really do, so Im glad youve asked for my review! It absorbs quickly and aids in dry skin healing immediately. I like to layer it a few times over the course of an hour or so. I just cant live without it actually. I had tried with failure, alot of different moisturizers on the market over the years, wasting a ton of money on what I would say is basically false advertising of products that are mostly water and wax based, and was given this butter a few years ago by a friend and have been ordering it ever since. It pays for itself with the first use, and is not only excellent for dry hands but legs and well, just about anywhere you want healed, soft real skin again. I use it on my cuticles after manicures and have instant results there too! I totally recommend it to anyone who just cant get their dry skin to heal and be truly soft. Its not to heavy for summer use either, its just perfect

product_name: Tweezerman Tweezermate 12X Magnifying Mirror With Suction Cups: Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: Purchased this item for my sister and she loves it.  Now she can put on her eye makeup and really be able to see what she is doing.  Thanks

product_name: Tweezerman Tweezermate 12X Magnifying Mirror With Suction Cups: Beauty
title: perfect for blind baby-boomer
reviewer: Deborah MacGillivray "Author,  A Restless Knight; The Invasion of Falgannon Isle; In Her Bed"
review_text:
This mirror is super for tweezing and applying makeup.  So many of the magnifying mirrors are not that sharp.  This one is.  Very handy, it has two suction cups on the back so you can attach it to any mirror, so you always have the kick check to make sure to mascara doesn't end up like Tammy Fay Baker.

Very highly recommended

product_name: Lancome Renergie Cream: Beauty
title: Great product
review_text: I order this item for my mother every year for Christmas and she loves it.  This year was no exception.  Thanks for the great gift

product_name: CURIOUS For Women By BRITNEY SPEARS eau de parfum: Beauty: Britney Spears
title: A new classic...
review_text:
When I first saw CURIOUS while on holiday, I bought it without trying any. I just wanted the pretty bottle. When I opened it up back home I didn't have high hopes, impulse buying rarely works out does it? So what did I think?

I love it. My first thought was; Sophisticated and classic. CURIOUS can be worn for work, shopping, evenings out - anywhere at any time! 

On the first spay you notice the top notes of magnolia and lotus flower, then the dreamy base of vanilla-infused musk, which lasts throughout the day. The best surprise of all?   After you've worn it for a few hours, you are surprised with the mouth-watering aroma of tangy pear.

product_name: CURIOUS For Women By BRITNEY SPEARS eau de parfum: Beauty: Britney Spears
title: curious
review_text: i bought this perfume and i fell in love with the smell i give britney spears credi

product_name: MAC Studio Fix Powder Plus Foundation NC30: Beauty
title: Makeup Essential!
review_text:
As a model, I often have to do my own makeup for my photoshoots. MAC StudioFix Powder is one of my favorite products, as it is a light-weight product with light to medium coverage that I use on top of heavier coverage foundations to provide a matte finish and a tiny bit of extra coverage. 

One of my favorite features is the fact that there is such a wide selection of shades to match virtually any skintone. As recommended on Asianbeautyblog.com for my Asian skintone, I can use C35 and NC35 pretty interchangably - both are yellow based shades, though I find that C35 is more natural looking when used alone because of its golden/olive undertones. There are few other companies that offer such a wide range of shades, especially ones that suit ethnic skintones. I love MAC

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Heaven Scent!
review_text:
I went on a previous review and was not disappointed. The petals are a perfect Valentine, bath-time, any time 'gift'
I now want to try all their products.
I also put some of the bombs in with my sheets. 
Thanks to Amazon and the previous reviewers for uplifting my bath time to a new level

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Romantic & Rosey
review_text: MMMMMM Roses. Like a bath in a rose garden- and not that cheap perfumey fake rose smell, its a rich, real, natural rose oil smell. It leaves your skin soft and smelling lightly of roses. A wonderful before-bed soak! We slept like babies. I like that it isn't full of unnecessary colors. Mine was crumbling a little when it arrived, but who really cares- it still does the job. There's nothing more perfect for a Valentines evening

product_name: Tisty Tosty Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: for a really relaxing bath
review_text: This is a definately must have for rose lovers, the fragrance isn't overwhelming (but if you do find it to be so, you can just use half of the bomb). One tip for all the flower bits is to put this in a old pantyhose (or a mesh bag type of thing) so you don't have to clean the tub afterwards

product_name: Clinique Moisture Sheer Tints SPF 15: Beauty
title: Good tinted moisturizer
review_text: I have been trying tinted moisturizers and looking for one that suited me since Estee Lauder discontinued their Fresh Air Moisture Tint. I loved that one (in fresh sunlight) as it was just enough to give me a hint of color and worked well with my skin. I have rosacea and experience break outs from many products. I haven't had any problems with the Clinique Sheer Tint (in Neutral) and I am very happy with the lightweight feel of this make-up. As the name implies, this product only gives a sheer tint, it evens out some flaws but does not give nearly as much coverage as most foundations. I like the light coverage as it gives me a more natural look and feel

product_name: Clinique Moisture Sheer Tints SPF 15: Beauty
title: Good looking and SPF too
review_text: This lightweight makeup is almost like wearing nothing.  It evens out skin tone and protects your face from sun damage.  I love it

product_name: Clinique Acne Solutions Night Treatment Gel 1.7 oz: Beauty
title: Great Quick Results!!
review_text: Saw slight results the next morning after first use!!!! Love this product!!!

product_name: Hugo Boss Hugo: Beauty
title: A scent you can use your whole life.
review_text: Ever since I was a kid I've been using my dad's Hugo cologne. This cologne has a scent that doesn't get old. I should also mention that I own lots of colognes and this is still my favorite. Like the other reviewer said I don't think the amazon description really describes this cologne. You should just go out and try it out. Hugo boss has also came out with other colognes which I've been dissapointed about. Some are good but they can't ever beat the original hugo. Take my advice and buy Hugo

product_name: Hugo Boss Hugo: Beauty
title: Who's The Boss?  Tony Danza...Er, I mean Hugo
review_text:
I have been mostly a Calvin Klein cologne supporter the last few years but a few months ago I gave Hugo a try.  I gotta say that I really dig it.  I don't know about it being the scent of "northern air, deep rich forests, and surf crashing against a rugged coastline", but it smells good.  And the old lady likes it.  Not to sound gay but the scent is light, not heavy like CK's Obsession, and it hangs around for a good while unlike alot of the lighter colognes that seem to disappear after a few hours.  

If you haven't tried it, you should.  You'll like it and so will the old ball and chain

product_name: Laura Mercier Metallic Creme Eye Colour: Beauty
title: Like this product alot!
review_text: I was always a powder eye shadow user until I got a sample of this.  It  is easy to use, has great staying power and I really love the shimmer of the color.

product_name: Laura Mercier Metallic Creme Eye Colour: Beauty
title: Simply the Best
review_text: Laura Mercier's Metallic Creme Eye Colour is the best eye shadow I had ever worn. I have it in Gold and will soon purchase another Gold and the Barnished Cooper. I wear this eye color every day because it lasts through out the day, no need to re-apply and no creases (which is a plus). Don't let the size or price of the tube discourage you from purchasing this product. This product should last a good six or more months depending on how much you use and you don't need to use a lot because this stuff is highly pigmented (love that). I don't regret buying it at all, it's the best creme eye shadow out there

product_name: Laura Mercier Metallic Creme Eye Colour: Beauty
title: love it, love it
review_text: I bought gold and alloy. It's creamy and glides on like silk and the colors are fantastic. It's also something that's great for moms because you apply it with your fingertips for some quick color- it's fast and easy.

product_name: Olivella Virgin Olive Oil Liquid Face & Body Soap: Beauty
title: Great Cleanser--it lasts forever!
review_text:
Just a little pump of this stuff each day keeps your skin nice and clean, but not too dry. I have sensitive skin that tends to get oily--Olivella has been great. So many products overdry, not this stuff. I highly recommend it. 

By the way, my husband uses it too. We've had our bottle for 8 or 9 months--a little goes a long way, so it's pretty economical. Smells pleasant, too

product_name: Mustela Stretch Marks Double Action: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: I was a skeptic and not a mother, but was still told that this cream is meant for anybody with stretch marks. So I had to try this stuff out. I was so amazed that this stuff started working in a few days. When I noticed such quick fading of the stretch markes around my stomach and my shoulder joints I was impressed I could actually see normal skin, I was thrilled and have told everybody I know about this stuff. This stuff is also good for dry skin and sunburns, I had to test out the possibilities and the stuff works like magic. I don't know how they formulated this stuff but after all these years somebody finally got it right

product_name: JUST ME For Women By PARIS HILTON eau de parfum: Beauty: Paris Hilton
title: Wonderful,intriguing, European-type fragrances!
review_text: As a rule,I never buy fragrances named after women but for Paris Hilton I make an exception - I LOVE her fragrances! They have persistent high topnotes and are long lasting. I also bought both her Colognes for Men for my husband and he loves them too! In fact he goes through his faster than I go through mine. These fragrances also make great gifts.

product_name: Clinique All About Eyes: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text: I love this stuff, I'm in my twenties and use it as a moisturizer before applying makeup and at night. It instantly makes my under-eye skin whiter and brighter and so soft. I recommend it to anyone

product_name: Hugo Boss In Motion: Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: My boyfriend wears this cologne and I love it.  It's not too overpowering and he still smells great at the end of the day.  It has a slight vanilla scent that is not sweet but I think it's what makes the cologne "warm".  Rumor has it this scent may be discontinued, which will make us both unhappy...... I'm stocking up for him now, just in case

product_name: Hugo Boss In Motion: Beauty
title: A must have!
review_text: Hugo Boss in Motion is definitely one of the secrets of many modern men. The fragrance is alluring and seductive. It is long lasting and easily recognized by above average women. If you want to get noticed especially among women you will want to get this one

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns body souffle: Beauty
title: fabulous smell
review_text: I really like this product and the only thing keeping me from marking it 5 stars is the fact that it makes my skin feel sticky for a while after I put it on.  The smell stays around for a long while which is great!  I reccomend this product if you like the smell of cinnamon, it's so homey and comforting!  :)

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns body souffle: Beauty
title: Philosophy Cinnamon Buns Body Souffle
review_text: It is a very light lotion. It is not greasy or oily. It really moisturizes your skin. It smells heavenly

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns body souffle: Beauty
title: Delightful scent, but not for those with sensitive skin . . .
review_text:
Instead of indulging in one of those fabulously aromatic concoctions of sugar, cinnamon, flour and white frosting hawked in every airport food court in the country, buy yourself a jar of this whipped body soufflÃ© that accurately mimics the irresistibility of the smell without the worry of all those extra calories or the concern that your friends may think that too much overtime has been accrued rolling out dough at the bakery.

This light emulsion goes on smooth, sinks into the skin within seconds, leaves none of the stickiness attributed to the real deal and converts into an actual perfume with cinnamon notes. Rather than doling out an overdose of cinnamon bun hot from the oven, the initial scent morphs to something light but lingering -- not cloying---you will be soft and feel as delicious and delectable as you smell. 

As I am tempted to apply it more than once a day, my only complaint may be that the jar is too small and will not last as long as I would like.

Nevertheless, Philosophy has come up with a calorie free treat that allows you to have your cake without eating it. 

Recommended to all those who like a fresh light scent that generates a warm feeling of yum.  Not recommended to those who may have extremely sensitive skin as one user that I know complained of a slight rash that appeared after using it on the skin under her arms

product_name: Laura Geller Eyebrow Tint & Tamer: Beauty
title: Best kept secret in makeup!
review_text: Great eyebrows ALONE can change your entire look. They are to your eyes what a great frame is to a Rembrant and THIS product by Laura Geller is the ULTIMATE in eyebrow perfection; a mascara for your brows that grooms, lifts, tames, colors, and--with it's marvelous tiny fibers embedded in the tint--fills in sparse, thin or thinning brows in as little time as it takes to do your lashes. I've often seen people mistaken for having their hair done or losing weight or some other major aesthetic improvement when all they did was have their eyebrows groomed--it's THAT important. THIS product replaces all the brow pencils, powders and brushes of the past and it's all you'll ever need to get those elegant, sophisticated, perfect brows seen on the glamorous actresses of the 40's and 50's films. It may take a few patient practice applications but anyone can become a expert with this product. After you've filled in and colored your brows with the color right for you, use the clear end to brush in a perfect all day hold. I recommend using a magnifying mirror while you're applying for a flawless application. As long as this product is around, I'll never be without it again

product_name: Recon Hair Treatment by LUSH: Beauty
title: Deeply Healing Scalp Treatment
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
If you have any issues with hair loss or dry scalp issues, this will heal and soothe the scalp and possibly nourish the hair at the roots (I find this to be true with essential oils). 

This is the product to reach for in the dryness of winter when you are looking for just about anything to calm your scalp and keep in the moisture. The surprising aspect of this conditioning product is how deeply cleansed and nourished your scalp will feel. It also deeply moisturizes your hair like a conditioning treatment. 

One thing about this product is that it is super rich and it may take as many as four shampoos to get this out of your hair. I'd suggest trying this at night in the bath, washing it out twice and then putting your hair up for the night. That way, you don't have to worry about it until the next time you wash your hair the following day. I think of this as a sort of overnight treatment, even though I wash it out right after using it. 

This can be used as a preventative treatment once a week. Almond oil, nettle extract, rosemary, beeswax, papaya, menthol, peppermint, lavender, rose, juniper, salicylic acid make this a winner. I'll be ordering this one again! 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: H2O Plus Bust Firming Treatment Gel: Beauty
title: Good product...yet no results
review_text: atleast not yet. I've been using this product for three days now and it seems very nice I like the feeling and it looks like it would work. However, I have not seen a size increase. I am still waiting though.

product_name: H2O Plus Bust Firming Treatment Gel: Beauty
title: This stuff works (from Joseph Meador's Wife)
review_text: I havent used it that long and everything feels firmer and smoother, even looks rounder. i have used other products and they didnt do what this one does. Definately worth the price

product_name: H2O Plus Bust Firming Treatment Gel: Beauty
title: I like it a lot!
review_text: I think it's one of the best products I have used, and I will keep using it. I like the smell, the feeling, and I think it really works. It make my breast feel firmer and smoother. The price is also reasonable, just love it!

product_name: philosophy cinnamon buns flavored lip shine: Beauty
title: Good Customer Service
review_text: They originally sent me the wrong scent of lip gloss. I called and they said to keep that and they would also send me the correct flavor. It ended up being an even better deal for me

product_name: Vincent Longo Liquid Canvas Dew Finish Foundation SPF 15: Beauty
title: Finally a Foundation I like.
review_text: I have fair skin and have a very hard time finding foundations that are the right the color, it seems like everything is either to dark or to yellow.  After the last two brands I used cancelled my foundation shade I finally broke down and decided I would just have to go with a more expenssive foundation.  I sales clerk at Sephora recomended Vincet Longo to me as the best foundation they carry and I am so glad she did.  I use golden porcelin if I have been in the sun lately and porcelin if I have not.  The coverage is on the sheer side, so it is not heavey or cakey.  Because it is a little bit sheer you could probably wear a shade that is not an exact match and not have that mask look.  Most people can't tell when I am wearing this foundation and when I'm not.  Usually if anyone comments on my skin while I am wearing it it is to complement my skin and ask what cleansers and lotions I have been using. In my oppinion that is the reaction a good foundation should get.  I also love that that it is SPF 15, because as fair as I am my face burns pretty easily.  The dew finish is not shiney like some some dew finishes, just not matte.  Plus it contains ceramide 3, chamomile, vitamins E and C, all of which are supposed to sooth skin, protect it and improve texture.  I was not looking for a water proof foundation, and I have not tried it while swimming so I don't know if it stays on.  I will definatly be buying more Vincent Longo products.  I just hope they don't cancel or change my shades and I have to buy an even more expensive brand of foundation

product_name: Crazylibellule & The Poppies Ananas Imperial: Beauty
title: A Perfume Unlike Any Other
review_text: This unusual fragrance is a mixture of pineapple, citrus, and other scents.  You'll love the fruity smell, which is unlike any other

product_name: Crazylibellule & The Poppies Ananas Imperial: Beauty
title: Wonderful!!!
review_text: This is wonderful!  The scent is like no other.  I am so glad that I decided to experience this fragrance...it reminds me of pineapple, citrus...and other notes.  I can truly say that this has just become my signature scent.  I also purchased the Blue Orchidee which also smells wonderful.  I actually layered both scents and it just heightened my fragrance experience.  What more can I say...Wonderful!!! :-

product_name: Mirenesse Secret Weapon Mascara: Beauty
title: Mirenesse Secret Weapon Masacar Black
review_text: I am in my 50's.  Throughout my life I have used many mascara's and this is the only one that doesn't give the panda eyes with a few hours.  It washes off very easily.  The only problem I have with it and it's a very minor problem is that when I put it on, no matter how careful I am I always blink and it gets on my skin (lower lid).  It also has a tendency to drop a few dust flakes which I need to remove with a q-tip.  It's true you can go swimming in it because it is not waterproof, but for everyday it's the best.

product_name: Mirenesse Secret Weapon Mascara: Beauty
title: This Is The Best Mascara In The World!!
review_text: Throw out any mascara you own and get this one because I guarentee that you will be hooked for life. Nothing and I do mean nothing compares to this product. If it was 50 dollars a tube I would still buy it.

product_name: Calvin Klein Eternity Summer: Beauty
title: Beautiful fresh and light
review_text:
I purchased this fragrance last summer and I as well as alot of other people around me love this fragrance. It smells like a light breezy day at the beach. It is perfect for the daytime and also works well for the evening. 
If you cant stand strong fragrances this might be for you. I am a nurse at a nursing home and this does not bother my older patients at all. As they are sometimes sensitive to strong smells. 
It also last for about 4 or 5 hours which is a good thing for me

product_name: Burt's Bees Carrot Nutritive Night CrÃ¨me: Beauty
title: Good stuff.
review_text: I really like this stuff- it's more concentrated (read: thicker) than the day creme and it has really helped my skin. I also use it on my eye area, and it always makes my eyes feel refreshed

product_name: Sephora Stainless Steel Thinning Shears: Beauty
title: Great tool. I use it all the time.
review_text: I use it probably 3 times a month for trimming my bangs. I like it because it removes length without making a straight edge. Also good for trimming my boyfriend's shaggy hair

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Women 1.0 oz Perfume Spray: Beauty
title: great scent for non-perfume wearers
review_text: The other person who reviewed "Happy" by Clinique is incorrect. There is no musk undertone in this perfume. I know because my body chemistry brings out the musky undertones in any fragrance whatsoever, regardless of if it maybe perfume, body spray, lotions, whatever. Instead this fragrance is light and flowery with citrus undertones. Additionally, the scent lasts all evening. I can put on a light spray at the beginning of the evening, go to a smoky club with a punk rock band, drink, get in a fight, have a roll in the hay and still smell like Happy in the morning!

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Women 1.0 oz Perfume Spray: Beauty
title: Happy makes my man Happy
review_text:
This is the only perfume my fiance really loves to smell, and contrary to another person's review, it lasts longer than many perfumes of the same quality and price.  Its subtle, citrus nuances make it ideal for cuddling and nibbling, especially since it won't overpower or leave any taste residue.  

Delightful

product_name: TOMMY GIRL For Women By TOMMY HILFIGER cologne: Beauty: Tommy Hilfiger
title: it's okay
review_text: I have used Tommy Girl in the past. It is a fresh smelling fragrance that will last through out the day. It is really for a teenager or very young adult

product_name: TOMMY GIRL For Women By TOMMY HILFIGER cologne: Beauty: Tommy Hilfiger
title: Citrusy Floral Goodness!!
review_text: I absolutely love this perfume. Whenever I have it on people always ask me what I am wearing! It has a citrusy floral note to it so it smells crisp and clean. I wear a lot of different perfumes- but I think a bottle of this lasted me over a year (a little goes a long way.

product_name: TOMMY GIRL For Women By TOMMY HILFIGER cologne: Beauty: Tommy Hilfiger
title: Crispy and Sexy!
review_text: I think I smell the citron the most in this scent. At first I thought is was similar to grapefruit and then I got the fine balance of other tones. Beautiful and light scent. Look for a good deal on it though, pricing varies greatly

product_name: Urban Decay Metal Eye Sheen: Beauty
title: Nice and Shiny!
review_text: This product goes on silky smooth and (just like they say) produces a bright metallic sheen on the eyelid.  It's awesome

product_name: Urban Decay Metal Eye Sheen: Beauty
title: THESE EYE COLORS ARE GEMS
review_text:
Bonanza!  Urban Decay has broken the bank - not at Monte Carlo but of makeup with the new Precious Metal Eye Sheens.  They're ultra smooth with a cream to powder formula and stay on and on and on.  A subtle glisten of metallic gives eyes a wide awake look by day and a sexy come hither gleam by night.

	The Eye Sheens come in four different shades which you can either apply simply to the corner of your eyes or smudge all over the lid.  Try "Big Thicket" for an innocent lavender, or "Loaded" for a full throttle jade.  "Platinum" is a sheer sliver of silver, and "Trust Fund" a super sapphire.

	You know what a girl's best friends are,  and these Sheens come in dazzling diamond shaped cubes.  Which is all to say these eye colors are gems.

        - Gail Cook

product_name: Bare Escentuals Park Place Princess ($83 Value): Beauty
title: A sweet look without looking too young
review_text: What's so great about this product is that it allows you to look fresh without trying too hard.  The colors are soft and radiant and the brush is great, very soft and easy on the skin.  I love it

product_name: Bare Escentuals Park Place Princess ($83 Value): Beauty
title: Feel like a Queen
review_text: I just love Park Place Princess kit. It makes you feel like the Queen, not just a Princess!

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Ritual Kit: Beauty
title: Great products!
review_text: Ojon is a great brand for hair.  The main thing you should look out for is use very, very little of the restorative treatment...It is very oily and in turn will make your hair smooth, yes but quite oily looking.  Once you get used to how much you should use for your hair type - you will LOVE the product!  Take a chance, if you want smooth, silky hair

product_name: Vera Wang For Men: Beauty
title: Takes My Breath Away
review_text: This is by far the best-smelling cologne i've ever purchased. Vera Wang shut alot of competition with this one because unlike many fragrances on the market today, Vera Wang for Men offers a sweet, minty, long-lasting scent that is very distinct and wearable by men of all ages. I recommend this fragrance mostly for evenings, but i'm sure any man today who cares anything about how he smells can pull it off during the day. It starts off with a thin stream of mint and amber and finishes with a touch of pine and soft julip. Great fragrance and my personal favorite, it'll leave you breathless

product_name: Vera Wang For Men: Beauty
title: What an incredible scent!
review_text: This fragrance has something about it that seems very addicting to wear.  It is for a distingusied and sophisticated person.  I love to wear this one when taking the wife out to eat or enjoying the evening with her.  She loves the scent on me as it last for several hours. This fine fragrance contains Green Mandarin Leaf, Yuzu, Nutmeg, Viantge Leather, Anise, Sandalwood, Tobacco.  I highly recommend this one to the distinguished man.  This one is definately a hidden treasure and when your done with the bottle I'm sure you'll hurry to get another one, like I will

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Touche Eclat is EXCELLENT!
review_text: I am 51 and recently visited an upscale retail store in Manhattan.  The Yves St Laurent gal behind the cosmetic counter noticed my complexion was a little sallow - put this product about an inch on each side of my nose and blended it in..what a difference it made...a worthwhile investment..I use it under my eyes and just about all over my face for a nice touch-up, concealer and brightener..covers freckles and sun spots, too

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Touche Eclat
review_text: Awesome product - best concealer I've ever used.  It is lightweight and does not settle into the under eye "creases" that my almost 50-year-old eyes have.  The pink undertone brightens and lightens.

product_name: Philosophy Waffle Cone: Beauty
title: love it!!!!
review_text: Love the scent, lathers great.  Takes alot to make a bubble bath, but great for everything else and the scent last along time.  My daughter is in love with it.  Makes hair smell wonderful

product_name: Philosophy Waffle Cone: Beauty
title: Oh My YUM!!!!!!!
review_text: This is the BEST shampoo/body wash I have ever smelled!  I can't wait to shower - just to use this product.  I am very picky about hair products -  and this is an A++++ product. It worked well on my thick corse hair and was creamy as a body wash. The only thing missing is conditioner and lotion for after the shower!  I do like the cin buns - but this is sooooo much better!!!!!!  You MUST try this product

product_name: Calvin Klein Eternity For Men: Beauty
title: Joe S
review_text: Nice cologne for those who don't like the heavy musk scents. Not overpowering. Many compliments from the ladies. Buy it..

product_name: Bourjois Multi Shimmer Loose Eye Shadow: Beauty
title: Love this stuff
review_text: This is the cutest packaged eyeshadow on the market.  The brush sits down in the shadow for the perfect amount of powder gets on it.  If you don't get much shadow on the tip, just shake the bottle a little and the brush fills up with more for a more dramatic effect.  Unlike with other loose eyeshadow powders that you have to use your own brush with, this doesn't get too much on the brush or your eyelid and it's easy to layer.  It has a fantastic shimmer to it and each color looks good on my skin color (which is REALLY RARE with most cosmetics)  I can't tell you how much I love this stuff!  So go ahead and buy it, and don't forget to shake the bottle with the cap on and brush in each time you apply so that the powder re-dispursts in the bottle.  :

product_name: Clinique Total Turnaround Visible Skin Renewer Cream: Beauty
title: Love, love, love...
review_text: Does my subject line say it all?  I use this product before I use Clinique's Dramatically Different Face Lotion in the morning and it works beautifully.  I can notice a difference in my skin immediately - it looks brighter and smoother.  A definate recommend

product_name: Clinique Total Turnaround Visible Skin Renewer Cream: Beauty
title: can't believe it works
review_text: I'm always skeptical of "age defying" products, but this one really works.  I've been using it since it first came out (maybe 10 years?) and people often think I'm younger than I am (27).  I'm not really using it for that though - I use it because it is unreal how good it is with acne.  It prevents breakouts and also heals current pimples SO fast.  When I run out, the breakouts are back

product_name: Clinique Total Turnaround Visible Skin Renewer Cream: Beauty
title: A wonderful product!
review_text: It is a little pricey but so worth it to me! I had a ruddy and uneven skin tone on my face and this has worked wonders for me. I love this product! It really does what it says!

product_name: Fresh Supernova Mascara: Beauty
title: One of the best
review_text: I have been on a hunt for years to find the best mascara out there! This is definatly on the top of my list. I recommend this product its great and long lasting, but the only thing I didn't like about it was that at the end of the day it started flaking a little bit. Other than that its one of the best mascaras on the market

product_name: Clinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup 04 Matte Honey: Beauty
title: i ordered the wrong one
review_text: when i ordered i didnt read the word double...so when i got it n put it on it was pretty thick and i was like whooa..but its good stuff just heavy for me so im ordering a regular one now

product_name: Laura Mercier Eye Basics: Beauty
title: LOVE this! SO creamy, best primer
review_text: I got this because I have really dry eyes and lids, and I now use it as a daily primer. It's soo creamy, there's no dryness to it at all.

product_name: Laura Mercier Eye Basics: Beauty
title: Incredible!
review_text: I discovered this wonder in UK three years ago and can't live without it. My eye makeup lasts all day as if it has just been applied. You can wear it alone for a natural, clean look

product_name: Clinique Perfectly Real Compact Makeup: Beauty
title: better than mineral powders
review_text:
For the past several years, I've been using mineral powders on my sensitive, acne-prone face instead of liquid makeup. I liked some better than others, but then I tried this powder from Clinique. It's fantastic! Seems more natural than any other makeup I've tried, and it can go from extremely sheer to as much coverage as you could possible want, by just adding more.

I love it

product_name: Clinique Perfectly Real Compact Makeup: Beauty
title: Love Love Love this!!
review_text: I agree with everyone!! It feels as if you're not wearing any make-up. Also it is the best powder/foundation for everyday use. I hate wearing foundation since it almost always feels that I am wearing a mask. But this is the total opposite. Also make sure you get the right shade. I recommend trying 2-3 of their shades to see which one suits you. This is a definitely a MUST HAVE

product_name: Clinique Perfectly Real Compact Makeup: Beauty
title: THE BEST COMPACT MAKEUP!!!
review_text: This new compact base by Clinique is THE BEST face makeup - liquid or powder - I've EVER tried.  And believe me - I've tried bazillions of them (even pricier brands)!  It covers amazingly well.  My face tends toward redness, so I got a yellow based shade (104) and it evens out my skin perfectly while covering all redness.  It goes on like an ever-so-slightly creamy powder and is SUPER EASY to apply with no goofs.  It manages NOT to look powdery on, although basically matte in nature.  It mimics perfect skin.  I went out with friends last night with this stuff on and they kept complimenting my skin!  I told them it was this makeup and they were surprised I had makeup on at all.  Kudos to Clinique for coming up with wearable, PERFECT skin!  A dream come true!  Comes in a pretty (although not particularly cute or memorable,) nice quality compact with separate sponge compartment and a good quality sponge

product_name: Clinique Perfectly Real Compact Makeup: Beauty
title: find the perfect match
review_text:
I've tried a lot of compacts to find that combination of coverage yet natural looking.  Before Clinique's Perfectly Real Compact, I used Bare Minerals.  In order to get the coverage I wanted, it took a long time and after couple applications with the brush my skin started to dry out and saw little bits of flake.  
With the Clinique compact, it's quick and totally natural looking with great coverage.  I use the sponge in the areas where I need a little bit more coverage and then use a brush for the rest of my face.  It's really great.  My face doesnt look like makeup is caked on.  
But WARNING; if you DO NOT know your color, I recommend going to a couple different department stores and getting consultations about the perfect color for your skin.  When I went to find the color of my compact, I got recommendations ranging from 104 to 116. Some workers really don't know what they're talking about. I ended up buying 106 and this one worker recommended 116, which is a HUGE difference. Really try to find the perfect color because your skin will look more natural and money and time wouldn't be wasted

product_name: Clinique Perfectly Real Compact Makeup: Beauty
title: Perfectly Fabulous Real Compact Make-up
review_text: Since Marshall Fields had a gift with purchase for Clinique, I ran right out and got this today. I was able to find my exact skin color match in shade 114(N). My skin is fair with yellow undertones. This went on smoothly and silkly with no powder streaks/marks as I seem to get with other powder foundations. This foundation has no smell and I feel like I have nothing on my face. I think they have a winner here with this foundation!

product_name: philosophy lavender pound cake shampoo, body wash, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: PHILOSOPHY 3-1 SHAMPOO,BODY WASH AND BUBBLE BATH
review_text: ALL OF THE PHILOSOPHY BODY WASHES ARE GREAT....AND THEY SMELL EVEN BETTER.  IF YOUR LOOKING FOR SOMETHING TO WAKE YOU UP IN THE MORNING, THIS IS THE PRODUCT FOR YOU.

product_name: Karma Natural Dusting Powders by LUSH: Beauty
title: I Looooove the Karma scent!
review_text: Karma smells just like a head shop to me. You have to decide for yourself if that floats your boat or not. The powder smells even more delicious than the perfume. My only problem with it is the texture. It's slightly gritty. I wish they would fix that. It may sound strange, but also, if you use the powder in white undies, it will color them orange..

product_name: Karma Natural Dusting Powders by LUSH: Beauty
title: I love this stuff
review_text: I love Karma. It's one of my favorite scents. I smell more orange and gardenia than I do patchouli, though. It's a very sweet, vibrant scent, without being too sweet and candy-like. I have had no problems with it being gritty or anything like that. I use a powder puff I bought for it, so there have been no problems applying it. I just love this stuff, and it goes further for the money than the soap does, too

product_name: Sephora Complexion Extractor with Lance: Beauty
title: No more nail marks!
review_text: This is a great tool for getting out those annoying balckheads, white heads or zits!! And the best part is it doesn't hurt or leave any nail marks

product_name: Sephora Complexion Extractor with Lance: Beauty
title: Excellent Tool for any Complexion
review_text: Highly recommend this extractor.  Works great and has been a lifesaver for my teenager.  It has made a virtually instantaneuos improvement. The lance end is VERY sharp and is rarely used. If you have blackheads, you should have a tool like this

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Chemistry
review_text: I wear the scent all the time and people compliment me on it. To the lady who stated that the scent is faint and she has to scramble for another perfume, maybe it the scent just doesn't mesh well with her.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Nice!
review_text: It's not interesting enough that it would be my signature fragrance, but it's great for casual, everyday wear. The scent is light, flirty, but never overpowering. I REALLY recommend the body lotion. It makes my skin so soft and leaves a subtle glittery shimmer that lasts all day

product_name: Kerastase Nutritive Bain Elasto-Curl Shampoo - 8.4 oz.: Beauty
title: great product
review_text: kerastase always on top with har treatment. this shampoo smell amazing and leave your hair soft, full of bounce and vitality. My favorite brand in hair care ever

product_name: L'Occitane - Lavender - Eau de la Recolte Bleue: Beauty
title: l'occitane lavender-eaude la recolte bleue
review_text:
THIS IS A BEAUTIFUL SCENT! I PUT SOME OF THIS ON AND WENT OUT. I RECEIVED ONE COMPLIMENT AFTER ANOTHER.
VERY SOFT AND FEMININE. SOOTHING TOO. GREAT FOR SPRING AND SUMMER

product_name: Philosophy Shear Splendor Restorative Smoothing Serum 2oz: Beauty
title: outstanding
review_text:
This is the best hair care product for naturally curly hair...I was so bummed when the company discontinued "curly head"...I have spent thousands(LITERALLY) on hair care stylers,conditioners, etc...it leave curls defined, hair frizz fear, smells great and it is so light! I do not even use conditioner or any other styling product when I use this...just shampoo and a few drops(I comb through) and air dry....hear it is great on straight hair too

personally my hair is curly super thick and always ends up dry or undefined or fluffy or frizzy or hard stiff and sticky from products and never gets defined with other serums...but not this one! I know it is expensive and wish the amount was bigger but it is worth its weight!!!

product_name: Murad Age Spot & Pigment Lightening Gel: Beauty
title: Going going gone!
review_text: My freckles and sun spots are fading with the use of this Lightening gel.  I am amazed (and thrilled!)I didn't think it was possible.  Thanks, Murad!!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: THE BEST!!
review_text: This is truly the best in highlighting products and I have tried many high end and cheaper products out there.  This is so light and just doesn't get all cakey and greasy.  I have tried so many brands that claim to look natural, but they just don't.  This really does and don't let the price fool you either.  It only takes alittle and lasts a long time, so well worth the price for the look it gives.  I love this!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: !! Loooove This Product !!
review_text: I've been using Touche Eclat ever since it came out. I still love it. Cannot believe how rested I look after I put this on. My dark circles are minimized & I look radiant. Till now, no other concealer can beat YSL's Touche Eclat. Can't live without this product!

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Fabulous item
review_text: Well worth the money, and considered on the the most timeless and staple classics for your makeup bag

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Touche Eclat is EXCELLENT!
review_text: I am 51 and recently visited an upscale retail store in Manhattan.  The Yves St Laurent gal behind the cosmetic counter noticed my complexion was a little sallow - put this product about an inch on each side of my nose and blended it in..what a difference it made...a worthwhile investment..I use it under my eyes and just about all over my face for a nice touch-up, concealer and brightener..covers freckles and sun spots, too

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Touche Eclat
review_text: Awesome product - best concealer I've ever used.  It is lightweight and does not settle into the under eye "creases" that my almost 50-year-old eyes have.  The pink undertone brightens and lightens.

product_name: Klein-Becker StriVectin-SD® Eye Cream: Beauty
title: 10 Years Younger
review_text: I have been using StriVectin Eye Cream for a year and a half, and I absolutely love it. The fine lines and wrinkles around my eyes are noticeably diminished, as is a small chicken pox scar under one eye that I've had since childhood. I'm a lifelong user

product_name: Klein-Becker StriVectin-SD® Eye Cream: Beauty
title: A great companion to the original StriVectin-SD
review_text: I couldn't disagree more with the previous revue.  I've been using the original StriVectin-SD for almost a year and have been very pleased with the results.  No, all my lines did not disappear but they have gotten noticably reduced as evidenced by the comments I've gotten from friends and coworkers.  My only problem with the original formula was that it irritated my eyes.  I was very pleased to discover that StriVectin had already come out with an eye cream to combat this very problem.  It is exactly the same as the original formula except it does not contain the mint extract as that is what was causing people to have adverse reactions around the eye area.  So now I start with the StriVectin-SD Eye Cream around my eyes and crowsfeet then I apply original Strivectin-SD to the rest of my face and I'm set.  No more eye irritation and my skin looks great

product_name: H2O Plus Night Oasis® Oxygenating Rejuvenator: Beauty
title: This stuff works!
review_text: This night time moisturizer is non-greasy and absorbs readily.  My skin looks better and moister right away

product_name: Himalaya by Creed 4.0 oz Millesime Spray: Beauty
title: Himalaya is Simply Divine!! A Classic!
review_text:
A short history!! The House of Creed is one of the oldest perfume manufacturers in the world and was founded in 1760 by James Henry Creed. The House of Creed quickly became a favorite among the English Court and Queen Victoria appointed the House of Creed the official perfume supplier. The House of Creed also became popular with other royals too!

Alright, so Himalya was created for men. I'm a woman and have  fallen in love with this classic scent and enjoy wearing it myself. Himalaya is one of my personal favorites made by the House of Creed (however I'm pretty partial too all the scents created for both men & women by the House of Creed). 

According to the descriptions I've found, Himalaya is a blend of mandarin, grapefruit, sandalwood, cedarwood, amber, pepper and tonka musk. I feel Himalaya has a rich, smooth, classic scent that will never go out of style. This fragrance is concentrated, so a little goes a long way and the scent lasts a long time without having to be re-applied. I have received plenty of compliments on this fragrance when I've worn it

product_name: philosophy strawberry milkshake body souffle: Beauty
title: one of My "boys" bought this for Me and...
reviewer: Goddess Electra "submissive's visit My amazon wish list like good little boys...  http://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/EI7F946F5PJ7"
review_text:
Well I love the scent, and it makes the skin soft, reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I wish the scent was a bit stronger to where I could smell it without putting My nose to the skin.  I will buy it again, just wish they'd make the scent more appearent.


Goddess Electr

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Bare Brilliance Lipstick: Beauty
title: 5/5 Bronze Star
review_text: After looking and looking for the perfect brown lipstick that wasn't red or too dark I tried this and bought it on the spot. This is the best color if you're looking for a shimmer and just enough color. This lipstick isn't sticky, dry or cakey

product_name: Lacoste Touch Of Pink: Beauty
title: great!
review_text: I love this fragrance, its such a romantic scent, and it smells different on everyone!  I highly recommend it

product_name: Nioxin Smoothing Reflectives Silk Elixir 5.1 oz: Beauty
title: Best Leave-In Conditioner
review_text: The Silk Elixir is a great leave-in conditioner.  It does not weigh down my curls or leave any kind of residue.  It has UV protection, which is a bonus.  It makes my hair soft and my curls smooth.  It is a little expensive, but a little bit of product goes a long way

product_name: Hard Candy Lip Gloss Ring: Beauty
title: Adorable!
review_text:
I really like the Hard Candy Lip Gloss Ring! 

Fist off, the cute packaging makes it both fun and easy to wear (I like clunky things like that). The ring fits my finger, which is about a size 6.5/7 or so.

Secondly, the actual gloss is pretty good. However, that's also the reason why I only gave it four stars. The gloss doesn't last that long, and certainly doesn't taste that good. It isn't extremely shiny, however it is pretty moisturizing.

All in all, I recomend this as a cute gift topper or stocking stuffer for anyone who wears lip gloss or cute rings like this. I personally think it's worth it just for the container, but the actual gloss is nothing to write home about

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: A converted skeptic!
review_text: I wasn't sure how I would fare with this product, but I am so glad I tried it! Here's a tip: I used first aid tape (the fabric kind, not the kind with really sticky adhesive) and I taped the stencil onto my brow. It took a little maneuvering to position the stencil at just the right place, but I taped the stencil down and brushed the powder on. Then I did the other eye. I  recommend using the stencils on both sides first and then doing the plucking, because I tried plucking right after removing the stencil on the first side, and I actually overplucked a tiny bit. (I was able to mask the almost indetectable difference in the two sides this morning when I put my makeup on by using just a teeny bit of the brown powder and the wax...I live in Texas and even in the humidity the powder stayed put and did not smudge!) Overall, this is not a snap to use, but definitely worth the effort, and I even got compliments on my brows from my coworkers who thought I had had them done professionally. I bought this kit for the price of having my brows waxed twice at a salon. I am very happy with the purchase and would highly recommend it

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: pleasantly pleased!
review_text: After spending a good hour playing with Anastasia's eyebrow colors at Sephora, I decided to give it a go and bought the Brunette ex-press kit. The colors are a bit dark for my golden, med brown hair, but if you go lightly, it looks better. I had bought her tweezers a month before and could not stop raving about how great there were compared to my tweezermans. So, her signature eyebrows color had to be just as good or at least almost as good as the real thing (Anastasia, herself). The Stencils were intimidating at first, I had to take a deep breath before plucking the hair outside the stencil outline. But once I was done, my eyebrows looked great! Like a mini-eyebrow lift; couldn't believe how much removing hairs from my already sparse eyebrows, could look better. Worth the buy

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Great Product!
review_text:
After months of wanting, I finally ordered it.  I am brunette, but ordered the blonde coloring as I have very fair skin and light eyes.  Glad I did!  The darker of the blonde colors was perfect, any darker and it would have looked fake.  It's a little awkward using the stencils, but I managed fine.  Try them all out- the first three were never going to work on me, the last one I tried was a near perfect fit.  

I love the finished look- I didn't have a lot to pluck, but now my eyebrows look much neater.  My hair grayed very early in life, and now my stupid brows have gray and white hairs running through them- the powder covers that up nicely.  I didn't realize how aging my brows were to my face till I used this!

My only gripe is there is very little information with the kit- just minimal instructions on the back of the small box.  The website had a little more detail, and a few photos.  I could find no help with color choice- for the high price, I would hate to goof and get the wrong coloring for my skin type.  I am glad I went with the blonde

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Good kit for bushy brows
review_text: I saw her on Oprah and immediately wanted this kit for my unruly, thick brows. I have always struggled to maintain a nice arched shape and always mess up the plucking of my brows. It is a bit difficult to use the plastic shapers by myself, but they have helped me a lot to see the correct shape to pluck. The shading powder is really helpful for shaping too. It's a sleek little compact kit and has helped me with at home maintenance

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Brow kit
review_text: This product is good. The only problem is that the eyebrow tint looks kind of weird on the part where you don't have eyebrows. I only use it when I am putting on a lot of makeup, otherwise it looks kind of fake for everyday use. The coloring is really good for blondes

product_name: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: Best Pressed powder I have ever used
review_text: I wear Stay Neutral and have been using this product for years.  Doesn't clog pors and it looks flawless.  This is a really great product and work the $18.00

product_name: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: everything clinique is usually good stuff
review_text: i like clinique a lot i needed powder so i got it, in beige..i also like the double pressed powder for even more coverage..fast shippin

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: Seattle Jan
review_text: I, too, was an unbeliever.  After 29 years of Erno Laszlo products for my oily skin, my complexion is quite good. I haven't even tried a moisturizer of any kind for over 20 years.  Creme de la Mer is a revelation. It's not too heavy or oily for my skin, it heals OVERNIGHT those pesky little "bumps" that still pop up from time to time, and I love how it makes my face look! People guessed my age 10 years less before I used this product, now . . . they will never believe the truth

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: Will always be the best
review_text: Ive tried all the supposed best of the moment,breakthrough skin care,anti-aging,anti-wrinkle products in the past 5 yrs,and I just keep going back to La Mer.I use other products for at least six months to reap their full benefits,and honestly,my skin looks its most radiant and best when Im back with La Mer.I just stopped trying out other products now since its only La Mer that brings the best results.My skin always looks radiant and dewey.In terms of wrinkle improvement,there will only be a cosmetic change due to the fact that your skin will look moist,which lessens the appearance of lines.Lines are pronounced when skin is dry,thus all moisturizers work on keeping the skin moist which gives you the illusion of less lines.But this product is truly the best among all!!!Nothing else

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: Cheaper than dinner for two!
review_text: Yes, it is about $100 for an ounce, but that should last you a few months... and this stuff really is amazing. I find it so funny that so many reviews obsess about how expensive this is. Yes, it cost more than a lot of creams, but $100 every few months for glowing skin is NOT much in my book. No one complains when people spend that much on their hair, and dinner with wine at a good restaurant is more expensive! I think my face is worth it. Be sure to use the spatula, and warm it between your fingers prior to application

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: Amazing- for any skin type.
reviewer_location: Where the Girls are Pretty, US
review_text: I was the kid who had horrible acne as a teenager and mild scarring as an adult. My hormones went wild after my daughter was born and this stuff was a miracle!  The texture of my skin is perfect. I have people constantly say how gorgeous my skin is- then I have to confess that it's completely the La Mer. WELL worth the money- the 1 oz lasts about four months so really you're not paying anymore than you would for Clinique etc that doesn't get the job done. Invest in La Mer, give it a few months, and you'll have amazing skin

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: essential
review_text: I've tried them all, and this one is the best.  Been using it for four years now.  I am a 37 year old guy and I pass for 30 all the time.  I am surprised to say this crap really does work!

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: Great!
review_text: I used this cream on a small scarred area around my wrists. I have had prescriptions of cortisone for this leison and nothing has really helped. It has healed up beautifully.  I am very happy with the product.  This particular size was more affordable for me.I am a strong endorser of this product

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Ciment Anti-Usure Fortifying Treatment for Damaged Lengths and Ends- 6.8 oz.: Beauty
title: My husband loves it
review_text: I have very fine, thin hair; my favorite Kerastase conditior is the volumactive for fine hair but this one is nice also and my husband loves it. The entire 'green' line is great for fine hair

product_name: H2O Plus Sea Salt Spa Gift Basket: Beauty
title: Great Gift
review_text: I sent this as a birthday gift to my sister in law.  She was totally impressed and thought the products were totally decodent (sp?)

product_name: StriVectin-SD "Better Than Botox?" by Klein Becker Intensive Concentrate for Existing Stretch Marks 95.15 ml 2 oz.: Beauty
title: This is good, but Derma Step is still the best!
review_text: I had tried all kinds of skin care systems, with different levels of success, but in the end, the Derma Step system works the best, with long lasting results. You can get a free trial and see for yourself here:   awesomestufffree.com/dermaste

product_name: StriVectin-SD "Better Than Botox?" by Klein Becker Intensive Concentrate for Existing Stretch Marks 95.15 ml 2 oz.: Beauty
title: it is necesarry for all women
review_text: perfec

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Bain Volumactive Shampoo Volumizing - 8.5 oz.: Beauty
title: None better
review_text: There is NO better shampoo that I've tried for adding volume than Kerastase Resistance. It also strengthens baby-fine hair. You will have amazing volume but it won't dry your hair. This is without a doubt the best volumizing shampoo of any I have ever tried

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Bain Volumactive Shampoo Volumizing - 8.5 oz.: Beauty
title: Top Notch for Volume
review_text: So many volumizing shampoos just leave fine hair limp; this manages to both soften hair and give it fullness at the same time.  I'm not a fan of spending this much on a product but when something works so well, it's worth coming back to.  It doesn't take much to get great cleaning; the volume and shine are wonderful.  Well worth the price!

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Great stuff
review_text: My daughters and I have naturally curly hair and this stuff is a life saver. It gives shine, and hold without stiffness. It creates very soft looking curls. The only thing is a little goes a long way. It can give a greasy appearance if you put too much, or put it to close to your scalp. We usually go down about an inch from our roots. It also leaves your hair touchable without that gross grimy feeling on your hands.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: One of my favorites
review_text: I've tried a lot of hair products to tame my very huge and very thick, natural afro, and CD's Mimosa Hair Honey is one of my favorites. I use it as a sheen for my natural curls as well as to balance my dry scalp. It's a little thick, but if you have very course & dry hair, then this product is definitely what you need.

product_name: Philosophy Falling in Love Duo: Beauty
title: Oh My!
reviewer: Melody X "star of . . . 'New SexNow'  DVD... and the book '9 Free Secrets...' ... consultant to 'Goddess Worship' DVD"
review_text:
This Falling In Love scent is unmistakably sexy.  
As soon as a I got out of the shower, my guy was
all over me.  Be careful what you wish for: this
stuff turned him into a wild animal.  Meooooow

product_name: Nioxin System 7 Scalp Therapy: Beauty
title: Stop the itch after a professional color
review_text:
If you're like me and your scalp itches like crazy after you get your color done, Nioxin System Scalp Therapy is the answer. (The numbers only represent the type of hair you have, use a lower number if your hair is more fine.)

Use this once or two times after color, and the scalp itch goes away. 

The product claims to help thinning hair. I have no issue with that, and I think I found an "off-market" use for the product, but it works for me so I'll take it

product_name: Lancome Bi-Facil Non-Oily Instant Cleanser Sensitive Eyes 125ml/4.2oz: Beauty
title: Great for sensative skin!
review_text: I've been using this product for over 2 years now.  Non-greasy formula and does not burn if you get it in your eyes.  A little goes a long way.  No scrubbing needed.  Great product for the money.

product_name: Rene Furterer Complexe 5 (1.7 oz. Bottle): Beauty
title: Terrific Product!
review_text: I have always had thin hair. Which became worse with the temporary use of some antibiotics. After using this product a year ago I decided to try again. This product is fantastic!My hair and scalp has once again been restored in better shape than prior to use. It is worth every single penny (shipping not included

product_name: Rene Furterer Complexe 5 (1.7 oz. Bottle): Beauty
title: Great for after coloring!
review_text: I use this the first day or two after getting my hair colored, as my scalp is always irritated from the color.  It calms my scalp down and immediately feels better, plus it makes my hair look great from the oils!  I like the scent and couldn't do without this for my hair

product_name: Bourjois Le Petite Black Dress Eye-sentials ($50 Value): Beauty
title: AMAZING
review_text: i don't know much about makeup.  i'm a no-fuss girl but this makes it so easy to get great results.  and the mascara wand is unlike any i've ever used.  you won't be disappointed

product_name: Bobbi Brown Eye Shadow: Beauty
title: Nice Eye Shadow
review_text: Nice eyeshadow that works as an eyeliner. I don't use it much but when I do it lasts and looks great

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Not bad...love the smell!
review_text: I usually use the "New! (hair)" shampoo bar but decided to try this one during a recent online shopping spree on Lush's site.  I LOVE the smell, the scent seems to linger in my hair all day whereas the "New!" shampoo bar doesn't so much and my hair did seem a bit more manageable and soft after use that what it is normally so I would most definitely recommend it!  I will likely stick with my "New!" shampoo primarily but will order this again in the future for sure

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Fresh! My favorite solid shampoo.
review_text:
If you haven't tried a solid shampoo before, you definitely should! Great for camping, travelling, bringing to the gym, or just using as an everyday shampoo. To cut down on bringing a whole bag full of bath products to the gym, I use this as a shampoo AND soap, and it works wonderfully for both purposes.
