This shampoo leaves my hair FAR less tangled than most shampoos I use, so if you don't often have to use conditioner, you probably won't need it if you use this shampoo! 

The smell, of course, is grand - if you've smelled other karma-scented products from Lush, you'll know this. It's a unisex kind of scent, so I have to fight over it with my husband when we travel. MUCH better than those little bottles of foul-smelling shampoo and bath gel you get at most hotels. The earthy, citrusy smell of lemongrass, orange, lavendar, and pine is a wonderful way to wake up in the morning.

If you go to a Lush store, you can usually get a free tin to store your shampoo bars in if you buy 2 bars

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: SYlvia
review_text: This shampoo is awsome. the lather is great, the smell is wonderful.  Try it. I promise you will like i

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Simply Amazing!
review_text: This is my all time favorite of the LUSH line!  The scent is hard to describe.. and I wasn't too crazy about it when I first bought it, but it has come to be one of my most favorite scents!  I'm hooked!  This is also the only shampoo that the smell stays in your hair ALL day, even after using Conditioner.. It's so light and fresh..  simply amazing.

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Don't be scared by the bar
review_text: This shampoo is amazing.  A rub of the bar over your hands or at the roots of your hair and you have a head of lather.  Far, far better than I expected.  And  someone always comments on the smell of my hair.  Leaves your tresses soft even without a conditioner.  Give it a try; you'll love it

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: My new favorite shampoo
review_text:
I'm a recent convert to Lush products and I have to say I'm thrilled to find this new shampoo. 

I started using this a couple of days ago and I've noticed a positive difference in my hair. My hair wasn't a total mess using silicone shampoos, but now that I've changed brands I can see the potential my hair had and I didn't even know it. 

I have shoulder length really thick hair with a few waves and curls. I don't have too much of a problem with tangling to begin with. All I needed was a couple of swipes down my hair and this will lather right up. It smells awesome in the shower. Lush describes it as oranges in a bowl of spices; I'm not so sure about that but it definately smells kind of foresty and nice. It rinsed off very well with hot water and I followed with Jungle conditioner. 

Hours later in the day I can stil smell Komba shampoo wafting around my head. It's amazing. I've never had a shampoo stick with me like this and my hair feels light and shiny and just clean. No matter how much I try to clean regular shampoo from my hair it seems to weigh it down. My boyfriend mentioned today my hair looked much less "poofy". This is just amazing. 

I would reccomend keeping the shampoo in an airtight container. Keeping it on a shelf where any water will hit it will deteriorate its longevity. I keep mine in a very tiny tupperwear container in the shower. The size of the bar is small, but it will go a loooooong way.

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great Shampoo !
review_text: I am a new convert to LUSH products having stumbled upon them while at the Orlando airport. This is the first solid shampoo I have used and I really like this one. It lathers really nice and smells fantastic! It leaves my hair feeling full and shiny and better than any bottled shampoo I have ever used. My hair feels clean but not stripped and that is important since I color it. I am looking forward to trying the others and a conditioner as well. I am completely impressed with all the LUSH products I have tried and am looking forward to giving LUSH for Christmas

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: FOR A SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy! 

Gail Cook

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Best Gloss on the Market
review_text:
MAC LipGlass is the absolute best. There are plenty of colors to choose from, SUPER-Shiny, and the gloss is thick, stays on and doesn't run. 
The best colors are....
NICO for a cute lavender pink color with a glittery shine. 
OYSTERGIRL is a shimmery baby pink.
OH BABY is the perfect gloss for any earth toned lipstick.
CHAI looks amazing with black smokey eyes. It's the perfect neutral earthy gloss and has no glitter or shimmer - just pure shine

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Vanilla scent not so bad!
reviewer: Lindsey Justice "MAC addict, and reader of many things"
review_text: I'm REALLY anal about scented/flavored lipglosses- especially ones scented or flavored with vanilla, but MAC LipGlass isn't that vanilla-ish at all!  It's got very pigmented color, it stays on a LONG time for a gloss, and each tube lasts a long time...  Don't let what the other reviewer said about the vanilla scent throw you off

product_name: Fantasy Britney Spears(tm) Body Souffle, 6.7 oz: Beauty
title: The FANTASY continues...
review_text:
I bought a Fantasy gift set (fragrance, body soufflÃ© & jewellery box), and wasn't really interested in the soufflÃ©. I have sensitive skin & suffer from migraines, so have to be careful about which products I use.

But curiosity got the better of me, so I gave it a try. The non-shimmering lotion melted into my skin immediately - no stinging or rashes.

 The FANTASY scent - chocolate, cupcake, lychee, quince and kiwi - is subtle enough not to overpower me, yet strong enough to have people comment on my wonderful fragrance. (The scent of the fruity ingredients seemed to last longer on me, but then again everybody is different).

The body soufflÃ© can be worn on it's own on subtler days, or layered with the fragrance for a longer lasting impression.

product_name: DermaNew Professional Refill Sponge Applicator: Beauty
title: Good replacement sponges for the dermanew system.
review_text:
These are the replacement sponges for the Dermanew system. Each sponge includes a foam top section that comes in contact with your skin and a plastic bottom section that snaps securely on to your Dermanew applicator.

The sponges are very effective at applying the Dermanew dermabrasion creams. Very gentle on the skin with just the right amount of pressure. Each one also lasts a long time if you clean it after each use. But because of wear and tear and bacterial growth they should be replaced periodically.

The Dermanew system is great!(See my review on it) The sponges are excellent. However, I deducted one star because I feel $4.00 is pricey for the item.

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: A Favorite...
review_text:
I went to Sephora looking for a high quality bubble bath and the associate recommended Deep Steep and promised "movie star bubbles."  She was right!  I went back to get more (several months later), and Sephora no longer carries this brand.  Luckilly, I found it here.  The bubbles and the fragrance are long lasting, with no harsh chemicals or greasy residue left in the bathtub.  The fragrance is nice but not overhwelming.  The bubbles are full and lasting...they won't end up in a mound at your feet.  Somehow, they're distributed all throughout the bath water...just waiting for you to slide in!
You don't need to use a lot of bubblebath, which is good..because of the  price....but even with a small amount, you'll have a tub full of bubbles!!!  Enjoy!!

product_name: Britney Spears Surprising Twist!: Beauty
title: The FANTASY goes on and on...
review_text:
Perfect for touch-ups throughout the party season!

The best selling fragrance; the sweetness of chocolate and cupcake, before settling with fruity scents of lychee, quince and kiwi. The base note of vanilla lingers throughout making FANTASY a truly delicious classic in the making!

The gloss; Despite its greenish colour it is clear & shimmery!!

Never mind the party season - this is a handbag must have all year round!!!

product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Protective Recovery Complex: Beauty
title: It works
review_text: I'm 36 ,light normal/oily skin, freckles due to past sun damage . I've tried many other products (Neutrogena copper serum, did nothing, olay, did nothing, l'oreal, nothing or takes a lot of weeks and money to start working)so I decided to give this serum a try and I loved it! I've been using it for a year, every night and my skin has changed a lot,it looks fresh,healthier of course you have to have a routine :clean,exfoliate and moisture, but it's worth every penny! I highly recommended it

product_name: Iman Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: Love It
review_text: This is not the same product found at Walgreens and Walmart.  Although it is the same brand the formula is obviously different.  It goes on wonderfully.  I simply love it

product_name: H2O Plus Face Oasis® Hydrating Treatment: Beauty
title: Outstanding
review_text: It's hard to find the perfect skin products, but this one is flawless in my opinion. It's not heavy or greasy and goes on the skin just perfectly. I tend to have sensitive/combination skin and now use this treatment everyday. I strongly recommend it

product_name: H2O Plus Face Oasis® Hydrating Treatment: Beauty
title: Firm Believer from the very start
review_text: I started using Face Oasis when H2O Plus first opened its stores.  There are two specific reasons why I continue to use it.  I am sensitive to most cosmetic product smells and perfumes - it has its own unique "light" smell, but it certainly does not make my eyes water - and its ability to be absorbed by the skin without leaving a residue, or greasy feeling. Some skin products (some very expensive ones)have left my face dried out even though labeled as "moisturizers". Face Oasis has this wonderful 'cool' feeling to it.  A $34.00 jar lasts 3 months - do the math.  Some over the counter skin products cost over $9.00 and Face Oasis and H2O Plus products on the whole, are fiscally sound purchases for those looking for a bargain

product_name: H2O Plus Face Oasis® Hydrating Treatment: Beauty
title: Good for 20s
review_text: I have dry skin, this moisturizer worked so well when I used it in my 20s, I felt my skin being hydrated instantly after putting it on my face. However, after i reached 30s, it's no longer good enough for my skin. If you have very oily skin (or outer oily, inner dry), it would be a very good moisturizer for you.

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Wave Creating Spray: Beauty
title: My new miracle product!
review_text: I have another Fekkai product, and loved it so much I wanted to take a look at what else dear Frederic had to offer.  I've always wanted a product that would put waves in my hair, but every one I tried before just made my hair stiff, crunchy, and icky looking!  I read good reviews about this product, so I decided to give it a try.  It amazed me!  My hair really doesn't have much natural wave- maybe one or two semi-waves in the back.  Frankly, if I leave my hair air-dry without doing anything to it, it looks like cave-woman hair!  But not with this stuff!  I towel dried my hair until it was just damp.  Then I sprayed it all over my hair, flipped my head over and scrunched. (If your hair tends to get frizzy, you may want to add a little cream- such as Fekkai glossing cream- as this product doesn't do much to combat frizz)  Then I blow-dryed on low for just a minute or two while scrunching, and let the rest air-dry.  I have a few pieces of hair in the front that is quite damaged from coloring, and the waves weren't that defined there.  But the rest of my hair- wow!  I never imagined having such fun waves with my relatively straight hair!  Frederic Fekkai is a genius!

product_name: Clinique Superfine Liner for Brows: Beauty
title: great liner
review_text: This liner is thin as advertised, goes on easy, stays, and is really nice stuff.  Be warned, though, the lightest shade is REALLY light, and only good if you're REALLY pale.  It barely shows on me - I'm really pale with strawberry blonde hair and even I should've gone darker on the color.  Recommended

product_name: Clinique Superfine Liner for Brows: Beauty
title: Good brow liner!
review_text: I found it to have a little too much 'yellow' for my brows, (I have blonde/grey hair, but it performs well, and I like the slim point.  I just mix in a little of my charcoal to soften the yellow

product_name: Imju Fiberwig Fiberwig Mascara: Beauty
title: Absolutely Love Fiberwig!!!!
review_text: It is amazing! I didn't believe it at first until my friend showed me how to use it. I cannot believe how it stays on all day. Completely accentuates and lengthens my lashes. I curled them first and then applied Fiberwig, my lashes were up the entire day, they never came down. Probably because of how light it is, it is not heavy at all. My lashes look totally natural...and the best part...when I washed it off at the end of the night, it was sooooo easy to remove! It never smudged...not during the day or even after I washed them off. I absolutely love it

product_name: Imju Fiberwig Fiberwig Mascara: Beauty
title: Drama in Your Eyes
review_text: Get a dramatic look and extend your lashes to three times their natural length with this mascara.  It doesn't irritate and comes off easily at night

product_name: Imju Fiberwig Fiberwig Mascara: Beauty
title: It's 2PM and I don't have raccoon eyes!
review_text:
I'm on my second day of using this mascara and I think it's love. I wear contacts and this stuff doesn't irritate my eyes at all! My lashes look so much longer and thicker and it doesn't flake or smudge. Plus, it comes off easily with my makeup towelette at night.

Word to the natural girls - this is not a mascara for you my nuetral, peach gloss loving friend. This is pumped-up, girly-girl, make-up faced stuff. If you're in the mood for a little drama, try it. You'll love it

product_name: Imju Fiberwig Fiberwig Mascara: Beauty
title: BEST MASCARA
review_text:
this mascara was literally magical!
i love it!! it made my lashes 3 times as long!!
but be warned when u wash it off, little hairs come off with it and NO its not your eyelashes, they are little micro hair

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Luxury in a bar
review_text:
I got it, and I love it. Simple as that. I was a little suprised that there wasn't much lather, but it does get my very thick hair clean. Upon further thought I took to reading the ingredients again, and it's mostly all natural stuff. Kinda makes on wonder what is in the Rx bought stuff???
Try it, yes, it fragrant but I like it. However, it could be overpowering for some,especially if you are over sensitive to sents

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Shampoo and Conditioner
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
When I first tried this bar, my hair did feel very conditioned, but I didn't realize it was a 2 in 1 bar, so I used American Cream conditioner too. They do work very well together, but you can probably get away with just the shampoo bar. I was amazed at how much fun it was to use the shampoo bars, except you do have to keep them out of the shower or in a shampoo bar tin. 

If you are in love with the Flying Fox shower gel and temple balm, this may be the one you want. The ingredient list is impressive: Hibiscus Extreact, Shea Butter, Camellia Oil, Jojoba Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil, Coconut Butter, Jasmine, Ylang Ylang Oil, Cypress Oil, Palmarosa Oil and even a few little jasmine flowers just for fun. I loved this bar almost as much as Trichomania, also with coconut. 

I'm wondering if having hard water makes a difference when using the shampoo bars. I bought a shower filter and haven't noticed any problems with anything I've tried so far. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: travel? Godiva no doubt ....
review_text:
I travel a lot, and yes I only take one carry-on bag, with the new restrictions I tried this shampoo, I have a LOT of Hair, it's colored and is veeeerrrryyy  choosy about shampoos, so is my scalp (overly sensitive and does itch if I use the wrong product) ..... so I always travel with my own bottle never trusting the hotels tiny punny bottle, 

I was a little skeptical since it's not really that big (smaller than a regular bar of soap) I have been using it a week, my hair is manageble, no tangles, and oh so shinny , soft and NO itchy scalp !!!  I wet my hair wet the bar and 4 nice big circles over my shoulder lenght hair and taddaaa  suds, and yes I agree the smell is a little overpowering but hey, I can't take my perfume with me, the soft aroma that lingers in my hair will have to do...

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Incredible!
review_text:
I was skeptical at first.  I mean, a shampoo/conditioner bar?  I haven't been super impressed with Lush's other solid shampoos or conditioners (at least, not enough to write a review, good or bad), so I was doubtful about this 2-in-1 bar.  But I loved the idea, and I was curious, so I bought it and I must say that Godiva far surpassed my hopes!

My hair is about shoulder length, and it only took about 6 or 7 good swipes on wet hair to work up an incredible lather! (3 or 4 swipes wasn't enough, and 10 was too much!)

My hair felt clean, but not that styrofoam-squeaky clean where *everything* is stripped from your hair.  And the conditioner is light, but doesn't really kick in until your hair dries.  I don't personnally recommend using a hair dryer, so I don't know how that would affect the conditioner, but air drying has worked great for me.

I also recommend it for travel since it's about the size of your palm, is 2-in-1, and won't leak!  

(The only warning I'd give is for the shampoo tin.  I got it for free, so maybe I shouldn't complain, but... let the shampoo bar dry before putting it into the tin!!!  It is a PAIN to get it out if you don't.)

I also LOVE the scent, but could be too strong for some people (or not strong enough).  Everyone is different, but if you don't live near a Lush store, you'll never know until you buy it!  :

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Paradise in a bar
review_text:
After years of relying on other people's opinions about products, Godiva is the one that finally inspired me to write.  If your idea of heaven is rocking on a sunny veranda with a glass of iced tea in one hand and a good book in the other, a ceiling fan spinning overhead and the heady scent of jasmine filling the air...you will love this product.

Not only does Godiva leave my hair smelling wonderful, it also leaves it shiny and full of body.  Because my hair is very long, I do use some conditioner on the ends of my hair.

Godiva is paradise in a bar...and it's much less expensive than a trip to the islands

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Fabulous!
review_text:
I've been using this shampoo/conditioner in one for a month or so now.  I have color-treated otherwise normal hair that is wavy and prone to frizz.  This bar is great because it lasts FOREVER - as i said, I've owned it for a month but it still looks brand new!  A little bit goes a long way...I lather my hands with it (as if I was washing my hands) then distribute evenly throughout my hair.  Lots of lather!!!

The smell is amazing: jasmine mixed with ylang-ylang.  I wouldn't recommend this product to those who don't like strong-smelling products, or to those who don't like essential oil type scents (you know who you are). 

I feel as this shampoo (along with all lush hair products) results in hair that dries quicker.  I reccommend that you blow-dry shortly after washing if you don't drip dry.  

As far as a all in one product, I still use a seperate conditioner - but that's just me, and that goes for all brands.

This rejuvenates hair, and makes it SHINY!!

product_name: Clinique Exfoliating Scrub 3.4 oz: Beauty
title: Can't find a better scrub!
review_text:
I've been using this product for years.  Every now and then I try another product in hopes of finding something a little cheaper.  I have NEVER found anything that comes close to this one.  
I'm over forty, but still have somewhat oily skin, and get breakouts on occasion.  IF I use this two to three times per week, I definitely notice that I have fewer breakouts.  My skin is smoother and more even.
I like the menthol feel.  I don't smell it at all, and find it refreshing.  I've also tried the 7-day scrub and don't find it to come close to this product.  The grains in the 7-day scrub are few and far between.  With the exfoiliating scrub, they are very concentrated.  Too much?  Just add a little water.
I only hope that Clinique doesn't stop making this

product_name: T for Toes Dusting Powder by LUSH: Beauty
title: Refreshing
review_text: I use this product in my EarthShoes almost everyday.  It really keeps me confident that when I remove them for my Yoga class, there will be no whiff of the dreaded stinkfoot.  It feels refreshing, and a little goes a long way

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Great blades
review_text: I've made the switch to the safety razor, and I would never go back.  It's a better shave at a fraction of the cost.  I've never tried another brand of blades, but I haven't had a reason to

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: I can shave for a month or more, easily,  with one blade.
review_text: I don't know why so many reviews say they get six or seven shaves. Aren't you using hot shaving soap? I have an average European beard. I shave in the shower each day with mug soap and a bristle brush.  That is the key.  I get a good hot lather going. The lather is just to keep your whiskers wet and soft. Using a Merkur blade, I get well over fifteen or twenty shaves....or more. I don't really keep count, but one blade lasts me at least four weeks, and I shave daily. I reluctantly change blades when it seems it is a bit dull..But I think I could use it much longer...Honest. I can't imagine spending three dollars for a multiblade razor good for seven days.  Love my Merkur razor, too

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: For Me; Sharper than Personna or Gillette!
review_text:
This is the first double edge blade I used in my Merkur safety razor & for me they work alot better than the other ones mentioned above.
I usually get 5 to 7 days per one blade. I have found that the Feather brand DE blades to be the sharpest of all I have tried but they do not seem to last as long

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Very sharp!
review_text: I was timid to use my Merkur razor for the first time, and was very careful around my neck. A week or so after starting I feel like a pro. These razors are very sharp and keep their edge for at least six or seven shaves. It truly doesn't even feel like I'm shaving, the cut is so effortless

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: great Blades
review_text: If you let your beard grow a few days between cuttings like I do you need to use these blades.  They will cut through heavy hair with one or two passes.  They will not nick or cut if you are careful.  Then I use my regular razor with the 5 blades in it, I think it's called the fusion, and I don't have to shave for 3 days and my face stays hair free

product_name: philosophy good for you will power shower gel collection: Beauty
title: I Wanted Them All
review_text:
I stumbled upon this shower gel collection this past Christmas season. I knew right away this would be a perfect solution for a lot of holiday gifts on my list. I was pleased that I could knock off a number of ladies off of my list with one purchase. I was even happier with the free shipping and $30 Amazon gift card offer they had going on at the time. 

I couldn't wait for the package to arrive. I ripped into it as soon as it got to me. The gels were all packed nicely in a sturdy box with handle from Philosophy. I had to restrain myself from keeping all of the gels. I managed to give away nine of them after some agonizing deliberation. (The mint chocolate chip, lemon custard, and berry ones were mine.) Plus the cool box made a perfect container for all of my other gels that I rotate according to season.

I'm a big fan of most of Philosophy's products. They have some awesome smelling shower gels as well as wonderfully working skincare products. I was already familar with the excellent cinnamon buns and double cocoa scents so I figured most of these should be pretty darn good too. The mint chocolate chip is nice but the lemon custard is weaker smelling out of the bottle. As with all of their 3-in-1s,Oh well, some will be a hit where as others will miss.

As with all of their 3-in-1s, the shower gel makes mounds of lather, cleans your skin usually without drying, and works fairly well as a shampoo too - though conditioner is typically needed. I like the shower gels a lot. I know my gal pals enjoyed their Christmas gift too. All things considered, this was a fantastic deal!

product_name: philosophy good for you will power shower gel collection: Beauty
title: Philosophy Shower Gel :Guilt Free Indulgence
review_text: The fragrances are marvelous, yet after the shower they do not interfere with your scent of choice. I find the shower gel is very creamy and not drying at all. I do use it as well as a shampoo, but have found in the dry harsh winter I still need a conditioner. I highly recommend this product

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Lumedia Facial Brightener: Beauty
title: Impressive results in a short time
review_text: I have used this product for 5 days and I noticed a difference in the texture and color of my skin immedialtely.  It is easy to use, and I'm glad I purchased it.

product_name: Tweezerman Blackhead Remover w/Lancet: Beauty
title: if you're going to pick, might as well do it right!
review_text:
This little tool really does help.  It gets blackheads out especially well.  The lancet is O.K., but not as sharp as it could be.  Still, be careful with it!  You're still poking your face!  

Another note: Tweezerman is a good company to buy from- very socially and environmentally responsible.  The company thats sells it through Amazon is good, too.  Prompt, and includes little candies in the box

product_name: DermaNew Facial Rejuvenation System: Beauty
title: The easiest way to glowing skin...
review_text:
Okay, so 80 bucks seems like a lot of money to plunk down for an at-home microdermabrasion kit...especially when everyone from Homedics to L 'Oreal is marketing a more cost-friendly version of what appears to be the same EXACT thing.  However, experience (and lots of money not-so-well spent) has taught me that, in most cases, you generally get what you pay for.  Case in point: a few months ago I finally made the decision to trade in my 99 cent ultra-black mascara for a high-end name brand version of the same product...I immediately discovered that mascara-induced racoon eyes really can be avoided!  Who knew?  After that, I vowed never to pinch pennies when it comes to beauty.  Now there are, of course, some exceptions; my mother swears by Oil of Olay -as do I- but when you're talking about microderabrasion, a proceedure that can cost as much as $150 per session, it's hard to believe that you can achieve the same exact results with something that is a mere fraction of the cost.

Skeptical but desperate for youthful looking skin, I opted to splurge on the DermaNew Facial Rejuvenation System.  Prior to my purchase, I did a fair amount of research so I knew that what I was getting the crÃ¨me de la crÃ¨me of the more than twenty-plus versions that I had to choose from.  

Just two weeks after using it, I began to notice that my once sallow complexion (thanks to stress, lack of sleep and yo-yo dieting) had been replaced with a healthy glow.  Now my skin looks soft and peachy, kind of like it did when I was twelve...you know, when youth and beauty was effortless...sigh!  

All in all this product is best for someone with little to no skin flaws.  Those who are expecting miracle results or results similar to what you would get from a full-service salon treatment may be dissapointed.  My advice, shell out the necessary funds in order to get your skin under control, then use this product for the upkeep.  This is great for removing the dead skin that regular washing tends to leave behind.

product_name: DermaNew Facial Rejuvenation System: Beauty
title: Lovely soft skin can be yours!
review_text:
At first I was hesitant to ante up the $ to purchase the dermanew system, but after a few friends raved about it, I decided to buy it.

The system includes a battery operated applicator tool (batteries are included), sponge tops for the tool, and dermabrasion cream.

You pop a sponge on top of the applicator, put cream on it and apply to your dampened skin. I set a timer for 3 minutes and work the applicator around the surface of my skin. 

The results are great! Dead skin is sloughed off, circulation is stimulated and the results are glowing soft skin.
My skin looks lovely and feels smooth to the touch. It felt soft and wonderful after the very first application!

Dermanew sells other applicator sponges and creams separately to use with the applicator tool on your hands and feet.

Though the initial price tag seems high, this tool will last for years and help you to glowing skin! I highly recommend it

product_name: Pout Plumping Lip Gloss by Pur Minerals: Beauty
title: purely fabulous
review_text: The entire line is fabulous, but the rose zircon lip gloss is by far the best. I have never been one to wear lipstick, but since I first tried this lip plumping gloss, I rearly leave home without it.  It doesn't feel like you are wearing anything, yet it stays on while eating and drinking. The rose zircon matches my lips and that of all my friends who have borrowed it and not returned it because they love it so. It just makes me feel glamorous

product_name: Aquis Microfiber Hair Turbans: Beauty
title: Every Girl Needs One
review_text: I started with a regular hair towel by Aquis, then received the turban as a gift.  Both are great, but the turban stays on better, as it can twist to fasten at the nape of the neck.  The products are super-absorbant and make blow-drying much faster.  I've tried the generic brand, but it can't compare to this.  I use it after every shower.  A must-have

product_name: Clinique 7 Day Scrub Cream Rinse Off Formula 100ml/3.4oz (Tube): Beauty
title: Another great product!
review_text: I use this once a day to scrub off the dry, dead skin off my face and it works wonderfully! It leaves my skin so smooth. After this I follow with my 3 Step System and my skin is so soft! It's a must have for me

product_name: Ultimate Shine Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: No more dull hair
review_text: Is it shiny?  Oh yes, it is.  My hair was dull and boring and after a week of using this shampoo, it is shiny and lustrous.  Like magic.  I was scared to use the solid shampoo but all you do is rub wet bar on top of wet head and a lather will form

product_name: Rene Furterer Complexe 5 (Six Ampules x 0.16 oz.): Beauty
title: Activate Micro-Circulation
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The emotionally healing benefits of orange oil and lavender become immediately apparent when you apply this to your scalp. If you can find someone to give you a head massage with this product, then you can truly relax. If applying this yourself, it works well as an at home hair treatment to nourish the hair follicles and promote healthy hair growth. You will also notice your hair becoming stronger and retaining a much deeper shine. The essential oils in this product help to activate micro-circulation which may cause a slight tingling and warming of the scalp. Leave this in for about 5-10 minutes and then wash your hair as normal. You may find you need less conditioner when using this product. Many hairdressers will use this product when giving a conditioning head massage and that is where I first found out about this product. I bought my first bottle the day I had the massage. I was that impressed and I keep buying this product. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Bobbi Brown Moisture Rich Foundation SPF 15: Beauty
title: AMAZING COLORS...makes your skin look radiant
review_text: I LOVE this foundation. I have Warm Sand Moisture Rich Foundation. It is incredibly smooth, long wearing and the color makes my skin look bright and radiant. Bobbi Brown makes very natural foundation colors and there is a range of colors for all different skin tones. When I'm shopping it seems that most lines cater to lighter and medium skin tones, but Bobbi Brown really does come through with flattering options for all skin tones. The only draw back is that this foundation does not provide adequate SPF protection, even though it says SPF 15. Therefore, you will still need to wear a sunscreen underneath of at least SPF 15. I use this foundation every day and I wear sunscreen from Paula's Choice (which I love). I think that the color options available, the long lasting color and the smooth texture make this foundation worth the price.

product_name: Clinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup 07 Matte Neutral: Beauty
title: All In One Face Powder and Foundation!
review_text: I have used this product for the past 16 years. It is wonderful!The Super Double Face Powder is actually a foundation and matte powder all rolled into one product. The product comes with an application sponge, goes on dry, gives superb coverage! I don't even use my Clinique concelar when I wear this product, it is that good! This product works best with those individuals who have normal or combination skin.

product_name: Dr.Hauschka Clarifying Toner: Beauty
title: Great part of the Hauschka regimen!
review_text: The smell is the only caveat for me, it's a little bit sour/bitter/funky smelling. Another thing that I find strange is I have to use alot of this to feel like I've saturated my skin. I go through it pretty quickly compared to other spray type toners. The whole Hauschka regimen is so amazing for my skin. To use, spritz on after cleansing and press gently into the skin

product_name: Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Cheers for Beer!!
review_text:
I was skeptical at first.  The only beer I ever drink is pale and icy on a hot, HOT day.  But my skin is terribly sensitive and 99% of shampoos make my scalp scream and my face blotchy.  So I was willing to try anything, especially from LUSH, because all of their products are of such high quality.  Last time I visited their shop, I bought the 8 oz bottle of this because it didn't have anything that I knew I was allergic to in it.

Over three months later now, and I'm still using it.  I've even come to like the smell.  And I only have to use a scalp treatment shampoo (Nizoral or Meted, which are great for the scalp but hard on the hair) maybe once a week for maintenence.  I can wear black and not have to shake my shirt off every 10 minutes.  There are no painful lesions hiding under my hair.  And the couple of people who have noticed the scent have enjoyed it and had a good chuckle when I told them what it was.

Thank you, LUSH

product_name: Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Love love love the scent!
review_text: The scent of Cynthia Sylvia Stout shampoo is fabulous, sticks with you, and the shampoo also is great.  The price is steep, yes, but worth it.  Don't bother with the 3.3 oz "trial size" because you'll most likely only waste shipping charges and go on to order the bigger bottles next time

product_name: Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Got my hair squeaky clean, but...
review_text:
...but I didn't care for the smell.  It does smell like beer and I could smell it throughout the day after I used it (smell fades throughout the day), but I guess if you like the smell of this shampoo, then it won't be a problem at all.  Did notice my hair was shinier and softer(which is hard to say for my hair), but had to knock off a star for the scent.  

Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo was just `okay' and I will be sticking with Rehab, Big, and I Love Juicy (see my reviews).  Try a smaller size bottle first, and remember that some of the products IN the LUSH store smells different when you get them home

product_name: Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Definetly makes your hair smooth looking
review_text:
As I stated in my other reviews, I have color-treated otherwise normal hair which is wavy and prone to frizz.  I like this shampoo for it's calming effect, best experienced after a couple of uses.  If you straighten your hair, this will work great because the shine and smoothness will be most noticable.

To those of you worried that your boss may think you spent your lunch break in a pub - the stout scent fades quick and is only really identifyable while washing.  

A word to the wise, this shampoo is a bit drying.  I make sure to deep condition at least once a week to avoid crispy hair.

product_name: NeoStrata Foaming Glycolic Wash (AHA 20): Beauty
title: A great cleanser for us oily girls!
review_text: I purchased this cleanser about 3 weeks ago. I saw a dramatic difference in my oily, acne-prone skin after a day or 2. It works well if you remove your makeup first with a cleanser and then use it. It has really refined my skin and made it more smooth and I've had much less breakouts. I am very happy with this product and plan to repurchase again. It works well with the oily skin solution too! A great product

product_name: Kerastase Nutritive Elasto-Curl Weightless Mousse for Fine Curly Hair - 5 oz 150 ml: Beauty
title: great product
review_text: This is a great product to enhanse and define curls. It's work perfectly with very curly hair without any stifness. The only reason i don't give it five stars is because if you have long hair and want to define your curls but hav some volume as well, this mousse as a tendancy to reduce the volume of very long hair. So great for curls, but without volumizing effect. The price too is kind of expensive. This product is cheaper in france: around 18-24 Euros. It is worth the price though and Kerastase products are seen as the best in Europe

product_name: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani for Men 6.7 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: IF YOU WANT THE BEST - IT'S ARMANI
review_text:
There's something about Armani!  His fragrances are as stylish and classic as his designs.  Acqua Di Gio is a case in point with its virile, mysterious, intriguing scent.  It's fresh and at the same time sensual.

	Notes include Calabrian bergamot, neroli, and the zest of green tangerine, each warming and giving vitality to the fragrance.

	Mr. Armani has said that the inspiration for this scent came from the shoreline of Pantelleria island, a body of land which lies in the Mediterranean Sea between Sicily and Tunisia.   Pantelleria is one of a kind, a rarity as is Acqua Di Gio.

      - Gail Cook

product_name: Philosophy Strawberry Milkshake: Beauty
title: Yum!!
review_text:
I bought this and several other Philosphy 3-in-1 products totally based on their yummy smell, and this is probably my favorite!  It truly smells like a melting strawberry milkshake made with fresh strawberries and whole milk ice cream.  I never get tired of the smell!  

I will admit I have only used this as body wash, not as shampoo or conditioner.  I have found that combination products do not work well on my dry curly hair, so I cannot attest to the hair cleaning properties of this product.  I can say that I've been using Philosphy products on my skin for about a year, and I love them.  I have found that my skin has been slightly less dry since I switched from my old product.

I (and I've heard many others say this same thing) have found that the fragrance does not linger strongly on your skin after your shower.  My husband never smells my flavor du jour on my skin after my shower, and I am glad, because I don't think strawberries and Clinique Happy go well together.  So if you are concerned about smelling like you stepped out of Dairy Queen, don't

product_name: Murad AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser: Beauty
title: GREAT face cleanser
review_text: I love this exfoliating cleanser, and especially the way my face feels after using it.  I have even used it on my feet....remarkable! I LOVE every Murad product I have tried.. but this is sure one of my favorites

product_name: H2O Plus Smoothing Mint Foot Rub: Beauty
title: good stuff
review_text: this stuff hydrates ur feet pretty well and it smells good i like h20 product

product_name: Dr.Hauschka Rose Day Cream: Beauty
title: I love this stuff ! !
review_text: It has the perfect consistency - rich, but not greasy.  It leaves my skin looking dewy.  Makeup glides on over it, and the nice rose smell is an added bonus.

product_name: Dr.Hauschka Rose Day Cream: Beauty
title: Smoothes out that neck wrinkle
review_text: Try this cream on your neck and chest (the areas that often get neglected-- once you get wrinkle or sagging on your neck, you can't do anything to hide your age!!!).   I was surprised to see an immediate difference in appearance of neck and chest, giving it a smooth glow.  My mom tried it on her neck and before she even told me I thought her neck looked smoother.  This cream is too creamy for my combo face which tends to get oily throughout the day.

product_name: Burberry Touch For Men: Beauty
title: Just a "Touch" of love...
review_text: I am by no means any kind of expert on the in's and out's of quality cologne.  I do however know what works for my chemistry and what works for the ladies.  When I first smelled Touch, I thought, "Not bad, and an attractive bottle."  The initial spray did not grab me, however with the dry down....it was wonderful.  I actually had a young lady at my job physically stop me in the hall, sniff my neck, and look at me with longing eyes and ask what I was wearing!  At that point, I knew that Touch was going to be part of my "smell good" arsenal

product_name: Burberry Touch For Men: Beauty
title: The Touch of Burberry
review_text:
Let me first start of by saying I love 'Touch' by Burberry, I wear it more than I wear any other cologne I own. It is very versatile and  not too strong in its fragrance. However, the scent doesn't last very long and you may have to spray a few more times than usual to achieve results that will last to your hoping.

'Touch' is the first cologne Burberry has designed that leans towards a "sour" smell but in this case, it works. 'Touch' is very romantic, elegant, provocative, and sensational all at once...but its effects are only minimal. Maybe if it were redesigned to produce long-lasting results then I would probably add the 5th star to this rating but unfortunately, the scene span of 'Touch' can only leave me wishing.

product_name: Burberry Touch For Men: Beauty
title: Best men's cologne
review_text: "Touch" is one of 10 kinds of colognes in my collection and it's the best, hands down.  It's that kind of scent that you can wear to any occasion (formal, night out on the town) with any kind of clothing (suit, casual).  I get a lot of comments from the ladies, too

product_name: Estee Lauder Equalizer Smart Loose Powder: Beauty
title: This is the Best!
review_text:
So glad I was able to find the Estee Lauder Equalizer Smart Loose Powder on this website... Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!
All the stores I've been to have discontinued it and it's the best stuff around for me. All I have to do after applying my moisturizer is use a little concealer where necessary, use this powder & I'm Done!  No more foundations, nothing!  The color 03
Medium gives me a little color, smooths my pores making my face look soft and radiant. I ordered three just in case Estee Lauder's really going to do away with this powder (their so-called "replacement" in the stores "Lucidity Loose Powder" in the supposed same color 03 Medium is nasty stuff!  It smells yucky, it's cakey, and the color is not even close!!!)  I'm going to order at least 3 more (even at $25 a piece it's well worth it.

product_name: Truefitt Hill Luxury Shaving Soap: Beauty
title: Great Soap!
review_text: Nice smelling (not too heavy, not too light), and foams easily. Well recommended

product_name: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Leave-In Conditioner: Beauty
title: Love This Product!
review_text: I've been washing my hair in Carol's Daughter brand Shampoo and using this conditioner afterwards. I love the smell and the way my hair feels. I'm using the whole beauty regiment suggested by Jada Pinkett. I love it

product_name: Clinique Acne Solutions Spot Healing Gel 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: A great product!
review_text: I use this to dry out blemishes. It works great for me

product_name: Avon PERSONAL MATCH Dewy Souffl Foundation SPF 10: Beauty
title: feels like nothing on your face
review_text: this is a review on the new makeup called souffle. i like it. it feels like nothing. the only thing it needs is a paddle to get it out of the jar so as not to contaminate it before its gone. it is an swesome makeup and worked well for me. a good value for your money and the best part it feels like nothing on your face but makes it look fresh and not caked on. a wonderful product and great value. i will buy it again. since it did not come with a paddle for use i used a plastic knife to get it out of the jar without getting it contaminated. makeup does sour. so better to be safe than sorry. good job avo

product_name: Chanel No. 19 by Chanel for Women 1.7 oz Eau de Parfum Spray (Glass Bottle): Beauty
title: Evening never smelled so goooooooood!
review_text:
The powdery scent of fresh flowers and musk; Chanel # 19 is sex personified. I could spend an entire evening in a pair of Italian heels and this fragrance alone. A matter of fact I did. 

When I smell Chanel # 19 I think of cold winter nights wrapped up in cashmere laying on a leather chaise with the heat of a warm fire bath me. Chanel #19 evokes the glorious feel of crisp winters and elegant evenings. A subtle fragrance that becomes more powerful with the heat of your body so it's best in the winter or very special occasions.

I highly recommend Chanel # 19 if you need a lift in mood this winter. One whiff and your mood will be elevated, I promise. Even the sight of the perfume is wonderful. A beautiful classic glass Chanel bottle' the delicate liquid beckons you to put it on and enjoy. Just the feel of the bottle in your hand is glorious.

Evoke your sense of smell, sight, and touch with Chanel # 19.

girldiver:)
Thank You Jim Pfrommer for the gift.

product_name: Angel's Delight by LUSH: Beauty
title: Heavenly
review_text: I used this soap, and I was blown away by its scent. All my girlfriends absolutely love it, and its my favorite buy. Will definitely be getting more of these

product_name: SkinCeuticals Hydrating B5 Gel - 30 ml: Beauty
title: it really works!!
review_text: i would get dry patches when using retA or dry skin. when i applied this product it moistured and softened the area. I did about 2-3 applications or as needed

product_name: Chanel Teint Fluide Universel: Beauty
title: Feels like silk
review_text: This is the best foundation for my skin. I have rather fair, sensitive skin, and have been searching for the "perfect" foundation for years. I have found it in this product which is lightweight and silky. My skin feels so soft and delicate and looks great with this product on. It provides excellent coverage and stays on for hours; it goes on remarkably well and blends just as easily.

product_name: Clarins Gentle Foaming Cleanser - All Skin Types: Beauty
title: Great gentle cleanser for sensitive skin
review_text: I really like this cleanser. I have tried many different brands; both high-end and over the counter, and this one really does exactly what it should. It cleanses my skin without drying and actually makes it feel moisturized without feeling weighed down. I tend toward dry, flaky, sensitive skin on my face and this is just a great cleanser for my problem skin. You just need to make sure that this product is fresh and doesn't sit past it's shelf life because it does contain shea butter and will go bad after it's expiration or if exposed to sunlight/heat.

product_name: AVEDA Sap Moss Conditioning Detangler Weightless conditioning and shine 4.2 fl oz/125 ml: Beauty
title: Friend loved it
review_text: I bought it for a friend with hard to manage hair, and she loved it

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: FOR A SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy! 

Gail Cook

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Best Gloss on the Market
review_text:
MAC LipGlass is the absolute best. There are plenty of colors to choose from, SUPER-Shiny, and the gloss is thick, stays on and doesn't run. 
The best colors are....
NICO for a cute lavender pink color with a glittery shine. 
OYSTERGIRL is a shimmery baby pink.
OH BABY is the perfect gloss for any earth toned lipstick.
CHAI looks amazing with black smokey eyes. It's the perfect neutral earthy gloss and has no glitter or shimmer - just pure shine

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Vanilla scent not so bad!
reviewer: Lindsey Justice "MAC addict, and reader of many things"
review_text: I'm REALLY anal about scented/flavored lipglosses- especially ones scented or flavored with vanilla, but MAC LipGlass isn't that vanilla-ish at all!  It's got very pigmented color, it stays on a LONG time for a gloss, and each tube lasts a long time...  Don't let what the other reviewer said about the vanilla scent throw you off

product_name: Clarins Advanced Extra-Firming Neck Cream: Beauty
title: "Jeunesse du cou"... unprecedented and superb!!
review_text:
Finally, women everywhere can have the same effects of a facelift without the expense or the pain! This sumptuous cream from Clarins will help avoid that "rugged" look on the neck as soon as it starts to become evident; thus making you look younger because, once the signs of aging start to appear on the neck, they reflect on a woman's appearance as a whole.  You will notice a difference in the tightness of the skin of your neck right after the first application.  Subsequent ones will just make a good thing even better.

Clarins has been a leader in beauty products for years now and they have been my favorite brand since I discovered them in my early twenties. Their line is extensive in very specific treatments (such as body and bust oils, etc.); so much much so, that I've never seen a neck cream from any of the other prestigious skin care brands - such as Shiseido and Guerlain for instance. I use most of their products but this one, I truly love. Highly reccommended

product_name: Clinique Different Lipstick: Beauty
title: Surprise isn't served justice on the color preview!
review_text: I have recently became a Clinique lover. I was a little worried about buying at the full price before either testing it in stores or getting it somewhere cheaper in case the color was wretched. I got my tube from Ebay for a little less than retail. When it came in the mail the color was just gorgeous. Surprise is actually a bronze shimmer color, almost a sparkle metallic. The color is so rich on my lips but doesn't look overdone. It feels light and stays with me which is a plus. Before wasting your money on colors that you will use once or twice, why not splurge a little for something you're sure to love a lot? In the end it's not a splurge really because you're sure to use use use and come back for more!

product_name: Hypnose by Lancome for Women 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Nice, Light Perfume
review_text: My wife casually mentioned that she really liked this new Hypnose perfume she smelled in a magazine advertisement.  Hint! Hint! Hint!  So, I bought it for her, of course.  I like the smell - to me it has a hint of citrusy, flowery, vanilla aroma.  And it's a lighter, not cloying perfume, which I prefer.  I would definitely give this perfume a thumbs up

product_name: Hypnose by Lancome for Women 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Heavenly!
review_text:
In the search for a signature scent- I've found my bliss. I first smelled this perfume in my Lucky magazine. Just rubbing the paper on my wrist, I was transported. Of course you can't tell how a perfume will work with your chemistry until you've tried it for at least a week. I picked up a sample in a department store and each time I wore Hypnose I was hypnotized again. The name is very appropriate. 

It's a feminine scent that is fresh, and actually induces a soothing and happy mood. The notes are vanilla absolut, passionflower, and vetiver. It's joyfully calming. 

Also, it's not overwhelming. Others will have to stand very close to you in order to smell it.

product_name: Sephora Moisturizing Gloves: Beauty
title: Great Gloves.
review_text: My wife suffers from psoriasis on her hands, and must frequently wear gloves to keep various medications and moisturizers from rubbing off.  The Sephora Gloves have proved top-quality for this purpose

product_name: Janson Beckett OkuSil Intensive Eye Serum 1oz: Beauty
title: Great for Dark Circles & Puffiness
review_text:
I have tried every product out there and have spent thousands of dollars for my dark under eye circles and puffiness.
This is by far the best I have tried.  The under eye circles look much better and I don't look horrible anymore in the morning.  Please try it, it works.  Would love to hear what everyone else thinks

product_name: Aveda Shampure Shampoo: Beauty
title: Amazing all-around shampoo
review_text: While it seems these days that most shampoos have a specific purpose (ie- volumizing, de-frizzing, curl-enhancing, color-protecting, etc.) this one is an amazing all-around shampoo, wonderful for daily use for all types, colors and styles of hair. The smell is incredible - truly invigorating to wake up to in the morning shower. It doesn't leave any buildup or residue as many shampoos often do, so you don't have to worry about switching your shampoo every few weeks. Its a great classic which I hope stays around forever- I'll remain a loyal fan!

product_name: Bliss Shock Therapy: Beauty
title: Tingle Tingle
review_text: This body wash makes my whole body tingle in refreshment. It's the mintiest, more tingly shower gel I've ever tried. The scent clears my head. I feel tingly for an hour after I get out of the shower!

product_name: Bliss Shock Therapy: Beauty
title: very nice body wash...
review_text: Good stuff!  A little pricey, though.  Great for summer - makes you feel cool and tingly all over - even makes me get goosebumps sometimes!  The cooling effects even last for a little while after you get out of the shower!  Very concentrated so you don't need a lot of it, and it doesn't run all over the place like some other body washes do.  Even my husband likes it!  Would be nice if it were a little more moisturizing, though.  If not for that and the price, I would have given this a 5 star review.

product_name: Bliss Shock Therapy: Beauty
title: Try Shock Therapy & become a Bliss believer
review_text: During a recent stay at the W Hotel in New York City, I thoughtlessly used the complimentary toiletries, which happened to be Blisslabs products.  I was so impressed that the same day I went on a major shopping spree to Bliss's in-hotel boutique and I haven't used anything else since. I love their products and cannot recommend them highly enough. Their Shock Therapy is my favorite product. If you don't like the smell of peppermint, this is not the body wash for you, but if you do, this will become your new morning ritual. The smell of mint is very, very strong, and refreshing, truly helping to clear out the early-morning cobwebs. The shower gel is clear and smooth, not grainy. It washes off cleanly and is SO refreshing. It's a great change from the ultrafeminine floral/fruity scents out there. There's a 16-ounce size out there for $32.00--almost twice the size for an extra $9. You can't go wrong. You'll love this stuff.

product_name: CARGO Liquid Shadow Collection: Beauty
title: California Girl
review_text:
I don't like liquid eye shadows because they seem to wear off but this
stayed on all night and all the colors are pretty It also worked great as a liner under my bottom eyelashes. I don't care for the wand it's to goopy I used a eyeliner brush to apply. Also A little goes a long way

product_name: Lancome High Resolution Collaser-48 Intensive Collagen Anti-Wrinkle Serum 30ml/1oz: Beauty
title: Good for your skin
review_text:
One of the few moisturizing products I have used that doesnt't make me 
break out. 
One pump is enough for problem areas -around my mouth, between brows, forehead.
Absorbs quickly, lasts all day. Skin looks healthier, wrinkles less noticeable

product_name: Clinique Eye Defining Liquid Liner: Beauty
title: Love It!
review_text: Very good product.  I am allergic to many make up products, but this one I have not had any problems with.  Very satisfied!

product_name: Clinique Eye Defining Liquid Liner: Beauty
title: great liner
review_text: This stuff goes on easy, stays well (but WILL rub off with water, won't withstand a good cry).  Nice.  Not quite as nice as the Victoria's Secret liner (I swear by that stuff, discontinued 3-4 years ago), but WAY better than anything cheaper.  I have TRIED other things.  Plus, won't irritate my very sensitive eyes

product_name: LOLA Cosmetics Gloss Menagerie: Beauty
title: Adorable little set!
review_text: This is a great little lip gloss collection - all of the LOLA lip gloss colors in mini bottles. While kind of pricey, I love it since I can never make up my mind and would have a hard time shelling out $16 for something I might not wear. I love these glosses, they're light, tasteless-to-slightly-minty, long-lasting and relatively non-sticky (as far as glosses go - I'm a very low-makeup girl, so the fact that I can wear these without getting my hair glued to my lips is a big plus!) One caveat: this is a sampler - these are TINY bottles (each roughly the size of my pinkie), but that can be a bonus if you want something to slip in the smallest pocket or purse. I've now bought two of my favorites (celestial and rush) in the full-size version for daily wear, which lets me save the mini versions for days I need something tiny, and the rest aren't colors I'll wear every day, but I love the option when I want something different.

product_name: LOLA Cosmetics Gloss Menagerie: Beauty
title: The Perfect Menagerie!
review_text: The Lola Gloss Menagerie is all a girl could ask for in a small, cute gloss. The colors are perfect for layering, and each cute tube lasts quite a while longer than I would have expected. The refreshingly light peppermint taste is very pleasant, and is not overpowering at all. Although it has a hefty price tag, the Menagerie is very much worth it. These make cute gifts as well, and almost every girl will love the convinient sizing, as well as the super shine it emits. It's not sticky at all. I love it

product_name: Bliss Ultimate Foot Duo Kit: Beauty
title: AWESOME!!!  Softer feet here I come!
review_text:
I usually wear the socks with the cream for 2 to 3 hours. I've had them since Christmas and have used them twice a week and after only 4 treatments (using the softening sock salve), my heels are SO much smoother and softer! I had really deep cracks in my heels with sharp chunks poking out - even using a heel file didn't help! But these things are already showing drastic improvement!  The only part that's hard for me is soaking my feet first, so I usually do it in the morning after my shower.  {Another nice benefit of being a stay at home mom ;-)}

My box lists step by step instructions including how to hand wash them. After 4 uses (2-3 hours as stated previously) I feel no need to wash these - my feet do NOT sweat in them.  I've even worn a pair of slipper socks over them to help keep them clean when I walked around the house (careful with that one - they're pretty slick when you first put them on with the softening sock salve!) and my feet still didn't sweat.

I DO recommend using the softening sock salve with them for faster results. 

I hope everyone is as happy with these as I am

product_name: Tend Skin: Beauty
title: I love this stuff
review_text: I first tried Tend Skin from an article in a beauty magazine. I first bought it from Sephora, and the worker there told me it does hurt when you put it on..but it's worth it. I do agree that it does sting when you put it on after shaving, but it's the only thing that has stopped my sensitive skin from breaking out in rashes or bumps.  As far as preventing in-grown hairs, it does help. It doesn't prevent them totally, but with a combination of exfoliating and using Tend Skin, I've found that it works pretty well

product_name: Estee Lauder Hydra Complete Multi-Level Moisture Creme: Beauty
title: More Refreshing Than Yogurt On Your Face
review_text:
I received a smaple size of this face creme with my recent order of my hunny's anniversary present from Estee Lauder. It came with a bunch of other stuff that I either swapped or gave away, but this was a real winner for me. It came as a 5-day supply, and I just wish I had more. 

I used this creme as a supplement to other lotions I wasn't thrilled with, namely, Neutrogena Whip Moisturizer with SPF 15 or 30, and Clinique Super City Block SPF 40(but I'm still undecided about this one). Both of these weren't smooth enough. they didn't have that nice slip to spread easily across the skin. The former I had to use a lot of on its owen to really moisturize the lower half of my face, and the latter I had to rub very hard in order to get it to spread without this creme. 

I love that this creme gets the job done. Out of all the moisturizers I have used for my face, I have had to use this one the most sparingly in order to moisturize, and I like that. I can imagine it coests more than the other two moisturizers, but it also does a better job. 

I don't like that when I first put it on, it seems to warm up my face a bit around the nose and mouth. Ordinarily this wouldn't bother me, but seeing as to how almost every other thing has been breaking me out recently, it makes me a teensy bit paranoid. Howver, this sensation does not persist, so I don't worry too much about it. The other thing is that it takes alittle longer to sink into the skin, and until it does, it gives my skin the look as if I have been sweating, but then it's in and my skin just feels good. 

Isn't that what moisture is all about?

Recommended:
Yes 

Amount Paid (US$): gwp
Skin Compatibility: Improved my skin
Fragrance: Pleasing scent

product_name: MenScience Eye Gel Mask: Beauty
title: Good for puffy eyes and strain
review_text: Great for getting rid of puffy eyes. I've used it a couple of times during some pretty bad hangovers and they really help with headaches and eye strain.

product_name: The Body Shop Relaxing Lavender Foam Bath: Beauty
title: Best value lavender
review_text: The Body Shop's lavender products are the best value around and they have a whole line-up--from the shower gel to body lotion to massage oil. Who doesn't like lavender and who doesn't like a good deal? I'm surprised not more people have discovered this "secret"

product_name: Lancome Definicils High Definition Mascara Waterproof Black/Noir: Beauty
title: Definitely does a great job lengthening!
review_text: I'm usually a drugstore mascara girl--my current fave is Maybelline's Full and Soft--but I had the opportunity to pick this up cheap, so I decided to try it. Immediately, I liked the thinner-sized tube (can't stand those overly fat mascaras!) and the stiff-bristled brush. The product is a bit on the dry side, but I much prefer that to wet and gloppy. There wasn't too much product on the brush, and it was easy to apply. I definitely noticed a lengthening effect beyond what I've seen with any other mascara, which was great because it made my small eyes look much more open. Also, the product stayed put all day long, absolutely no smudging or flaking. My only slight disappointment was that it left my lashes looking a bit thin, as the effect is long and spidery; I guess I'm used to the fullness I get from my everyday mascara, Full and Soft.  I will continue to use Definicils for times when I particularly want more length, and I've found that I can layer it with my Full and Soft to get both the length and fullness I want.  I would repurchase this if I could get it for a discount again, but I would not pay full price

product_name: Burberry Weekend: Beauty
title: lucky guess
review_text: i must admit, i was impulse shopping and had not heard of burberry weekend. i like all of there other scents and the reviews were so good, i just bought it! crazy, i know. i am so glad though, it smells so good and lasts a long time

product_name: Burberry Weekend: Beauty
title: I hope my husband buys it for me for Christmas
review_text:
OK, this is a true story. I was in the gym last week, and I went into the locker room to wash my hands after my workout. I opened the door and was immediately startled by an amazing scent -- unlike anything I had encountered before. Someone's perfume? I wondered. But it was so different! I wondered whether the person was still in the locker room. I was at the sink when I saw someone walking around by the back wall. I couldn't help myself from what happened next, even though I knew I would sound like a freak: "Is that your perfume I smell?" I asked her. "Yes," she replied pensively, probably thinking I was going to complain about someone using perfume in the locker room. "WHAT IS IT?? It's the most wonderful thing I have ever smelled," I said. "Burberry Weekend," she replied, as her face melted into the the confident, self-satisfactory smile of a woman who knows she has something another woman wants. 

I excitedly told my husband what happened that day, and I am hoping he will buy me some of this incredible fragrance for Christmas.

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Candle: Beauty
title: the best aroma of any candle
review_text: Deep Clover by Votiva is the nicest aroma in any candle that I have sampled.  It is not over-powering and yet it does the job.  It is a warm, sensual fragrance

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Candle: Beauty
title: Mmmmmmm!
review_text:
These are great candles and make great gifts because they are packed so nice.

The candles burn evenly and nice and slowly.  The scents are great!  Natural smelling and strong enough but not overwhelming in any way.  I can burn one of these on my first level and scent the whole floor unlike most other candles where I need to burn multiple candles to get the same level of scent...

So yes, they are more expensive than candles you can get but when I burn this one, its the only one I need to burn at a time...  with cheaper candles I dont really end up savings because I am burning several at once.

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Candle: Beauty
title: Great gift item...
review_text: Ordered two of these candles as gifts (Red Current & Moroccan Fig).  They come carefully packaged in a nice box, and the candle is in a clear glass voltive.  Red Current is a more perfumey scent with an undertone of fruit, while the Fig is sort of sweet-earthy.  A good housewarming/hostess gift

product_name: ModelCo Tan Airbrush In A Can: Beauty
title: my new favorite self tanner, with one caveat
review_text:
This summer I have been using Neutrogena's tanning mousse in medium.  Allure gave the Neutrogena product a great review.  I like it because like this product, it gives an instant color while also including the chemical that develops a tan over the hours.  However, I have been having to bleach my bath towels to get out the leftover mousse on my legs after I get out of the shower at night (If I don't it gets on my sheets.)  Also, you have to work quickly with your hands to spread the mousse before it streaks. Then you have to clean it from your fingernails.

I tried this Modelco spray at Sephora today.  It goes on very evenly, no hand blending needed.  It is lighter than the medium Neutrogena, which is great bec I am very fair skinned.  Much easier to apply, but costs a lot more.  I'll prob use it on weekends because you can spray all those hard to reach areas.  During the week when I'm just doing my legs I'll  stick to the cheaper Neutrogena product.

product_name: Mally Beauty Xtrahold Maximizing Mascara: Beauty
title: I would die without this mascara in my purse!!!
review_text: I don't know what I would do without this mascara!!  This mascara is to me beyond the best that I have ever used, (and I have had my share of investments in other brands of mascara only to be sadly disappointed).  I would give this product 10 stars if Amazon would let me.  I have to confess that I carry this mascara with me everywhere (not that you have to re-touch up during the day -- because you dont, but just so that I won't ever lose it). Truly a product worth trying.

product_name: Helen of Troy Professional Hot Air Brush Iron 3/4in.: Beauty
title: LOVE This Product
review_text: This is the very BEST hairstyler and hair dryer in one! I have very fine, thick, shoulder lenght hair and was a little skeptical that this product would be usefull for me. It is! Actually it is the best hair styling product I have ever purchased. It dries and sets my hair very quickly, usually in five minutes or less. What a timesaver. I am so delighted with this product that I purchased eight (8) to keep in my closet so I don't have to hunt for the best product EVER!!!

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Women: Beauty
title: Love This!
review_text: I love the fragrance of Happy, I have the perfume and body lotion as well as this body wash.  Even if you use a different brand of perfume, you should get this body wash.  It's light and pretty--citrus with soft floral.  Showering with it is a refreshing, energizing experience, and it leaves my skin soft and silky.  The scent is light enough that it won't clash if you use other fragrances. It's really comforting in the mornings--highly recommended!

product_name: Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ Repair Eye Serum: Beauty
title: Wonderful product
review_text: Not sure how someone in their early 20's can be worried about wrinkles!  One has to have wrinkles in order to apprecialte the results of this product.  I am in my early 60's and have very wrinkly upper eye lids.  All I have to do is use one drop of this product on my eyelids to see instant results.  It doesn't seem to matter if you use it over or under moisturizer.  I use it before I put on my makeup and it has saved me from going for eyelift surgery!  I think that says allot

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: I cant get enough of this!!!
review_text: If your into light smells, this one is for you.  After becoming pregnant I realized I could not wear most of my perfumes, but I still wanted to wear some sort of fragrance.  This one is perfect because it is very light, and smells just like a lemon with a bit of sweetness!

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: Beware --Your man may nuzzle your neck!
review_text: My boyfriend hates what he calls "food" scents.  He makes an exception for this - he can scent it from across the room even though it is very light.  The only other fragrance that gets a positive reaction from him is Chanel's Madamoiselle, which is heavier and more wintry

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: I love This!
review_text: I was having a very bad week and the other day I fell down and today I was aching so much I didn't want to get out of bed. But, I had to and I figured today was a good day to try Wiccy Massage bar. It feels cool on the skin and you can smell the peppermint and cinnamon it smells really good. This product works because almost all my aches are gone. Highly Recommended

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Spicy love
review_text: I got this for my boyfriend, who works all day lifting heavy plants in a nursery. He loved it from the minute I applied it to his sore back. The smell is calming, and the spices warm up the sore muscles like an icy-hot patch, but much better. It melts easily into the skin, but lasts a long time. It feels so creamy and warm. Now he always begs me to give him a massage

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: The Absolute Best!
review_text: This massage bar has the most gorgeous scent! I bought one about three weeks ago and it is slowly dissapearing from constant use! Try using it as a base for sultry perfumes like Prada - it smells great together! Oh, and it really does help sore muscles

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Spicey!
review_text: Woooo! This one lets it presence be known! It is a great thing, but it definitely kicks up some smell- not necessarily a bad smell, just a Strong one!! It has a cinnamony/rosemary smell that will kick your sinuses into high gear. The beans and the melty oils are great and they certainly do their job, just don't expect to rub yourself down at the gym and head back to work! Be prepared to bathe before sleeping with a body covered in this. Rosemary and whatever else is in it will keep you awake.

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: More spicy goodness
review_text: If you haven't used a massage bar before, this takes a little getting used to. It's solid at room temperature, but melts right away in contact with skin. This bar has cinnamon and other lovely things to really 'sink in' and warm up muscles. Not as much as medicated creams like Ben Gey and such, but enough to add to a good massage. And it smells so much better. The aduki beans are a nice addition, as they definately help with the massage around the neck and upper shoulder areas, as well as the bottom of your feet. A little goes a very, very long way. I give my husband weekly back and foot rubs with this and we've had the same bar for about three-four months and its still going strong

product_name: Solution 2 Razor Bump 8oz Pro Refill (Razor Bumps + Ingrown Hairs): Beauty
title: Great deal!
review_text: I bought the Solution 2 roller ball and it works very well.  The refill is an amazing deal and I love this product

product_name: Honey I Washed The Kids Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: yummy
review_text: addictively yummy....i've been using this soap since i bought it from lush a couple of years back. you just cant get enough of the buttery toffee scen

product_name: Honey I Washed The Kids Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Completely addicted
review_text: Tough to understand unless you are near one of their outlets.  I found this soap in the Macy's on Michigan in Chicago.  It is highly addictive.  They send samples of other soaps and things with each order, and we like almost all of them.  Good stuff

product_name: Honey I Washed The Kids Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Soothing Honey Scented Soap
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Normally at our house, we threaten to wash the cats (they don't like water too much and will normally only peer curiously into the bathroom when I'm in the tub. Now and then they have played with bubbles), but this does have an amusing name. 

I did think it was more like "Honey, I lost the soap in the tub again." This is one melting dream soap that can easily slip away into the depths of a luxurious lush bath. This soap is good with the Think Pink bath bomb and some of the Creamy Candy Bath bubble bar. 

If you love this, you may simply faint when you order a Sultana of Soap (oh my!). Avowash (avocado and olive oil), Ooh La La (lavender) and Bohemian (lemon) are also fun. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Honey I Washed The Kids Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Best Soap LUSH Ever Made!
review_text: The honeycomb texture takes some getting used to, but this sweet-smelling soap is worth the learning curve. If I could buy the entire wheel of soap, I would.

product_name: Honey I Washed The Kids Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Yummy soap, but don't eat it!
review_text:
I love good smelling soaps, and this one is terrific!
Yummy, soaps up well, lasts longer than you would think and makes skin smell good and feel soft.

A good splurge if you love great soaps

product_name: Honey I Washed The Kids Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Yummy yummy!  Goes fast!
review_text: Loved the scent and feel of this soap! I'm a bath product junkie and my latest cravings have been for anything honey scented and this soap is wonderful.  My only complaint is that it did use up pretty quickly and left a mess in the dish.  I'd not leave it in the shower next time.

product_name: Honey I Washed The Kids Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: This product leaves your skin slightly sticky feeling (not in a bad way, it disapears in a few minutes). The scent is light enough to not be overbearing (though it smells stronger in the shower). It does help if you have slightly dry skin. Overall, I really liked this product and plan to savor it till the end

product_name: Mambo by Liz Claiborne for Men 3.4 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Young yet sexy fragrance
review_text: One day I was mulling around in Boscov's & smelled this...i loved it & knew that the ladies would too. & they do!! Also, this is great if ur in the young teen crowd, sch as myself. It is spicy yet sweet which makes it great. Bottom line: A sexy frangrance for young the will indeed attract women

product_name: Murad Clarifying Toner: Beauty
title: The Best
review_text: If you have tried such products as ProActiv to help clear up your breakouts and haven't been that impressed, try this line of Murad products.  (Clarifying)  Used after the Clarifying Cleanser, this toner leaves your face feeling fresh.  It removes all the residual oil from your skin, but doesn't leave your face feeling dry.
