Just the opposite, it hydrates your skin while helping to control breakouts and oil.  I have nice clear skin for the first time in years - all due to this line of Murad products.  I couldn't be happier

product_name: Murad Clarifying Toner: Beauty
title: Clear Skin
review_text: Murad Clarifying Toner has helped in controlling my facial breakouts. I have been using this product for six weeks and noticed how great my skin looks. This toner is so cooling when applied. Murad Clarifying Toner features algae extract to help in diminishing the excess oil in the skin. The toner gets deep down to my pores and effectively hydrates my skin without any irritation.

product_name: Creative Nail Design Dry & Shine Quick Drying Topcoat: Beauty
title: Best Nail Care
review_text: I love this product!!!  Not only do I get a dry nail I also get an unbeleivable shine!

product_name: Essie Protein Basecoat .5 oz.: Beauty
title: Two Steps in One Polish
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text: The Essie Protein Base Coat is two steps in one and while you are giving yourself a manicure or pedicure (or taking these along to the salon - a good idea because they are better than the other polishes and dry faster!), you will notice how this smoothes out your nails and prepares them for a perfect nail polish finish. This formula contains camphor, silica and collagen for healthy, strong and flexible nails. The nail polishes also go on perfectly and there are so many colors to choose from!

product_name: Safari by Ralph Lauren for Women 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Sad but True!
review_text: Safari has been discontinued and is no longer sold in department stores. I think it was one of Ralph Laurens better perfumes. I wore it from the year it came out until it was discontinued. I was complimented on it constantly. I even had a guys angling to sit by me just to breathe in the scent. The reason I think it was dicontinued - it changed into a totally different scent after only a few months of the opening spray. The real fragrance didn't last long enough. My sister had a bottle that she kept for three years - it reeked! I know, I know, all perfume ages, but not like Safari did. It happened to fast, within three months or less. So I loved it, and wore it for years, but I can understand why some people complained about it. I was thinking about making a purchase here at Amazon, but I don't want to get the old smelly stuff.

product_name: Safari by Ralph Lauren for Women 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: I LOVE SAFARI!!
review_text: I HAVE BEEN WEARING SAFARI FOR 15 YEARS AND I LOVE THE WAY IT SMELLS.  EVERY TIME I WEAR IT, PEOPLE ALWAYS ASK ME WHAT PERFUME I'M WEARING.  I LOVE IT AND WILL WEAR IT FOREVER!  IT IS MY "SIGNATURE" FRAGRANCE

product_name: Estee Lauder Lip Defining Pencil (Deluxe Sample): Beauty
title: Defines Lip Line
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The new Estee Lauder lipsticks seems to be very moisturizing and smooth and this lip liner helps to keep your pouty look all in place. The lipstick alone does not give you well defined lips and this liner really takes the look from a 5 to a 10. You can apply it before or after you apply lipstick and it works equally well. If you can find the cognac shade, it goes very well with the sumptuous lipstick. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Kenneth Cole R.S.V.P.: Beauty
title: delicious
review_text: this product is the most seductive scent ever. i would reccommend it for any occasion where you need a gift for a man

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: Warm amber goodness!
review_text: Burberry Brit is one of my staple fragrances ... I'm on my third bottle which my mother thankfully supplied me at Christmas this year. Brit has a deep, warm vanilla amber scent, but it is not sweet. It is rich and oh-so-slightly woody, with a creamy undertone. It's fairly long-lasting too. If, like me, you're not big on florals, you'll appreciate Brit's spicy amber glow. I don't find it particularly strong, but then my tastes in fragrance run on the strong side (as long as it's not overpowering). I know I'll love this one for years to come.

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: My Signature Scent
review_text: My mother bought this perfume for me two Christmases ago. At first I thought it was too heavy. However, once I started wearing it I fell in love with it. I've never received so many compliments on a perfume in my life. Men and women randomly stop me in hallways, in restaurants, and the street ti ask me what I am wearing. "You smell so good..." I wear it everyday now and am on my third bottle.

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: My husband said it smelled like a 'urinal cake'
review_text: I loved it but my husband told me the first thing that came to his mind was that it smelled like a urinal cake.  Needless to say, he ruined it for me and I don't wear it. Damn him and his active imagination

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: Warm and delicious!
review_text: I absolutely adore the Burberry Brit fragrance! As someone who dislikes floral scents, this scent is for me. I absolutely adore the deep vanilla and spice accents. While it may be a bit intense for summer, it is perfect for fall and winter. The scent also wears well throughout the day. Unlike many other, perhaps less expensive perfumes, this scent will stay with you throughout the day. I love catching just a hint of the fragrance as I take off my coat or untie my scarf on chilly days. Buy it for yourself or as a gift, you will not be disappointed

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: Fabulous!
review_text: I have searched for a great perfume for many years, and have finally found it! Burberry Brit is sexy, yet not overpowering. Both men and women are attracted to the smell, and I suggest smelling it in Vogue and then ordering several bottles before it is out of stock

product_name: Amor Amor by Cacharel for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: My favorite!
review_text: Every time I wear Amor Amor lots of people ask me what I'm wearing.  It is my absolute favorite fragrance and I got a great deal on it.  Thanks, Annett

product_name: Amor Amor by Cacharel for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: IT MAKES THE WORLD GO ROUND.....
review_text:
What is it they say about love?  A better question might be what don't they say about love?  It makes the world go round.  What the world needs now is more of it.  It's a many splendored thing.  A moments madness.  The list goes on and on. .Little wonder it's also the inspiration for a bold, seductive new fragrance from Cacharel.	
	
	It arrives in a brilliant red bottle, the color of a heart, the shade of passion.  Amor Amor is both romantic and vivacious with top notes of pink grapefruit, blood orange, sweet mandarin and black currant.  Heart notes are found in apricot, red rose, jasmine melati flower and lily of the valley.  

	Available in 1 oz, 1.7 oz. and 3.4 oz. sprays, it promises to be a highly coveted fragrance at an affordable price.

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Poured Candle 50 Hours: Beauty
title: THE BEST CANDLE
review_text: I HAVE USED MANY CANDLES BUT THE VOTIVO CANDLES ARE TOTALLY DIFFERENT FROM ANY OTHER CANDLE IN THE MARKET. EVEN WITH OUT LIGHTING THEM, THEY WILL TREAT THE ROOM WITH THEIR GREAT SCENT, AND ONCE YOU LIGHT THEM THEY WILL BURN FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD YOU COULD IMAGINE. SIMPLY THE BEST.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: The Ultimate Question!
review_text:
We lose so much time over it - and you know what I'm talking about, you debaters of scissors v. tweezers - but God has told me to tell y'all to rest your souls. Thusly: Proper nasal care can only be accomplished with tweezers.

Yes, there's pain. But pain is the holy child of vanity, to whom we must bow down

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: You get what you pay for...
review_text:
Is so true of this product.  I have to admit when I first saw the price tag of this product, it was half out of curiousity that I purchased.  I mean could a pair of $20 tweezers be THAT much better than the ole $1.75 or $3 pairs at home?  

Well if your asking yourself that question, YES!  These things have amazing grip and can pull the tinyiest of hairs.  Things that you would have to dig with normal tweezers until you finally rub your skin raw.

Without a doubt, you will get your moneys worth from this product as well as be amazed at their performance.  It's the type of "WOW" that makes you feel like, "How did I ever get along without these before".

Worth every penny and I'll never buy another cheap tweezer again.  These have lasted for years and still retain their fine point.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Terrific Tweezers
review_text: These tweezers rock! This gets all the hairs you want gone fast and effectively. This is also easy to manuever around the eyebrow area.  I can get into spots and get the hairs I could not get with any of my other tweezers which I have since gotten rid of.  This is worth the money.  These tweezers will last and last and you will not be disappointed. You can also choose from a variety of cool colors too. I highly recommend these tweezers.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Best tweezers I've EVER used!!
review_text: I had an Amazon reward certificate and was looking for something practical to use it on.  It so happened that I needed new tweezers.  I read the reviews and thought I'd give these a try.  Wow, I can't believe the difference in quality from any other tweezers I have ever owned.  They almost seem to adhere to whatever your are trying to grasp.  It is so easy to precisely and almost painlessly remove even the finest eyebrow hair.  Tweezerman Tweezers ROCK!

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: The best tweezers!
review_text: I should have bought these a long time ago! These are the best and definitely worth spending a little more money

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Loyally just right!
review_text:
Tweezerman really are the BEST tweezers on the market and to say, the cutest. With different colors to choose from, the fact that they're reliable and strong only adds to them.

Tweezers gone dull and you need them sharpened? You don't need to go to the store anymore and buy new ones. Tweezerman sharpens them free of charge with S&H so long as you send in an envelope.

My final point: I don't see a point in buying any other tweezer since you buy one pair and it lasts you the rest of your life

product_name: The Body Shop Tropical Shower Sensations Gift: Beauty
title: Carousel of colors and flavors
review_text:
I picked this up at my local Body Shop store because truthfully I couldn't decide between all the flavors in large sizes, and I got to try all these beautiful scents in one easy purchase. Great for traveling or simply displaying in the bathroom, these little gems make me happy in the morning when an extra ompf is needed to get me out of my warm bed and under cold water!

My favorite so far is the Mango, and in all honesty I don't like to eat the fruit raw, but I love it in mixed recipes and in bath and body products.

Each wash is 2 oz. and enough for a few uses, making it fun to do a switcheroo every time I hop in the shower. The scents are Tropical Mango, Coconut, Passionfruit, Strawberry, and Satsuma.

Mango is lovely, slightly tangy and bitter , like a grapefruit but with a velvety sweet scent that is a pleasure to use. This is a gel.

Coconut is another favorite, creamy and juicy, like real coconut milk, not overly sweet but pure and authentic smelling. This is a creamy wash, not a gel.

Passionfruit is refreshing, green and purple at the same time, smells like a mixture of kiwis, lemons and melon,  a contrast of tart and sweet succulence.

Strawberry is not bad but has a hint of plastic in it, it's not the truest flavor I came across, but it seems pretty hard to fabricate, since the fruit itself is slightly sour and delicate. For a shower gel its fine, but if this was a flavored food product I'd probably skip it. This comes in the gel form.

Satsuma is crazy, a sugary tropical warm orange like hot flavor that turns my bathroom into a wicked retreat from reality. Very strong and pungent but fun when I'm in the mood for intense tropical experience. This comes in the gel form.

Overall I have nothing but praise, although the price is a bit high, but the whole set is a fun way to try out all the flavors and makes a great gift, it also lookS beautiful in the see through container, like a carousel of colors waiting to be enjoyed.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Givenchy Very Irresistible Givenchy: Beauty
title: Awsome.......
review_text: It's "girly" enough but it's on the spicy side. I love it. It lasts so long but doesn't stay in your clothes. I always get comments and men seem to love it, it's very uplifting.....

product_name: Givenchy Very Irresistible Givenchy: Beauty
title: Delicious, Intoxicating AND Irresistible
review_text: Okay, it's silly but I originally tried this cologne because Liv Tyler was the model for its launch. Well, I was hooked.  Although its base is rose peony, it's not strongly floral.  When it dries down, the scent that captivates you is the star anise - spicy and a little addicting.  And it lasts so long!  One little spritz and I'm good for the whole day

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Volumactive Expansion Spray Blow Drying Treatment Fine and Delicate Hair 3.3 oz 100 ml: Beauty
title: The BEST Volumizer
review_text: I am definitely a Beauty Junkie. I have tried probably every Volumizing product on the market (including the much lauded Phyto Volumizer) but I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this Kerastase product so much! It is by far the best! It leaves your hair silky smooth and with TONS of volume (even after blowdrying it for 15 minutes). It doesn't leave behind a gummy or sticky residue. It is a little expensive but it has a lot of bang for its buck and I would even pay more for it if I had to. I will never use anything else again!

product_name: Carol's Daughter Loc Butter: Beauty
title: useful and pleasant
review_text: I've enjoyed using the Loc Butter on my natural hair as well as my two pre-teen daughters' natural hair.  It is a tad heavy and sticky - just right for keeping plaits, braids, and twists, frizz free.  I also found that it works well for hot combing and flat ironing.  The scent is kind of musky/spicy, and we like it.   It doesn't overwhelm, but is quite pleasant. (the scent is not as pleasant with heating implements) I don't think it would be good for daily use because it would probably get very heavy and greasy (it has beeswax, and multiple oils).  I don't have locs but it works beautifully for my daughter's two strand twists.  The twists hold together well with minimal frizzing.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Loc Butter: Beauty
title: Awesome Product!
review_text:
Carol's Daughter is the leader in natural body cosmetics!!
She takes pride in creating ONLY the best! Using natural ingredient free from harsh chemicals!!
Thank you Carol's Daughter your mother should be proud!!!
Tamu Ngina; [...

product_name: The Body Shop Sheer Lip Shine: Beauty
title: Best lipstick I have tried so far!
review_text: I purchased 07 sheer caramel, which is a pretty accurate description of that color (warm medium brown).  It's a very natural and beautiful shade.  It is sheer as the name implies, but there is still a good amount of color.  The smell is pleasant and sweet, with a smooth and light texture.  It has the coverage of a lipstick and the moisture of a gloss, without being sticky. It's kind of like a tinted lip balm, but the color is more substantial.  It actually feels better on my lips than a balm.  The appearance is semi-glossy, but not goopy looking like a traditional gloss. There is a little bit of sparkle, but it's not chunky like glitter.  I would prefer it not to have any sparkle at all, which is my only complaint (and why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5).  I think the formula is shiny enough that it doesn't need any added glimmer effect.  Honestly, I think cosmetics manufacturers have gone overboard with putting glitter in virtually everything.  Enough already!  Anyway, I still like this lipstick despite my sparkle hang-up.  It is packaged in a slim silver tube that is very chic, simple, and easy to apply.

product_name: Marilyn Hair Treatments by LUSH: Beauty
title: Use with The Blonde for better effect
review_text:
I have really long hair and I use a lot of conditioner. This is a good treatment for the winter when my naturally blonde hair starts to grow out a bit darker than my summer haircolor. It doesn't lighten hair very dramatically at all on its own, but it conditions very well and smells really nice, like a lemony custard.

I use this by warming it slightly in the microwave so it sinks in better, then applying it to dry hair. I tie my hair into a bun and wait twenty minutes or so, then rinse it gently, wash my hair using The Blonde shampoo, and condition with a light conditioner.

If you don't really want your hair lightened much and just want a bit of extra shine and highlight to your blonde hair, this is great on its own. If you want a more dramatic effect, The Blonde solid conditioner works for a stronger effect. The Blonde can be drying though so I do like to use them together

product_name: Carol's Daughter Kizzi: Beauty
title: Kizzi helps your hair Stay Put!
reviewer_location: Chicago, IL ( by way of Washington, DC
review_text: I have been using Carol's Daughter for about 8 months now and I swear by this line! I really like the Kizzi because it slicks down edges, baby hairs and tames frizz. IT ALSO WORKS WONDERS ON BRAIDS! I have been able to keep my cornrows an extra two weeks because I tie my hair with Kizzi every night. Here is the secret: Spary hair with CD Black Vanilla Leave in Conditioner and then use about a quarter size of Kizzi on the edges of the braids all the way down to wear your real hair ends. In the morning your hair will look smooth, polished and shiney!

product_name: Happy Heart by Clinique for Women With A Happy Heart 4 Piece Set Includes: 1.7 oz Perfume Spray + 2.5 oz Body Cream + 0.2 oz Perfume Roll-On + Cosmetic Bag: Beauty
title: Happy Heart by Clinique - My Fave
review_text:
Happy Heart - even better than the original Happy which is a bit more Citrusy. I use it day or night.    

The roll-on applicator is a great idea as it's small enough for a purse yet lasts and lasts. It doesn't leak and the cap doesn't fall off either.

Even better, it doesn't seem to trigger attacks with my allergic friends. (You're wearing perfume but I'm not sneezing! OMG! What kind that?)

product_name: Happy Heart by Clinique for Women With A Happy Heart 4 Piece Set Includes: 1.7 oz Perfume Spray + 2.5 oz Body Cream + 0.2 oz Perfume Roll-On + Cosmetic Bag: Beauty
title: Happy Soul and Smell
review_text: It is a delightful remind of spring, daises and true love during cold and dreary winter months. I love using this set while traveling, to bring back home memories and make it easier to be away.

product_name: Murad Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel: Beauty
title: PERFECT!
review_text: I have been using this product and product line since I was 27 and I am now 38.  I will never use anything else - it works SUPER for me. Is it why people think my daughter & I are sisters??  Maybe so..... LOVE LOVE it!

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel: Beauty
title: great product.....
review_text: I cannot say enough about this fantastic product.  Clinique has (probably) the best skincare system out there.  My face was a mess and other moisturizers had clogged my pores and caused terrible breakouts.  The moisturizing gel is the third step in their skincare regime.  First, you wash your face with the Clinique soap best-suited for your skin type (normal, dry or combination/greasy), then you follow it with their clearing lotion (ie exfoliant/astringent) and you (finally) apply this gel to your face and neck.  Their moisturizer is also available as a lotion for for drier complexions.  The gel is oil free and gets the job done, without clogging your pores, while working with its PH balance.  Highly reccomended!!

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel: Beauty
title: Clinique Moisturing Gel 2oz pump
review_text: I hsve used clinique moisturing gel for years and this was the first time I had the pump.What a thrill as only a little bit is extracted and that is all one needs

product_name: Healthy Sexy Hair Pumpkin Potion Leave In Conditioner with Ginger Root 300ml/10oz: Beauty
title: Healthy Sexy Hair Pumpkin Potion Leave In Conditioner with Ginger Root 300ml/10oz
review_text: My hair never looked so goo

product_name: Healthy Sexy Hair Pumpkin Potion Leave In Conditioner with Ginger Root 300ml/10oz: Beauty
title: yummy
review_text: I originally received a sample of this in the mail.  I was so surprised by the scent of pumpkin and spice when I used it that I immediatley went online searching for it to purchase.  Not only that, but the scent stays with you all day.   There will be moments when I have to smile because I catch it in the air.  Smells so good you want to eat it.  It also made my hair feel so healthy and soft.  Definitely worth the price.

product_name: Roger & Gallet Sandalwood Boxed Soap Set - 3 x 3.5 oz.: Beauty
title: Best soap in the world
review_text: I've been a fan of Roger et Gallet soap ever since I went to Paris in  the late 1970's. The products are world class and just the thing to make one feel like a King

product_name: Fresh Soy Formula f21c Face Cleanser: Beauty
title: The best face cleanser I've found
review_text: My skin is very sensitive and my face breaks out in little bumps if I use anything that leaves a residue.  I've used Cetaphil soap for years but it doesn't get all of my eye makeup off.  I bought this on impulse and it's the best face cleanser I've ever found.  It doesn't dry my skin at all, and removes every speck of makeup.  I think the soy also evens out my skin tone

product_name: Fresh Soy Formula f21c Face Cleanser: Beauty
title: A Fabulous, Gentle Facial Cleanser & Toner Combined
review_text:
Fresh is a company I have been interested in for awhile. I first fell in love with their product line when I used the Brown Sugar Body Polish. I knew this was a product that would become a beauty staple around my house. I have since purchased several other items from Fresh, especially from their skincare, bodycare and fragrance lines. I find that Fresh Soy Formula f21c Face Cleanser is one of their best products. And the price is right, especially given the cost of some of the high quality face cleansers on the market.

This unique face cleansing gel is fabulous. The texture is somewhat unusual. It is a clear gel and feels very slippery when applied. The gel foams, ever-so-slightly, almost like a lotion,  and feels great on dry skin. The face cleanser does an excellent job of removing makeup and leaving the skin soft, comfortably clean and glowing. It also tones the skin, revives the eyelid area and conditions the eyelashes in the process. What could be better? And all in one single product! 

For the winter months, this is a perfect compromise between the fresh, clean feeling of a gel and the comfortable, soothing feeling of a lotion. It is my normal-to-dry skin's new favorite cleanser. Soy Face Cleanser contains rose extract, cornflower extract, glycerin, mallow extract, chamomile extract, ginseng, aloe, soybean powder, soybean protein, borage seed oil, cucumber extract, vitamin A, vitamin E and gentle cleansing agents.

I cannot recommend Fresh skin and body products enough - and the Fresh Soy Formula Face Cleanser is a winner!
JANA

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Eye Shadow Duo: Beauty
title: Love this Color!
review_text: This is my absolute favorite eye color. It looks great with Clinique's Moonlighting Touch Base for Eyes

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Eye Shadow Duo: Beauty
title: Best Eyshadow!
review_text: Clinique makes the best eyeshadows, they're so light and creamy! They don't crease and don't fade. I love Beach Plum (a rich, shimmery plum and shimmery-gold duo), it perfectly accents my brown eyes. They're a bit pricey, but they're worth every penny

product_name: Sugar Cosmetics I Taste Like Sugar Mini Lip Gloss Set: Beauty
title: Becca's Opinion
review_text:
I bought this product at Sephora with some friends. I'd give it a 4 out of 5.

POSITIVES:
absolutely beautiful colors
they can be layered and mixed to create new shades of gloss
small enough to fit in the tiniest pocket or purse
the case is worth keeping after you use up the glosses, I still have mine :)
the flavor is delisious, so realistically the taste of sugary sweetness

NEGATIVES:
they are a little on the sticky side
all the shades cannot possibly look good on one person. I recommend spliting them with a friend
they are not long lasting, the flavor lasts longer then the color
the tubes are incredibly tiny

product_name: Sugar Cosmetics I Taste Like Sugar Mini Lip Gloss Set: Beauty
title: Great Gift and Great Lip Gloss
review_text: I recently bought these for celebrity gift baskets.  Everyone went nuts over the flavors and colors A++++

product_name: Karma Handmade Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Jewel like beauty
review_text:
I have been a rabid fan of Lush products for years, often having them shipped to me form Canada before they were so easy to buy in the states. Each product has a certain Earthy quality it and its nice knowing that people who make each an every single on of these luscious concoctions love them as much as the customers do and it shows!

The Karma soap looks like a slab of gold in shape but is really reminiscent of candied carrots I would find in fruit cakes I used to eat as a kid growing up in Poland. The clarity of the fiery jewel like color is quite attractive as it makes for a nice soap to put in the guest bathroom or for self spoiling with hand made soaps that beat the other cookie cutter types by a mile. The scent itself is a breezy breath of citrus with mother earth embedded deep in the core. The lavender and patchouli are a whisper, a shadowy backbone to the zest and freshness. The multidimensionality of layering scents makes fore a very uplifting experience and I can smell the heady aromas every time I was my hands with it. I also love the Karma perfume, which smells almost exactly as the soap.

I find that my hands don't get as dry when I use this glycerin soap as opposed to regular soaps laden with chemicals and lards. But I always use a hand cream afterwards, preferably one of those gooey Burt's Bees creams that come in heavy glass jars. My hands never crack or get dry no matter how dry the air or how cold it is when I used Lush soaps and a good hand cream.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Karma Handmade Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: love this soap
review_text:
for its fresh, zesty, orangy smell.
generally, i prefer soaps to shower creams and lotions, cause soaps make me feel squeeky clean. but they also dry my skin out like crazy, so i try not to use them often.
but when i do, then it's one of my three favorites among lush soaps.
the fact that they are all natural and not tested on animals is added value in my world :

product_name: Karma Handmade Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Totally Yummy!
review_text: Smells like Xanadu!  I feel like grabbing my rollerskates, putting on some lip gloss and flying into another dimension! The forward note is tangerine/mandarin, for me. Followed by tiny fingers of vanille absolute with an earthy backbone. I absolutely hate patchouli. I know they say there is patchouli in here, but I can't detect it even as it wears throughout the day. Good lather, translucent fire orange color are stimulating. The soap goes well with the Karma Shampoo bar. This is one of my top 3 favorite Lush products.

product_name: Karma Handmade Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: The only soap I'll buy
review_text: I make my own hand and body soaps, so I'm pretty picky about anything store bought. I was given this as a sample with an order from Lush, and I loved it instantly! I haven't been able to duplicate the smell exactly in my own soaps, so I am willing to buy it just for that alone. I'm not a fan of patchouli in general, but it doesn't smell as strong on this soap. It blends very well with the other scents and smells divine! My entire bathroom smells great when it's hung up drying in the shower. I highly recommend it and have even given others karma as gifts, too

product_name: Burberry Brit For Men: Beauty
title: A Complete Fragrance
review_text:
I love the pattern of squares on my 100 ml cologne bottle. Just one spray can make me feel utterly happy and clean. Im wearing shorts and a tshirt on this lazy Sunday and listening to Nick Drake, for some reason, his voice sounds even better with Brit sprayed on me. I know there's no logic but it's just how it is. This cologne can be described as a superstarter to one's eventful day, either at home whiling away time or when outside conquering the world.

It's funny and loveable how Amazon describes this fragrance by correlating it to British Men.(" Epitomizing the modern, British man, Brit For Men captures a relaxed elegance and effortless style.") I must say it makes me feel confident.

Thanks mom. You should go to Dubai more often and get me Burberry colognes.

product_name: Burberry Brit For Men: Beauty
title: Something special... spicy and yet mellow.
review_text:
This cologne is very spicy and is perhaps one of my favorites next to Burberry Fragrance for men. Whereas Burberry Fragrance was fruity, Brit is slightly different in that the scent is more floral and certainly more spicy (and yet not as heavy or as complex as London).

For something as spicy I'm quite surprised with how light this one comes across (in comparison with London which was just a little too heavy for me). I have to agree with other reviewers and say that it's still by far very masculine indeed. Vanilla is immediately noticed, as well as more fruity undertones which only increase as time passes ("juicy green mandarin," perhaps but you need to be a poet to sense it... again, admittedly sweet). Warning, this product is not nearly as citrus/lemon/orange the Burberry Fragrance; instead it follows in London's footsteps and provides spiciness in yet a more minimal way.

Can be worn in a similar fashion, either for formal affairs or casual ones, though I'd gather it is selected most often for casual ones (I did find a similarity between this and Chanel's Allure, and yet I find Allure much more pungent... I love Allure, but if you want something a little more mellow for the night, this is your product).

Sweet, spicy, deep and complex Brit marks itself as my second favorite from the Burberry line - sharing the spot right on top with the Burberry Fragrance! Can be worn daily without becoming tiring, a feature which I think it holds over Burberry Fragrance whose citrus-sweet Fragrance may become an annoyance

product_name: Burberry Brit For Men: Beauty
title: Very sophisticated scent
review_text:
This cologne smells great! It is much more appealing than Chanel's Allure Sport, Versace's Blue Jeans, or Ralph Lauren's Polo.

If you like a slightly stronger, sophisticated scent, this is a great option

product_name: Sympathy for the Skin Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: ALL SYMPATHY FOR YOUR SKIN
review_text: THIS IS ANOTHER ONE OF MY FAVORITE PRODUCTS.. I CAN ONLY SAY I HAVE VERY DRY SKIN AND THIS PRODUCT IS FANTASTIC.. VERY MOISTURIZING AND CONDITIONING.. IT DOES EXACALLY WHAT IT SAYS AND HAS A WONDERFUL SCENT TOO...

product_name: Sympathy for the Skin Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: A staple lotion for me!
review_text:
This vanilla-banana cream smells delectable, mostly light natural vanilla with a hint of fresh banana, and is a thick cream that works well and is very nourishing. It doesn't sink in anywhere near as quickly as Dream Cream or Skin Sin (or the now- discontinued Potion), but it works wonderfully for chronically dry skin. 

I apply it in a thin layer after a shower or bath in the morning and the moisture thins it out so it sinks in right away, and a thicker layer at night so it can sink in fully while I sleep.

The lotion works perfectly, but honestly, I buy it for the scent. It isn't often you can find such a naturally scented vanilla lotion. The banana is so light you can barely smell it, but gives an overall feeling of an ice-creamk or lovely dessert scent, rich and delicious.

I have a problem with most synthetic scents changing on my skin, and so I am pleased that Lush relies so heavily on natural plant essences and infusions.

product_name: Sympathy for the Skin Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Best body moisturiser ever
review_text: I have used this body moisturiser for a few years now, and never found one that makes my skin as soft and "dewy" as this one.  The ingredients must be really pure, it is the best and worth every cent, wonderful for when you have been in the sun too

product_name: Sympathy for the Skin Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Yummy
review_text: This stuff is great for when my skin needs some hardcore moisturizing. It might feel greasy to some, but when your skin is very dry, it's not like that. If you feel it's too heavy for day wear, it does work great as a nighttime treatment. It sort of smells like oatmeal and vanilla ice cream to me

product_name: Sympathy for the Skin Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Love the smell, but a little too greasy for me
review_text:
I initially bought Sympathy for the Skin because of the smell (I just love it!) and for the reviews that I've read.  I was really excited to get home and try it, but was a little disappointed.

The lotion smelt wonderful, but when I used it, my hands felt like the lotion didn't really sink it.  Sympathy for the Skin left a slight shinny coat on my hands and felt a little oily.  At first I realized that I was using too much, so I started to use less and that really cut back on the oiliness.  Since I use this at night time, it's not that big of a deal, but I wouldn't use this as a day cream because it's a little to heavy for me.

Besides the oiliness, the lotion did work well and really helped to moisturize my hands, which are usually dry and cracked because of so much dishwashing.  I follow with LUSH's Lemony Flutter Cuticle Butter and my hands have never looked better.

Will try some of LUSH's other lotions first before I buy this again.  Overall good product

product_name: Sympathy for the Skin Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: WHO NEEDS SYMPATHY NOW?
review_text:
"Sympathy for the Skin"?  Hmmmmm, seems to me that consolation, condolences and commiseration should be extended to those who don't have a small tub of this at the ready.  They probably have to put up with dry, tight-feeling skin crying for a kind word or, better yet, a moisturizing body lotion.

Truth be told,  skin needs our utmost attention - summer, winter, springtime and fall.  In the cold months it's buried under so much warm clothing that it can't breathe or dehydrated by central heating.  In the warm months it's parched by the sun and blown dry by air conditioning.  Yet, it stays with us.

When we're having fun, our skin is not.  Did you have a ball dancing all night?   Think of how those tired tootsies feel in the morning.  Were you the belle of the beach playing volleyball in your teeny-weeny bikini?  Too much sun, eh?  Your skin took it not only on the chin but all over your toned bod.  It needs TLC.

"Sympathy for the Skin" is a rich, soothing potion of a lotion laced with healing ingredients such as Almond Oil, Cocoa Butter, Sandalwood Oil, Fresh Bananas.    Creamy in appearance it's a luxurious emollient that is absorbed quickly by your grateful skin and leaves a lovely subtle scent of vanilla.

There are those days when I must have a soothing hot bath, which I know depletes skin of moisture.  So, after bathing I simply pat skin with a towel and then smooth on "Sympathy for the Skin" while skin is still damp.  Works wonders!  That's what's known as having your soak and silky skin, too

product_name: Estee Lauder Idealist Micro-D Deep Thermal Refinisher 75ml/2.5oz: Beauty
title: Micro-D Rocks my Socks!
review_text: My skin WAS horrible! Since I have started using this product I feel my pores are much smaller... the overall color of my skin is more radiant, and my skin feels amazing. In other words, my skin is soft and noticeably different. After one use, I felt immediate results

product_name: Estee Lauder Idealist Micro-D Deep Thermal Refinisher 75ml/2.5oz: Beauty
title: It really works!
review_text:
I am 32 years old and have been using the Idealist system for about 2 weeks now and I have definitely noticed an improvement in the softness/clarity/blotchiness and overall appearance of my skin. I had acne as a teenager and I also have larger pores. The scars have diminished (not completely, mind you!) and my pores are much smaller. I also have sensitive skin and this system does not irritate my skin. My skin also tends to be flaky when irritated and the idealist system had taken care of the problem. My advice is that you must use the Idealist in the morning and at night for your skin to get the total benefit of the micro-d product. I tried using the Idealist only at night and the benefits were not as great. It's expensive, but worth it. By the way, I have been using the .5 oz. sample size of the micro-d and I still have plenty left after about 5 uses. So this stuff will last you a very long time. You only have to use it twice a week (use it any more and it will irritate your skin). 

The first time you use it, you may be a little uncomfortable as there is a definite warming sensation. It also felt a little uncomfortable and made my skin a little pink, but it subsided very quickly and it was all worth it in the end. 

Great product

product_name: Fresh Sugar Deodorant Antiperspirant: Beauty
title: Fresh is fresh ;-)
review_text: I love Fresh's Sugar perfume and so I was busting to try this deodorant to match.  Not disappointed at all!!  It's great and smells exactly the same as the fragrance.  It's so more like lemon than sugar, but that's what is fresh about this which makes it perfect in summer time.  It glides on well and doesn't leave white marks at all.  When your body temperature is warm, the smell comes out more which I love and if you use it with the matching perfume, then you're going to smell great all day long.  I love this, but I use it only on weekends because it's too nice to use it all up only for work

product_name: Chanel Levres Scintillantes Lip-gloss: Beauty
title: Miracle lip gloss!
review_text: This is excellent lip gloss. I agree with the previous reviewer. It lasts for a very long time, doesn't feel sticky or liquidy, and doesn't taste bad. Unfortunately, the price is painful at which to look and on the wallet, but it's worth it. I've only tried one color (because of the price) and I think it works very well with my natural skin tones (I use 'Cry Baby'). Next time you're looking for a new lip gloss, check out this one. It's definitely worth it

product_name: Clinique Naturally Glossy Mascara: Beauty
title: lovely, but not waterproof
review_text: This is a great alternative to clumpy, mascara and clear mascara - it's in the middle of those two.  It's thin and doesn't clump AT ALL, nice and moist, quick drying.  No smell, and good for my sensitive eyes & contacts.  It doesnt do much besides darken the lashes, though, nothing fancy, and it WILL come off if wetted/rubbed.  It won't run down your face, but it won't survive a good cry

product_name: Clinique Naturally Glossy Mascara: Beauty
title: Best Mascara
review_text: This is my favorite mascara hands down.  I've used this for years now. Even if I do stray I always come back to it.  I use this in Jet Brown.  I think this is the most flattering color for me.  This mascara is phenomenal; it never clumps up on my eyelashes, looks phony, spikey etc.  It goes on perfect everytime and makes my lashes look natural, thick and full. I never can tell when a particular wand is getting old because it does not start to smell bad and it never clumps up like a lot of other mascaras do.  I highly recommend this mascara.  And I will always buy it as long as Clinique never discontinues it.

product_name: Clinique Naturally Glossy Mascara: Beauty
title: The only mascara I will wear
review_text: Every time I am convinced to try a new product, I regret it.  This mascara is great.  No clumps and it doesn't flake away.  I stays put through tears but isn't too hard to remove.

product_name: Clinique Naturally Glossy Mascara: Beauty
title: No clumps!
review_text: Beautiful effect, smooth, long, elegant eyelashes, no clumping whatsoever. Lasts all day without running, and washes off with soap and water. And, the price is right. Frankly, I don't want to use any other mascara

product_name: Dr. Hauschka Translucent Make-up: Beauty
title: A safe, natural makeup with outstanding cover qualities.
review_text: If you knew what was in your makeup, you'd be horrrified. Dr. Hauschka products are some of the best out there--they are made with the safest ingredients available, and they are of very high quality. I love all their products

product_name: Dr. Hauschka Translucent Make-up: Beauty
title: superior and natural makeup
review_text: I love this product.  It smooths on beautifully.  You don't ever feel like you have makeup on but it gives just the right amount of coverage and helps nourish and protect your skin.  I also love the growing and manafacturing practices of this company.  I would recommend it to anyone

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel: Beauty
title: great product.....
review_text: I cannot say enough about this fantastic product.  Clinique has (probably) the best skincare system out there.  My face was a mess and other moisturizers had clogged my pores and caused terrible breakouts.  The moisturizing gel is the third step in their skincare regime.  First, you wash your face with the Clinique soap best-suited for your skin type (normal, dry or combination/greasy), then you follow it with their clearing lotion (ie exfoliant/astringent) and you (finally) apply this gel to your face and neck.  Their moisturizer is also available as a lotion for for drier complexions.  The gel is oil free and gets the job done, without clogging your pores, while working with its PH balance.  Highly reccomended!!

product_name: Carol's Daughter Lip Butter: Beauty
title: nubianqueen35
review_text: I received CD lip butter a few days ago and I love it. It naturally moisturizes your lips and makes them feel soft and buttery. It is not overly greasy or waxy like other lip balms. I would recommend it to everyone!

product_name: Clinique Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin Formula 200ml/6.7oz: Beauty
title: excellent for oily skin
review_text: Even in the cold Midwestern weather I have oily skin that's prone to breakouts and this is a great product for oily skin.  It cleans and removes makeup but doesn't feel as though it's stripped my skin of all moisture.  It is a little pricey but it's worth it and you'll have great skin that doesn't still feel oily, or feel too dry, after you wash your face

product_name: Rose Oil: Beauty
title: Comforting Woodsy Warm Rose Oil
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
"Highest of all the oils (Spiritual); approximately 320 MHz. It enhances the frequency of every cell, bringing balance and harmony to the body." ~Connie and Alan Higley

Many rose oils are reminiscent of a rose garden. This rose oil reminds me of a wild rose bush you would find in a cedar forest. There is a hint of comforting cedar wood with varied elements of fragrance not unlike a fine perfume. Spicy notes mingle with sweet rose perfection while delicate high points capture your attention. Of all the rose oils, this one has numerous elements to lift your mood and scent everything from bath products to laundry soaps. The highly concentrated oil will last for a long time. One drop of this in a spray bottle of spring or mineral water and you have a beautifully scented skin refresher. Put a drop on a  cloth and toss it in the dryer for rose scented towels. Add to your fabric softener or drop the tiniest amount on a card you are sending to a friend. 

The sheer value of this product is astounding when you consider how expensive rose oil can be. The high concentration is superior to all other rose oils I've tried and this is very affordable. In this case, you seem to get more than you paid for. If you are looking to add rose oil to your collection, this is the best one I've found for blending with other oils and making bath products and scenting products I use around the house. 

This oil will bring a poetic beauty to your life and can alleviate times of emotional upheaval. Use for dry skin (add to creams), addictive behavior, anger, despair, depression, grief, nervous anxiety, heart problems, emotional fatigue, irritability and insomnia. Since this is highly concentrated, you may want to blend it with jojoba oil first before mixing into beauty products. 

Caswell-Massey also sells a divine Egyptian Musk, Ylang Ylang and Lilac oil. Very affordable oils and unlike other brands were you have to almost pour the oils in the tub, a few drops will do. Highly Recommended. 

~The Rebecca Review 

P.S. The Aroma Vera Pearl Aromatic Pottery Diffuser with a cork lid is perfect with this product.

product_name: Salux Beauty Skin Cloth - Made in Japan 1 Cloth Assorted Color: Beauty
title: The best for the shower
review_text: I have been using these since sometime in the early 1990s. Before the web made them easier to find, we used to ask family friends visiting Hawaii to pick them up for us. I've recommended them to many others over the years because they are easier than a back brush, more vigorous than a wash cloth, and quick-drying. The Salux brand is rougher (and I think better) than the imitations I have since seen

product_name: Salux Beauty Skin Cloth - Made in Japan 1 Cloth Assorted Color: Beauty
title: Salux beauty skin cloth supersedes any other bath cloth!
review_text: Long enough to wash your back, will wad up something like a pouf, but the texture is perfect! You will wonder why you've ever used a cloth to wash your body (not ideal for the face with sensitive skin).  Makes super lather from your bar or liquid soap.  Rinses clean after every use. It will spoil you! Lasts for years with daily use

product_name: Chanel Aqualumiere Sheer Colour Lipshine SPF 15: Beauty
title: Are You Worth It?
review_text: I have tried many brands of lipstick, expensive and drugstore brands and this is the best lipstick I have found. I love the texture and sheer color. I was not certain if spending this much on lipstick would be worth it, but it definately was for me. No more searching...I found what I like and I will stick with it. Quality. That's this lipstick in one word

product_name: Chanel Aqualumiere Sheer Colour Lipshine SPF 15: Beauty
title: Worth the price tag!
review_text:
Chanel's Aqualumiere lipstick is, in my opinion, the best lipstick formula on the market. The lipstick goes on as shiny as lipgloss but has the texture of lip balm. The colors, though sheer, still have good pigmentation; the sheerness is actually a benefit because it allows the lipstick color to blend well with your natural lip color, lessening the chance that your lip color will come out looking unnatural. The Aqualumiere line of lipsticks do need to be reapplied more often than a less sheer lipstick, but the lasting power is still relatively high, and reapplication is less of a bother because of the lipstick's texture.

Though I have not tried all the colors, the pinks in this formula--Waikiki in particular--strike me as especially natural and face-brightening

product_name: Tweezerman Point Stainless Tweezer in colors: Beauty
title: the best
review_text: these are absolutely the best they get every hair easily..the points are soo sharp these are worth the money trust me id recommend to anyon

product_name: Hugo Boss Hugo Energise: Beauty
title: Great for the morning
review_text: The sport scent makes it very appealing to use in the morning, to go working with an energy feeling, as Hugo Boss Soul is more focused for the night use

product_name: The Body Shop Moisture Gloves: Beauty
title: They are great!
review_text: I love these! Wore my last pair out. I love that you can put them on after moisturizing and let them stay on for about ten minutes and then remove them leaving you oil free. They are really great. I also use them when I am touching photos or silver so I don't leave oil smudges on them.

product_name: Original Vetiver by Creed for Men 4.0 oz Millesime Spray: Beauty
title: The Very Best Of All
review_text:
Creed Vetiver is the greatest cologne ever
Very attractive to men and women
The very first time I've used Creed was on New Year'eve 
Then went to few paces such as Whiskey Park, Armani cafe,mostly everyone were asking the same question"what kind of cologne you have on" Few weeks ago,I was at this Lounge call Saint almost 90% of the people asking the same question " I replied that's CREED  one of a kind" buy it now,you will be thanking me later

product_name: Dr. Ci:Labo Basic Black Blemish Control Gel: Beauty
title: Great acne treatment!
review_text: We purchasedthis for oil control on someone with acne-prone skin, and as a base for makeup on oily facial areas. It works great for both. It has a smooth, cool texture that feels refreshing when applied, and is absorbed quickly, leaving the skin soft and smooth. I highly recommend it for acne treatment! One note though- It must be used on a daily basis for results.

product_name: L'Occitane - Lavender Pure Shea Butter: Beauty
title: The most wonderful stuff in the world...
review_text: I absolutely love this stuff. When I put it on my hands at night, in the morning they are so soft and supple. The smell is lovely, not too strong, not fake. I would recommend this to anyone

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Highly recommend!
review_text: It's true! This fragrance is different from others because it's subtle, but distinct and wonderful. This fragrance is breezy, clean, and cuddly. Love it and highly recommend the ebubbles seller

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: My favorite perfume!!
review_text: Everytime I put on this scent at least one person asks me what I am wearing!!  I remember my trip to Ireland when I first put it on.  It is a very clean scent that is appropriate for any occassion

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Great Cologne
review_text: A friend of mine uses this cologne and I asked her where she got it from, and she wouldn't share with me.  She said I'ts from Ireland and you can't get it here.  I looked it up on Amazon.com and found it.  Thank you so much for carying it, I'll make sure to tell her she can order it here now

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: My dog loves this.... and so do I!
review_text: My dog acutally introduced me to Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray. She really likes it, so i picked up a bottle...and i love it too! wish i had found this a while back! everyone comments about it...smells so good! you can't go wrong with Inis Energy!

product_name: Kenzo KenzoAmour: Beauty
title: gorgeous and feminine
review_text:
i received this scent(the mid-sized white bottle)for christmas 2006. it's beautiful! a really warm, vanilla-ish scent that lingers forever and is incredibly comforting and sexy as hell. this is a little much for office or casual wear, but i definitely think it would go over well for evening or a date-i've found that guys respond pretty well to it.

also-the packaging is exquisite. the bottles are solid fuschia, white, or orange and shaped like a decorative bud vase. i love the box the scent came in, white with some sort of pink and orange bird on it. i liked it so much that i actually store the perfume in the box rather than throw it away. a really, really special product

product_name: Kenzo KenzoAmour: Beauty
title: Best scent ever
review_text: I just returned from a cruise on the Carnival Spirit.  I was given a sample in the gift shop.  I went back down to purchase it as I loved it.  Alas, they had carried 120 bottles on the previous cruise which they sold out of immediately as their price was so good.  Most perfumes are offensive to my sinuses but this one is not overpowering and the scent really is wonderful.  I just can't imagine someone not liking it.

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Toilette: Beauty
title: light and pretty
review_text:
This scent is very light and sugary. I enjoyed it because I prefer fragrances that are more spice-based than floral-based, and in this scent the note of sugared almonds stands out to me the most. It's a good summer scent because it isn't too heavy and it's very sweet.

I gave this a four out of five stars because while it was enjoyable, it just didn't have that certain 'something' that makes a fragrance truly memorable

product_name: Dr. Ci:Labo Hibiscus Enriched Aqua-Collagen-Gel Moisturizer: Beauty
title: It really works
review_text: This is a very fresh gel. I really felt the difference in my skin next morning. Actually, in my opinion, I don't need to apply "a cherry-sized ball" of gel to my face. If I do so, I feel my face a little sticky, however, a smaller amount of gel will let your skin feel comfortable and will do the work. It smells slightly of natural bergamote and hibiscus. I think is perfect for sensitive skin but if you are allergic to alantoine this gel is not for you. Thank you

product_name: Philosophy Falling In Love Set: Beauty
title: I fell
review_text: I was never able to find a scent that wasn't too much flower or too much musk.  This one is perfect.  The scent is feminine but not too flowery and the bubble bath is very rich.  Only a little is necessary.

product_name: philosophy falling in love perfumed fragrance solid: Beauty
title: Philosophy does it again
review_text: If you are a fan of subtle, high-quality scents, this product is for you. If you want to stand out with your fragrance (ie: We can all smell you from miles away) skip this scent. I'd also recommend Philosophy's Kiss Me gloss and any of their vesatile body washes. Enjoy

product_name: Hot Milk? BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Heaven in a Bubble Bath
review_text: I love this! It has a powdery, clean smell that isn't overpowering- but even if it was, I could probably stand to smell it all day long! I used maybe about 1/4 of the bar, but it still made nice masses of bubbles! Unfortunately, the bubbles disintegrated pretty quickly...I didn't mind though, and didn't feel it was worth taking off a star, because it left my water scented and my skin soft. This is something I wish I could use at every bath

product_name: Hot Milk? BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great on a cold night
review_text: When the weather outside is blustery and ugly, I like nothing better than to get into a hot bath with half a sweet Hot Milk? bubble bar and a spicy Hot Java ballistic. It's one of my favourite Lush bath combinations, for an all-over warmth and general good feeling that will carry you into dreamland.

product_name: Kent OG2 Hair Brush: Beauty
title: Excellent hairbrush
review_text: I grew up using a square hairbrush just like this one, and was disappointed that all of the hairbrushes that you find in stores were much narrower.  This is an excellent men's hairbrush

product_name: Ooh La La Natural Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Silky and Sensuous
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The deep purple color of this soap holds memories of grapes and lavender blossoms. In fact, the organic grapes in this product are from Provence. The main natural ingredients are lovely and include: Water, Lavender, Honeysuckle, Marigold, Grape Juice, Rosemary Oil, Thyme Oil, Lavender Oil and Rosebuds. I found the fragrance to be very elegant, like walking through a field of lavender along a paved path in high heels by the light of the moon in a chiffon gown. It is silky, sensuous and very relaxing. Recommended for romantics who dream of outdoor gardens filled with lavender and kisses by rosebushes. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Ooh La La Natural Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Smells REALLY good!
review_text: I ordered this soap just because I thought it would look nice in my bathroom and not to really use. I do have to say, however, I am pretty tempted. One warning I do have to say is it was 90 degrees (F) outside the day this soap showed up. It was not melted but was pretty soft. We just let it sit for an hour in the AC and it formed right back up. It did take a while for this soap to show up though so dont order it if you dont want to wait

product_name: Mustela Post Partum Body Restructuring Gel: Beauty
title: Still using it but...
review_text: It seems as if it is working for me.  I notice a slight difference in the 2 weeks that I have been using it.  But on the bottle it says to use it for a month.  I have noticed, though that it makes my stretch marks more visible? I don't know if this could be caused by my tummy having more elasticity and firming because I am also working out, or from the product. However, it smells nice and is not sticky like I thought it would be.  Overall, it is a wonderful product and I would definately recommend it to anyone whose tummy was severly stretched during pregnancy

product_name: Philosophy Oxygen Peel Kit Kit: Beauty
title: I really like it.
review_text: It is very delicate. Does not irritate the skin. Complexion looks improved after 2 or 3 times of using it. My friends notice the difference and the skin gloves. It is not easy to wash it off and you get a lot of hydrogen foam vs only few enzyme tablets(little minus for that),does not work toward acne but I'm still happy with it

product_name: Merkur Progress Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Good in most respects.
review_text:
This razor's best virtue for me is its ability to cut a thick beard without clogging like the multi blade cartridges out there. I always dreaded shaving after a hunting or fishing trip. Even the old Gillette twist-open requires that it be partially opened to properly rinse out the cream and whisker sludge. This guy has a nice round cavity underneath each cutting edge that allows water to wash everything away. Even shaking it in a bowl will clear it most of the time. If it should clog, one can blow it out quite easily. I have only used the lower settings, and they are all I seem to need with good blades. The Gillette blades sold in the US are horrible, BTW. Use Merkur blades or Swedish Gillettes for the best shave.

My only complaint is that the alignment marks to match up the top and body are faint, and the adjustment marks do not line up properly, and I am forced to do math to get repeatability. I have higher expectations for German engineering and the price.

This thing is overpriced for what it is, but a good shave is worth a lot, and you only buy it once

product_name: Eau Des Merveilles by Hermes for Women 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: A Personal Accent...
review_text:
..Is Eau Des Merveilles, which I've been wearing for the past year.
I have tried and tested many, many perfumes over the years, and never really settled on one definitive scent personal to me.
 If a good fragrance is important to you, then you know the one you choose is key - I'm glad to say I have found it. 
And simply, if you wear Eau Des Merveilles once, both men and women, will complement you on how good you smell! Now, who can get bored of that?

product_name: Eau Des Merveilles by Hermes for Women 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: simply the best day perfume!!
review_text: This perfume contains all my favourite components especially vetiver, bitter orange and 'BALSAM of PERU'. It takes me away to where I want to be, (teases my imagination), even though I may sometimes be at a boring place or with boring people. It makes me smile, and I can't wait to start the day after wearing it :)

product_name: Eau Des Merveilles by Hermes for Women 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: This is how all  perfume should be...
review_text: This is truly the best.  It does not burden the senses, it enlightens them.

product_name: Eau Des Merveilles by Hermes for Women 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Wonderful fragrence
review_text: I bought this perfume in LA and love it.  So glad it is available through your site

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Hair Smoothie: Beauty
title: just to let u guys know...
review_text:
for anyone who's going to try carol's daughter products... these products are for african americans.  so it might be a little greasy and thick for others.
just an fyi

product_name: Shiseido Pureness - Moisturizing Gel-Cream 40 ml/1.3 oz: Beauty
title: The Perfect Non-Greasy Moisturizer
review_text: It's hard to find this product online on the places you'd think it would be like Sephora.com, Gloss.com or Neiman Marcus.com.  I am very happy to have found my favorite moisturizer on Amazon.com so now I don't have to brave the crowds in the brick and mortar Sephora or, let's say Saks Fifth Avenue where they hawk you like carnival barkers.  Even the Sephora salespeople have become more aggressive than their original philosophy of letting the customer browse uninterrupted.  This moisturizer is perfect if you hate anything greasy on your skin.  It's light, yet truly moisturizes and is the least sticky and stinky of any I've ever tried.  If you even get one or 2 pimples from other moisturizers, you won't have to worry about using this one.  Great for oily or combination skin.  I'm forty and I still love it!  Anything else slides off or makes me break out.   The only annoying thing is that my boyfriend uses most of it

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: Love it
review_text: Go smell it before you buy it.  You'll probably like it, but it's not smart to buy fragrance without smelling it first

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: Great deal and quick
review_text: Had no problems in ordering and shipping didn't take too long. They shipped some little freebies which was a nice plus

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: Clinique Happy Cologne
review_text:
This is a very good cologne 
Cologne is not suppose to be overbearing ...... FOOL 
because after 15 minutes your sense of smell is dulled by it but EVERYONE can stilll smell it 
Trust me I got several phone numbers from this and scored as well 
To the one who is gripping ..you must be Beavis or Butthead

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: Excellent, and yes it does last...
review_text:
To those of you saying "it doesn't last, I can't smell it half-way through the day", you're not supposed to be able to smell your own cologne, if you can, you've put too much on and will most likely offend people with your overbearing scent!!!!

It smells great and lasts as long as any other cologne I've tried

product_name: Shiseido Sun Protection Stick Foundation SPF 35 - PA++: Beauty
title: shiseido stick foundation spf 35
review_text: This makes your skin SO soft. It'd be great as a moisturizer by itself, but it has high sun protection too.

product_name: AVEDA Shampure Conditioner 8.5 fl oz/250 ml: Beauty
title: Heavenly scent and does not weigh down hair
review_text: This conditioner rinses well and does not weigh down your hair.  The herbal scent is an added bonus for when you are trying to relax in the shower

product_name: AVEDA Shampure Conditioner 8.5 fl oz/250 ml: Beauty
title: Great Conditioner
review_text: I love this conditioner, I use it in conjunction with the Shampure Shampoo.  This conditions my hair without weighing it down and leaves it looking healthy and easy to comb.  The scent is fantastic too.  I highly recommend this product and will buy this again

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Love it, love it, love it!
review_text: This bomb is my favorite one.  It smells so fresh and fruity, but really light and crisp as well.  Made my bathwater soft and amazing.  I work at LUSH in NYC and I sniff this thing at least 5 times a day.  That and Happy Pill.  That thing is awesome

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: if you like fruit loops cereal then try avobath
review_text: I swear, this bomb smells exactly like Fruit Loops cereal, which just happens to be my favorite cereal. Nice and fruity scent, with a hint of flowers in the background. It turns your water a pretty, pale apple green color. Oh and I didn't have any glitter in mine either, so don't worry all you glitter-phobes

product_name: Kai Gift Set: Beauty
title: beautiful scent!
review_text: kai gift set is complete - scent is very floral, like gardenias. be advised that the size of the kai roll-on perfume is smaller than a standard lipstick.  $40 is pricey for the quantity, but the roll-on is convenient and i carry in my purse - the spring-like scent is worth it!

product_name: Lancome Hypnose Mascara Waterproof: Beauty
title: Glamorous
review_text:
I don't know how many mascaras I own but there's always about two or three that I hold as my favorite or just for different occasions. One of those is Hypnose and I really like it for when I go out or just looking for that dramatic look.

Postive:
1.) The look: I've never neccessarily wanted to wear fake eyelashes but they do look almost perfect. Unbelievably, Hypnose gives you that look. It's amazing just how feathery your eyelashes look.
2.) Flaking: This mascara never really flaked on the bottom of my eyes. That's really important to me.

Negative:
1.) This mascara starts out great but after about two and a half weeks it starts emptying out on you. This might just be because there were days when I reapplyed it or simply because I just used it pretty well (1 coat just about everyday because of how much I liked it).

Summary: If you want that natural yet "are those real lashes?!" look, then you'll like this mascara. I'm giving it four stars instead of five simply because of how long it lasts but if you use it once it a while, then it will last you a while

product_name: La Mer The Lifting Intensifier 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: The Best
review_text:
I have tried many products and this is the VERY BEST

It really lifts your face... you must try it!!!

product_name: The Body Shop Coconut Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: It is wonderful
review_text: The aroma of this coconut perfume is impressive and truly long lasting. Even my boyfriend likes it a lot. I agree that it is a little bit pricy although the quality is excellent. Recommended

product_name: Estee Lauder Daywear Plus Multi Protection Anti-Oxidant Lotion SPF 15 50 ml: Beauty
title: Estee Lauder Daywear
review_text: I have normal/oily skin and since I couldn't find another daily lotion for my face I tried Estee Lauder Daywear Plus SPF 15. I use it every day, I usually mix it with my foundation, so it wouldn't break out my skin. The lotion feels good and smooth. It also has a great fresh cucumber scent.I've used it for a while and am very satisfied.

product_name: Sugar Cosmetics I Scream 4 Sugar Mini Lip Gloss Set: Beauty
title: My fave glosses, hands down!!!
review_text: These are just WAY too amazing!! I'm warning you now, if you buy them you will be addicted! I bought this set and split half of it with my best friend, and both of us are hooked and will be ordering a new set for ourselves again. You get so many flavors and they all taste like sugar and smell sooo great! My favorite is the "lemon custard" flavor; if Sugar made that flavor in a full-sized gloss, I'd buy 10!! These glosses are so delicious, you won't be dissapointed!

product_name: Burberry Burberry London: Beauty
title: one of my favs
review_text: this scent really catches attention, has a sweet, warm smell...truelly one of my favorites

product_name: Burberry Burberry London: Beauty
title: I Smell a Classic...
review_text:
After smelling a sample in Glamour Magazine, I ran right out and bought a bottle today.
It's clean and uplifting. You'll adore it

product_name: Reincarnate Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Reincarnate...
review_text:
I add mild color to my hair with "Caca Marron" henna, and I like to use this shampoo in conjunction with a henna treatment.  I feel like it helps the color to set and gives it a good depth. Reincarnate itself does not add color but does add shine (most LUSH solids seem to do this for me)!

Solid shampoos can be intimidating if you have never used them before, but LUSH makes the experience fun and easy.  A little bit of this bar rubbed into your hair creates a nice lather and leaves your hair feeling fresh and clean.  A solid shampoo is also good for travel, as it doesn't spill or explode all over your luggage

product_name: Reincarnate Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: The Shampoo Bar Your Hair Dreams About
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Deepening the color and shine of your auburn or brunette tresses is quite possible without needing to use a hair color. Although, an initial coloring with Henna may be recommended, this extends the color and shine and can make your hair feel like it has more body and bounce. 

This is super fun to use in the tub and really works up a lather in your hair that is rich and moisturizing. Rhassoul mud conditions the scalp while Persian Henna gives you color. The scent is like an earthy apple cider with hints of orange and rosemary. Dry this bar out between uses by keeping it in a soap container. 

What I noticed most after the first use was how long my hairstyle lasted and how my hair had that "whish, whish" super clean feel. I also noticed a deepening of the color. If you have oily hair, this is a deep cleansing shampoo that will give you a lot more body along with the shine. Follow with a rich conditioner like LUSH American Cream or the earthy Jungle bar. 

Why are shampoo bars so much fun? This one definitely makes my lush favorites list. If you used one of the lemony shampoos (I Love Juicy) and it took out some of the color, this seems to work well to restore the color. 

~The Rebecca Review
I read the Lush Times like a novel...

P.S. A LUSH sampler would be fun to order!

product_name: Reincarnate Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Love the highlights and smells soooo good!!
review_text: Solid bar shampoos never sounded that appealing to me,but I thought I would give it a chance.I live in a hard water area and this lathers very well,and after about a week,I had faint highlights that where starting to show.The smell of this shampoo is herbal in base,and pretty much comes out in the rinse.Overall I thought I would never fall in love with a solid shampoo,but I did and it makes me want to try more of the Lush line of shampoos

product_name: Comptoir Sud Pacifique Vanille Abricot: Beauty
title: Delicious Fragrance
review_text: This smells exactly like its name, vanilla apricot. This is positively addicting when you put it on.  The notes are not too overpowering or synthetic, it just smells good. You smell soooo delicious and when you put it on it makes you think of somewhere warm and sunny. I've been wearing it all this winter and living in Minnesota I need all the warmth I can get.  This also makes me happy when I put it on.  I highly recommend trying this.

product_name: Comptoir Sud Pacifique Vanille Abricot: Beauty
title: Yummy scent!
review_text: Great scent for the middle of winter when you're dreaming of going someplace warm - great scent for summer when you are someplace warm.  The vanilla and apricot blend isn't too fruity, it just smells wonderful.  I wear this scent when I'm cranky and don't want to go to work - it cheers me up and makes me want to earn money so I can buy a plane ticket to Tahiti....I wear it a lot..

product_name: Philosophy On A Clear Day Super Wash For Oily Skin 3.3oz: Beauty
title: I like it so far...
review_text: I've been using this face wash for about about a month now.  The first two weeks I noticed my skin was fairly dry, which was a nice change from being so oily.  It's a good face wash, and I will probably buy it again.  The only thing that's a little strange, and I read about it in another review, is the smell.  There is a slight sulfur smell right after I rinse off my face, but it really doesn't last long

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Detangling Comb: Beauty
title: PREMIER HAIR CARE
review_text:
This is an I-didn't-know-how-much-I-needed-it-until-I-bought-it review. For heaven knows how long I've been distributing conditioner throughout my hair with my fingers, massaging it in, thinking I was doing a thorough job. Not so! After using this Fekkai Detangling Comb the difference was amazing. Obviously, the mere use of fingers had not been able to release the conditioner as it should have been. 

The comb is handcrafted in France with wide teeth, smoothly rounded to protect hair. It's a beauty on its own, as you can see. It allows easy distribution of the product whether it's a conditioner or a treatment mask. It's a breeze to use in the shower and also ideal for comb-outs. 

Frederic recommends applying a conditioning treatment 1-2 times a week to maintain healthy hair. To date, I've been very well pleased with all of Frederic's products and his advice. This is a man who knows hair and how to care for it. 

- Gail Cook

product_name: Roger & Gallet Extra-Vieille Boxed Soap Set - 3 x 3.5 oz.: Beauty
title: A luxurious experience
review_text: Came across these at a hotel in Cannes and loved them! The perfume is vigorous and masculine and very refreshing. Ive also used the Sandalwood soaps and they are just as luxurious..

product_name: Exuviance Skin Caring Foundation - 1 oz: Beauty
title: The BEST Foundation EVER
review_text: I first began using this product in 2003, when I had my first series of microdermbrasion treatments.  I use very little & it WORKS!  The last place where I purchased this product no longer carries it & they attempted to steer me to Walgreens, where, of course, it was not to be found.  I am 56 years old & strangers that have never met me think I am in my eary 30's.  I am flattered but proud to be the woman I have grown to be.  It took me a while to find this on the internet, but now I have found it once more...I am HAPPY

product_name: Talika LIPOCILS Eyelash Treatment Gel - 10 ml / 0.35 oz: Beauty
title: It does work, give it time.
review_text: I purchased this item because some of my lashes had fallen due to my adding warm compresses to my eyes because I had a bump on one of my eyes.  Anyhow, as they had fallen in sporadic clumps, I started looking on the internet for something to help them grow and thus found Talika Lipocils.  I added it to my few eyelashes, from the root up and didn't notice anything until about a month later.  When I did notice the growth and fullness it was kind of sudden.  I was thrilled.  For the first time since they fell I have added mascara to my eyelashes and they are the longest they have ever been.  All I can say to those that feel it doesn't work is that maybe you are not giving it enough time and hoping to see dramatic results in just a few weeks.  Please give it time, it does work... so much so that I am going to order more to ensure I never run out.

product_name: Talika LIPOCILS Eyelash Treatment Gel - 10 ml / 0.35 oz: Beauty
title: I love this stuff
review_text: I really love this stuff. My eyelashes have become very fragile and thin in the past year and this helped tremendously. It also helps my eyelashes stay put when I remove my makeup. There is definitely and improvement in thickness and strength

product_name: Talika LIPOCILS Eyelash Treatment Gel - 10 ml / 0.35 oz: Beauty
title: TAKE IT F ROM TALIKA !
review_text:
It began following World War II at the ophthalmologic services of the Hospitals of Paris when Dr. Danielle Rochas developed a plant based anti-bacterial unguent to heal those who had suffered serious facial burns.  The results astounded, not only did this unguent heal but her patients' eyelashes grew back!

	So Talika was born and since 1948 these laboratories have produced remarkable products that reverse signs of aging on delicate eye skin.  I've been more than well pleased with my purchases from this French skin care company, especially with Eyelash Lipocils.  This is a plant-based gel that stimulates and replenishes eyelash growth.  It took about four weeks for my lashes to be longer and fuller.  I simply applied in the morning and at bedtime to clean lashes.  Thank you Talika!

	Among the efficacious ingredients in Eyelash Lipocils are Nettle Extract, Horse Chestnut, Allantoin, Soy Lecithin, Witch Hazel, St. John's Wart and Apple Extract.

product_name: Dior 5-Colour Eyeshadow - Tender Chic 990: Beauty
title: Every color you need
review_text: While this palette is pricey and definitely luxe, it contains about every color anyone needs for every day--from blush to deep brown. The light center color can be used for highlighting under the brow, the darkest color can be used wet for a liner. If you buy just one palette, this might be a great choice

product_name: Clinique Blended Face Powder and Brush 03 Transparency: Beauty
title: The best
review_text: I've used this loose powder for 20 yrs (since high school) and while I have tried other brands from time to time I keep coming back to Clinique because it's the best. It offers great colors that work with all complexions, it has the best texture, goes on like a dream and leaves skin with a wonderful finish. It also has no offensive odor or perfumes. I am blonde with fair to medium skin. My complexion has golden undertones and can be sallow if I apply the wrong makeup colors. Transparency #2 works best for me. I would highly recommend this product

product_name: Clinique Blended Face Powder and Brush 03 Transparency: Beauty
title: Special Application Tips for Flawless Finish
review_text:
Oil Free and perfect for any skin type, Clinique's Blended Loose Powder has been a top seller and award winner in the prestige makeup category for decades. Each jar (fits on your palm) comes with a swivel out brush (retracted it's about three inches long) that can be used for application and or touchups. Inside the jar is a plastic screen that helps you keep the majority of the powder in the jar even during application -- wonderful for those of us who tend to drop and spill.

Special Tips For Use:
To get the most flawless finish, Clinique recommends an application technique they call the "powder rub down." Tip a tiny amount of powder from the jar into one hand.
