Very gently rub your hands together to lightly distribute the powder across both palms. Then use your hands to `wash' your face with the powder. This technique helps keep the hairs on the brush from pushing the powder into the pores, accentuating their appearance. Any excess you see afterwards can be whisked off with the swivel-out brush that comes with each jar. 

If you like to touch up with powder throughout the day but don't want to carry the jar or a pressed powder compact, simply dip your brush into the powder in the top of the jar, swivel retract the bristles containing the powder, pop the cap on top, and you can now drop the brush into your purse for a loose powder touch up any time. 

Color Notes: 
-Transparency 1: Has almost no discernible color. For the palest of the pale. This powder is only a hairs breath darker than baby powder.
-Transparency 2: This powder has a noticeable light pink tone. Excellent for perking up a sallow (yellowish) complexion. Also great for Asian women who want that porcelain look.  As a redhead, I find this color powder gives my skin the perk it needs without leaving me looking orange as so many others do.
-Transparency Neutral: Like Transparency 2 without the pink for when 1 is too light and 3 is too dark.
-Transparency 3: Clinique's most popular color . . . by far.  If you've ever received a sample in a Gift before, this is it. A very safe color to choose.
-Transparency 4 Plus: A little darker than the old Transparency 4. For when you have a tan or if you're olive or Hispanic without much of a tan.
-Transparency 5: For when you're dark naturally. A big jump from Transparency 4 Plus. Dark Hispanics and the well tanned fit well here.
-Transparency 6: For dark complexions such as African American, though won't be dark enough for the darkest of dark.
-Transparency Bronze: For all skin colors. Although all the other colors are matte in finish (no shine, glisten, or sparkles) Transparency Bronze is the exception. This color is a deep bronzing powder that goes on the skin surprisingly light and with a hint of sheen for that sun-kissed look. Very pretty applied to the cheeks with just a tiny hint on the forehead, nose, and chin

product_name: Merkur Futur 4 Piece Razor Set: Beauty
title: Back to the basics
review_text:
My background:

I used a Gillette Sensor. It was okay. I upgraded to Sensor XL. It was pretty good. I tried a Mach 3, and I hated it -- it felt like I was wiping my face with a wall of blades. I finally settled on Sensor 3 -- at nearly 2 bucks a blade. It got the job done, but there was no real joy in shaving. Considering I have to do it at least once a day (twice if I'm going out at night) the process should be more enjoyable.

After quite a bit of research, including newsgroups and customer reviews, I splurged and got the Merkur Futur (though I got the chrome finish). 

Shaving is awesome, and I literally look forward to it. Lathering up the shave cream (I use Crabtree and Evelyn Sandlewood) with this brush is a real treat. Super soft, holds a ton of water, and results in a thick lather. (Be warned, the first few times you use it, it stinks like wet badger... but it goes away).

The razor itself is heavy... I mean heavy. Which is good, because you need to let the razor do the work -- NO PRESSURE, OR YOU WILL TAKE OFF YOU FACE). The main difference between this razor and shaving with cartridges, is that you actually feel the blade against your face (as opposed to a chunk of plastic).  Anyone who has had a shave with a barber knows how great this feels.

Once I got the technique down it is as close and smooth a shave as I have ever had. Finishing up with a cold water splash, non-alcoholic toner / aftershave, and a moisturizing lotion, is an invigorating way to start the day.

Please note: as stated above the brush smells a little "badgery" at first, but it goes away. The head of the razor does not pivot, so you have to follow the contours of your face. And the head itself it bulky, so you have to work on your technique around your nose, and under you chin.

In sum, this razor adds an old-school, refreshing routine to my mornings. I love it, and would whole-heartedly recommend it.

product_name: Merkur Futur 4 Piece Razor Set: Beauty
title: Smooth shaving
review_text: Have had this for about 2 years now, switched from the run of the mill razors to this and have never been happier, The bush holds up great and the razor is heavy and makes it feel as if you ae using a solid piece of equipment, which you are, very little maintainence on the razor, change the blades and rinse when changing.  Will not go back to disposable type again

product_name: Merkur Futur 4 Piece Razor Set: Beauty
title: Fantastic Shave
review_text: This is a fantastic de shaving kit for wet shaving.  It seems expensive but however when you do the research and look for these items individually its not that pricy.  The razor sells for $60 the brush $80 and the stand $65.  I purchased this for  myself for Christmas 2006 and could not have been happier.  I have always had problems shaving with irritation and ingrown hairs.  With a proper shaving technique and some patience you'll be getting the best shave of your life.  The razor is adjustable meaning you can change the closeness of the blade for different shave settings( 1 to 6 progressively closer) and this razor scores highly on shaving review boards.  I would highly recommend this kit it looks great and is a essential to proper mens grooming.  Pick this up with some high quality shaving cream (Taylors of old bond street, trumpers, truefitt &hill) and a quality aftershave and enjoy.  Shaving can be an awesome experience, something you look forward to.  [...

product_name: Merkur Futur 4 Piece Razor Set: Beauty
title: What a shave!
review_text:
During my seven year shaving career, I've run the gauntlet of shaving implementations.  After shaving with contemporary disposable cartridge razors and electric razors with `goo', I was left with much to be desired.  Ingrown hairs and razor burn were starting to be a little too familiar.   

Upon taking the set out of the box, I was met by quality and heft from each piece and went straight to the sink for a test drive.  I didn't receive my Art of Shaving lavender scented shave cream until the day after, so I made do with the Aveno shave gel I had on hand.  The first thing I experienced while working up a lather with the badger hair brush, was the distinct smell of wet badger.  After a thorough washing and rinsing, the badger smell had subsided enough to continue.  I had read a few guides from classicshaving.com on the proper technique, but really there was nothing to it.  I made sure my skin was taught and let the weight of the shaver do all the work.  I found that it didn't take much longer than a normal shave, even on my first go.  It took me two weeks of shaving to get my first knick.  At that point, I was getting a little complacent and placed the razor on my chin at an odd angle.  It was very minor and I haven't repeated the folly.  

The smell of wed badger totally subsided after about three days of use; replaced by the soothing smell of lavender.  I'm looking forward to trying out other shave creams.  While the Art of Shaving cream provides adequate lather coverage, I feel that it could be thicker.  I am, however, only comparing it to contemporary shave gels, whose thousands of dollars of R&D could produce incomparable lather results.  I foresee me and my Futur in a life long relationship.  

I asked my dad why he never told me about the satisfaction you can get from a good double edged wet shave.  He said, "I don't know.  I guess it's just been so long since I've used one.  Right now, I'm using one with 4 blades that vibrates."  Guess what he got for father's day.

product_name: Olivella Virgin Olive Oil Face & Body Moisturizer Night Moisturizer: Beauty
title: Lovely fragrance - wonderful natural moisturizer
review_text: After developing contact dermatitis from a makeup sample, I needed a pure natural moisturizer that would not aggravate the condition.  Olivella Night Moisturizer was the perfect solution and I'm now a customer for life

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Sheer Hold Hairspray: Beauty
title: The best hair spray ever!
review_text: This is the best hairspray I've ever used! It goes on with a fine mist, that dries fast, so you can shape you hair, then spray again to set it. It's not stiff, yet the hold is amazing and I have very hard to hold baby fine hair. It's not cheap, but once I tried it, I can't live without it!

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Sheer Hold Hairspray: Beauty
title: Frederic Fekkai Sheer Hold Hairspray
review_text: I love this product! It works beautifully, doesn't weigh down the hair at all, but really holds it in place. It has a very nice fragrance. I highly recommend this product

product_name: Bobbi Brown Creamy Concealer: Beauty
title: Awesome Coverage
review_text: This is one of the most perfect concealers I have ever used. It goes on nice and creamy (does not pull on your skin when applying) and covers those imperfections.  You also do not need a lot of product to get the job done.  The colors are very natural and I have found a perfect color in Sand for me. I will buy this product again.

product_name: Armani Code by Giorgio Armani for Men 4.2 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Don't buy this stuff!
review_text: It's awesome and I want to be the only one wearing it

product_name: Drakkar Noir by Guy Laroche for Men 6.7 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Guy Laroche set the bar high!
review_text:
I was reluctant to get this one because it was one of the few I was already familiar with from the ole high school days, for many of the same reasons the other reviewer stated, it's been around for a long time and many already have good or bad associations with the scent and other guys who have worn it. I can understand why he gave it three stars, but I'm here to review it based on its scent and merits and not the pop-culture story that surrounds it. 
The fact is, Guy Laroche nailed an almost perfect scent right at the eve of the fragrance for men explosion. While its Polo Green counterpart tended to smell more to me like a pesticide in the bottle, this cologne is both decidedly masculine and decidedly beautiful at the same time. It has elegance and blatant animalism. It is musky and spicy without being floral or citrusy. The age and popularity and generation (zeroing in on age) associated with it will probably prevent me from overusing it, but it still ranks very high in scent tests from woman, possibly continuing to be the best fragrance out there. As for the synthetic scent the other reviewer mentioned, this is probably of the last made before the manipulation of benzene aromatics very common in most newer colognes that he probably likes a lot. Most likely its the lack of organic citrus notes that caused the statement. 
It's not hip or the newest thing, but damn does it smell GOOD!

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: The Ultimate Question!
review_text:
We lose so much time over it - and you know what I'm talking about, you debaters of scissors v. tweezers - but God has told me to tell y'all to rest your souls. Thusly: Proper nasal care can only be accomplished with tweezers.

Yes, there's pain. But pain is the holy child of vanity, to whom we must bow down

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Terrific Tweezers
review_text: These tweezers rock! This gets all the hairs you want gone fast and effectively. This is also easy to manuever around the eyebrow area.  I can get into spots and get the hairs I could not get with any of my other tweezers which I have since gotten rid of.  This is worth the money.  These tweezers will last and last and you will not be disappointed. You can also choose from a variety of cool colors too. I highly recommend these tweezers.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Best Tweezers Ever!
review_text: Tweezerman tweezers are by far the best tweezers I've ever purchased. They stay sharp for an incredibly long time making tweezing precise, quick and virtually painless. And when they do go dull, all you have to do is send them in for a free sharpening and in a week or so, they arrive back good as new. You can't beat that!

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: The best tweezers!
review_text: I should have bought these a long time ago! These are the best and definitely worth spending a little more money

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Simply The Best
review_text: Tweezerman tweezers are simply put - The Best - with capital letters!  I bought my first pair at Bed, Bath, & Beyond 2 years ago and I just now broke down to buy another pair because I couldn't even go without them long enough to send them in to be sharpened for free! I tell all my friends (and after one use of mine, they agree) that once you use a Tweezerman you realize that no other tweezers out there even come close to their quality or how well they work.  I have had to fight them out of the clenched fists of quite a few of my friends who have wanted to borrow them. How many times do you make "Rules" for a pair of tweezers?  My number one rule? You can use them, but not take them out of my presence!!  Definitely worth the money - in spades!

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Loyally just right!
review_text:
Tweezerman really are the BEST tweezers on the market and to say, the cutest. With different colors to choose from, the fact that they're reliable and strong only adds to them.

Tweezers gone dull and you need them sharpened? You don't need to go to the store anymore and buy new ones. Tweezerman sharpens them free of charge with S&H so long as you send in an envelope.

My final point: I don't see a point in buying any other tweezer since you buy one pair and it lasts you the rest of your life

product_name: LORAC Croc Palette: Beauty
title: Best Pallete
review_text: this pallete has been the best ever. i use it all the time and it goes well for all skin types.If you want your makeup to not be so bright and dark this pallete has the perfect shadows to brighten up your eyes and create a calm glow

product_name: LORAC Croc Palette: Beauty
title: Good quality....a little dark.
review_text: The make-up is very good quality and the colors are pretty, but they are a little too dark for someone fair-skinned.  The lighter colors aren't quite as light as they appear, so the whole effect is a bit dark.  It was a big sell at the store, though, so I think this is only a negative with some people

product_name: Sephora Face Complexion Brush: Beauty
title: Incredibly gentle and smooth.
review_text: This little brush is awesome. It makes your face incredibly smooth and the bristles are very soft and gentle, so it expoliates without scratching up your whole face. I am very happy with this purchase and I highly recommend it 2 anyone that wants beautiful, healthy skin

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession: Beauty
title: my favorite perfume of all times
review_text:
I have been using it for... uhh.. fifteen years?! 
It is the best blend of sweetness, spice, musk and character I have ever smelled.
There are so many perfumes, especially in the last decade, being launched, and they all smell so similar! They have so little character, and if they do, then they are either too weird, or too something. Or they give me a headache.
This one is unique. Guaranteed.

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession: Beauty
title: My all-time favorite perfume
review_text:
People who know me know that I am around or close by whenever they smell a trail of Obsession perfume somewhere near my home or office.

I started using Calvin Klein's Obsession when I was a freshman in college, back in 1992, and have used it ever since.  It's served me extremely well the past 14 years as I love the way it smells.  

The scent is, in my perspective, strong but sweet.  It is my favorite of the entire Calvin Klein collection, with Eternity a close second, and I buy it every chance I get whenever I'm going perfume shopping.  

I highly recommend it - well worth your money and a fabulous scent to be wearing.

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession: Beauty
title: OBSESSED!
reviewer: Katie Sachetti "just a girl in her mid-20s!"
review_text: my husband is OBSESSED with this perfume!  it is his favorite by far!  whenever i wear this perfume (and i wear quite a few different scents.....depending on my mood!).....this is the scent that he loves the best.  i know i'll get lots of attention and affection with this one!  buy it and wear it.....he'll love it!  :

product_name: Chanel Allure Lipstick: Beauty
title: best applied with your fingertips
review_text:
gives you a natural, sensuous pout as opposed to thick layer of color (which some lipsticks require) that can only make your face look sharp. not a good (smart) sharp, but opposite of sweet and feminine sort of sharp.
tastes and smells nice too :)

product_name: Mania by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Breath Taking Strong Manly
reviewer: Virgil Villani "Perhaps worthy of your precious time or for a particular  occasion"
review_text: Mania should definately be one of your "Eau de Toilette" spray. It is definately strong and manly - not to be worn to the office. It is a great evening , romantic, or weekend spray to share with those around you! I would recommend trying it first  since everyone chemistry and tastes are different so give it a spray  the next opportunity you walk by a department counter

product_name: Komenuka Bijin All-Natural Hair Care Set: Hair Shampoo & Hair Treatment / Conditioner: Beauty
title: Strengthens Hair
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
When I tried a sample of the shampoo and conditioner I had no idea that the next time I went to wash my hair, it would feel completely different. I had my hair up in a bun (I had put it up to workout) and when I let down my hair after it was dry it felt so much thicker and almost like I had more hair.

I was not quite sure why, but then I read about the strengthening effects of this shampoo and conditioner. My hair also felt so much cleaner and silky as if there was no build up and I had washed my hair in mountain spring water.

Ingredients in Shampoo: Water, Rice Bran, Rice Oil, Coconut Oil, Seaweed, Ginseng, Aloe, Wheat Powder, Swertia Herb.
Ingredients in Conditioner: Water, Rice Bran, Rice Oil, Coconut Oil, Seaweed, Ginseng, Aloe, Wheat Powder, Swertia Herb, Natural Vitamin E.

Since this product is relatively expensive, I may have to alternate it with other shampoos and conditioners, but it definitely works. The shampoo doesn't strip the hair the way other harsh shampoos do and I'm very impressed with the natural ingredients cleaning my hair so well. If you have fine or oily hair you may be especially impressed. You also only have to shampoo once, which saves time.

Results after one use:

Smoother Texture
Stronger Hair
Cleaner Hair
More Body - especially if you have fine hair

Looking forward to trying other products with rice bran. You can order a week's supply of this product to try. I think you will fall in love with the shampoo and conditioner.

~TheRebeccaReview.com

product_name: Komenuka Bijin All-Natural Hair Care Set: Hair Shampoo & Hair Treatment / Conditioner: Beauty
title: There IS a difference in shampoos and conditioners!
review_text: I have fine hair, a little dry but not too bad.  Have always controlled it with gel.  Try the conditioner - it thickened and settled my hair with one use.  I'm hooked

product_name: Shiseido Sun Protection Compact Foundation (Refill) SPF 34 PA+++: Beauty
title: Sun protection and foundation in one
review_text:
I have trouble to remember to put on sunscreen in summer on my face, and I don't think the moisturizers that purport to have sunscreen last all day. The Shiseido compact is a powder that can be used wet or dry and it has a lot of sunscreening power. It has a physical block and blocks UVA and UVB.

It's not easy to find a match (mine is darker than I typically use in liquid) but it goes on fairly sheer if you want to apply it dry. The compact itself is a very pretty beachy dark aqua and has a compartment for a sponge to use wet or dry. The refill means you get plenty of use from the compact. I really use this a lot in summer and find it's easy to carry and reapply for maximum sun protection

product_name: Vera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 oz: Beauty
title: Nice scent....
review_text: The scent is light and sweet--not to heavy or to sweet.  Great for daytime use

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: It worked for me!
review_text: I have had dark circles since I was young. As I got older (Im 38 now) it seemed to get darker. I am a makeup artist by profession, so believe me when I say that I have tried all kinds of concealers. Some went on smooth but the coverage didnot last and by mid-day there were those dark circles again. I literally had to carry concealer with me because I had to reapply atleast 3 times a day. The heavier concealers worked when I put them on but after awhile it would cake under my eyes, dry out and make my lines more visible and really made me look older! I was hesitant about Hylexin, like everyone, because of the price. I started using it but didnt see any results after few days. I guess it didnt help that I was constantly looking in the mirror.I started to get disappointed but kept on using it. I swear by the 3rd-4th week I could actually see a difference! My circles were way lighter and less noticeable! I dont have "bags" or puffiness, just dark circles and I have olive skin. As I continue to use it, it seems to be getter better and better. It might not take it away completely, but it sure has faded enough that I can now use a concealer (or just a fuller coverage foundation!) and not have to worry about it fading or caking. I feel bad that some people may not have gotten the results that they hoped for, but what do you have to loose! Yeah $95 is alot, but its cheaper and not as invasive as surgery. And it has the same 50/50 chance as cosmetic procedures. Everyones skin is different and reacts differently like any other skincare/cosmetics product. Also, you need to follow the instructions exactly! I applied twice a day and didnot skip any application. I tried very hard to stay out of the sun and used my same skincare routine. I will post another review in a few weeks and see if the circles improved anymore.  I hope this review has helped

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: This product DID help my dark circles and puffiness
review_text: I have had dark circles for many, many years.  They did not totally go away after using Hylexin, but they faded a great deal.  I am very fair so this might work better on people with fair skin, as several of the negative reviewers seem to have had darker skin.  BEST RESULTS were on the puffiness under my eyes, which had gotten much worse since I got a little older.  The skin under my eyes no longer sags at all, and superficial wrinkles are definitely minimized.  I feel like I look a lot better after using the product for several months.  I started out with a half-size product from a combo trial pack, and I liked it so much that I've bought the full size product now.  It last forever, so it's really not that expensive over time.  I think it's worth a try for people with similar problems to mine.  I guess everyone's different, but I've been quite happy with the product

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: I don't have dark circles any more
review_text: I have had dark circles my whole life.  I have bought and tried every type of concealer that is on the market. I get enough sleep, eat fairly decent and drink tons of water and I still have dark circles.  I read about Hylexin in a few magazines so I thought I would give it a try. I bought it thinking if it works great, if not, oh well.  So, I bought Hylexin at a department store about three months ago. After the first two weeks I didn't see any change. I kept using it and after four weeks, I could see a visible change.   I am still using it and I swear it keeps getting better.  It's expensive but it works. I would recommend Hylexin to any one with dark circles.

product_name: Clinique Quickliner for Eyes: Beauty
title: Love IT
review_text: I bought this last month in purple.  Looks awesome and it doesn't hurt when you put it on.  Best of all it stays on and if you set it, it will stay all day.

product_name: Clinique Quickliner for Eyes: Beauty
title: waterproof and really goes on smooth
review_text: Love this have almost every color.Goes on smooth no tugs.Blends beautifully

product_name: All Natural 100% Cotton Extra Long Japanese Beauty Skin Bath Wash Cloth/Towel by Estiful: Beauty
title: Hard to find natural fiber wash towel but not exfoliating
review_text: It is 100% cotton narrow and long wash towel. Well constructed but soft. Not really for exfoliating like others

product_name: Shiseido Pureness Pore Minimizing Cooling Essence 1.0 oz: Beauty
title: Fantastic Product
review_text: After first application you can notice reduction in pore size. After 6 months of use I am very satisfied with this products (all Shiseido Pureness line). Apply as instructed by beauty consultant or packaging - should be used as last "cream" before makeup application. Avoid eye area and mouth.

product_name: L'eau d'Issey by Issey Miyake for Women 3.3 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Very nice
review_text: Slightly floral, musky and clean at the same time. Great fragrance for the summer. Unfortunately, it doesn't last very long and at this price its definately a rip-off.

product_name: Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ 2-in-1 Cleanser: Beauty
title: Good Cleanser and Toner in one
review_text:
I have used Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ 2-in-1 Cleanser for months now, and I really like it.  Haven't had any recent breakouts and I love that this product really gets your skin clean.  I only use this product in the moring (I use something different at night) but plan to switch to morning use once my night product runs out.    

Though a little expensive for what you get, still an overall good product.  I will be switching to the individual AVON cleanser and AVON toner, only because I've read that using a 2-in-1 cleanser/toner is not as effective as using them seperately.  Besides, the Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ 2-in-1 Cleanser cost $12.00 for 4.2 oz, where the cleanser and toner by themselves cost $12.00 each but you are getting 5.1 oz.  So you are getting more for your money if you buy them seperately

product_name: Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ 2-in-1 Cleanser: Beauty
title: I love it!
review_text: Although its a bit more pricey than other cleansers, this product really helped clear my acne, oily face, and prevented further skin blemishes such as signs of aging on me, as well as my boyfriend's face. What's also great is that it seemed to tightened our face up, but not so much where it had a drying effect. We have tried everything from Neutrogena to Clinique and this product has been effective for us. I would be happy to recommend this product to anyone who has the same problems

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: Kind of early to tell...
review_text: I bought this stuff after reading all the great reviews.  My hair was 4b and very thick.  I hadn't had a perm in almost a year and a half.  I put it in myself and followed the directions exactly.  In the past, I've had really bad problems with relaxers burning my scalp to the point I've had scabs all over my head.  That's another reason why I tried this product.  It did burn, but not NEARLY as bad as other relaxers my stylist has used.  It was extremely manageable and not very uncomfortable.  I only left the product on my hair for the 25 minutes it recommends.    It took something like 12 shampoos for the stuff to neutralize.  My hair turned out curly instead of straight.  Guess I didn't "smooth" well enough.  I would def recommend to have a stylist put it in for you so you get the great results.  My hair looks really great flat ironed, but the true test will come after I've had the perm in for a few weeks.  My hair typically breaks off really bad right around the time that I need a retouch.  I am hoping that doesn't happen w/this product.  That will really let me know if it's worth the 60 bucks

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: Good Product Hair Healthy Always Looks Shiny
review_text: Product came on time.  I bought this a second time for a retouch and I am pleased with the results.  It is pricey but worth it.  i leave it on as long as I want to straighten it to my desire. With this product u have the freedom to do that, it will burn your scalp though, but that is after 40min, if you base it right, which I do.  When ur hair gets wet it doesn't really curl up, it frizzes out a lil, not like when you have a regular perm. Sometimes my hair looks flat though, needs volume.  My hair was really coarse when it was natural, now very straight and healthy

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: The Best Relaxer Ever !!!!!
review_text:
I agree with the person who wrote that it is "by far the most expensive relaxer" I've ever bought but it is worth it. My mum was the one who found it and I'm eternally grateful to her as it worked out fantastic. Thanx Mum :) 

I am used to using various box relaxers from the store (Gentle Treatment, TCB, Dark and Lovely etc) and none of these come close. I have a combination of European/Carribean hair which is thick and coarse and so I need a really good relaxer to make it soft and straight.My hair has never been this straight from a box relaxer and it actually moves! :)

There is none of the usual "burning" sensation that often goes along with most relaxers. Nor is there a strong overwhelming smell that is enough to knock you out.

The quantity of the contents is great aswell. There are very few relaxers that you find with enough Conditioner provided to be used again later on.

It is well worth the price.My personal experience gave Salon results at a slightly cheaper price yet more expensive than those sold at Walgreens. I'll stick with the Phytorelaxer.

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: Pregnant and in NEED of a relaxer
review_text:
I am an African-American female with long, thick hair.  I relax and highlight my hair, so imagine the hell I was in when I heard that you should not chemically treat your hair when you are pregnant.  I tried to go along with that, however after 8 weeks I was in dire need of something.  I searched the web for a safe product and found this relaxer.  After rinsing it out and using the phyto shampoo and conditioner I was horrified with the fact that my hair felt like straw.  I rewashed it with Keracare shampoo and conditioner and it felt normal again.  The phyto relaxer did the same thing as a cheap drugstore relaxer, however it has a pleasant scent and doesn't burn your scalp.  After doing 2 or 3 relaxers myself I started to notice breakage.  But I assumed that it was from being pregnant.  I stopped doing my own relaxers when my belly started to weigh me down entirely too much.  I called Phyto and they gave me a listing of salons that use the relaxer on clients.  The salon I went to explained to me that I didn't understand placement when it comes to relaxer.  I was pretty much overlapping the product onto previously relaxed hair.  The instructions say not to do it, but it is really hard to control that.  I continued going to the salon for the relaxers and my hair grew back.  
Now a year later, I continue to use the salon and the product.  I am breastfeeding my son, so I stay away from the chemicals still.  I suggest this relaxer to all of my pregnant friends that don't want to walk around with crazy hair.  I mean pregnancy makes you feel bad enough

product_name: Murad AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser: Beauty
title: Great Cleanser... Beware it's Gritty in Texture but that's why I love it!
review_text:
I'm 28 and have always had what I would call average skin, the kind that most women have. I have normal skin with a little more oiliness in the T-Zone and I get blackheads and the occasional breakout. I have tried all kinds of different product lines (Urban Defense, DDF, Dior, Philosphy, Bliss, etc.) and am the happiest with the results I get from Murad. 
I can't review just one product because I think the combination is what gives me such great results. I have been using Murad for about 2 1/2 years now so I have tried a lot of the Murad products and found a routine that works great for me. 

In the morning I use the AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser (love it! the gritiness gives you very smooth surface for applying makeup) then the Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel and the Skin Perfecting Lotion which I mix and apply together so that I don't use as much. Last I put on my Moisture Silk Eye Gel and I'm ready to go.  

At night I use the Clarifying Cleanser followed by the Clarifying Toner, the Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel, the Perfecting Lotion and the best product of all the Night Reform Treatment (see my review of that product for details, I love it!) and again I use the Moisture Silk Eye Gel. 

Once a week I throw in the Exfoliating Fruit Enzyme Mask and I have perfect skin if I stick to the program everyday. My skin looks and feels better than it ever has and people always guess my age to be around 23 so it must be doing something right! 

Top 5 Favorite Murad Products:
1. Soothing Lip Therapy
2. Night Reform Treatment
3. Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel
4. AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser
5. Clarifying Cleanser

Murad Products that I don't like:
1. Day Reform Treatment (too greasy and I hate the smell)
2. Purifying Face Scrub 
3. The products for combination skin - they are ok but the acne line is so mild that people with combination skin will see better results using it. (I have used both product lines)

product_name: Murad Essential-C Eye Cream SPF 15 (New and Improved!): Beauty
title: Nice Cream
review_text: This is a nice eye cream but it is way to expensive!   I wish it were 20 bucks instead of 50 bucks but then again Murad products are very high quality.  I only have been using this eye cream for a month and I do notice that is makes my eye area very mosturized.  I am sure if I use this for a long time I will see more benefits....so yeah this is a good qaulity product.  I will continue to use it...but I am not sure if I will rebuy because it is so expensive

product_name: Philosophy Makeup Optional Skin Kit: Beauty
title: Esthetician Approved
review_text: I highly reccomend this kit. I am an esthetician that has lots of trouble with hormonal breakouts on my chin, jawline and neck. I had been using a system with benzoyl peroxide that was just too drying, even though I do have an oily skin type. This kit is great. All of the products are full size (except the samples of the peels). The products are very concentrated, so I expect that this kit will last around 3 months. I noticed an immediate difference in my skin - brighter, firmer, healthier glow. I've now been using it for two weeks. I've had a few hormonal breakouts (right before my period) but they are very small and clear up much faster. It is really getting rid of  red scarring left over from previous breakouts and my fine lines around my eyes are certainly decreasing too. The sample peels in the kit are awesome. You can get 2 peels out of each sample set - so about a total of 6 treatments. I reccomend using the peels 2X week to get you started - it really kicks up the results

product_name: Bare Escentuals Handy Buki Brush: Beauty
title: Perfect compact brush
review_text: It wasn't really big enough for the morning coverage with the face color, but it is a wonderful touch-up brush to use for your compact.  I have mixed some warmth, pink gossimer, tinted mineral vail in my compact and it is good refresher late in the afternoon or before meeting coworkers afterhours

product_name: Bliss Triple Oxygen Instant Energizing Mask: Beauty
title: Tingly Good!
review_text:
I purchased this mask on the recommendation of a friend, who loves it. I've been using the mask two or three times a week for the past month - it leaves my skin hydrated and rosy. While it doesn't purport itself as an acne treatment, my skin overall looks much brighter and heathier. It also makes my face tingle pleasantly. 

I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a skin pick-me-up! It is worth the investment.

product_name: Bliss Triple Oxygen Instant Energizing Mask: Beauty
title: Really does work, friend recommended to me, glad she did
review_text: This product I use after I wash my face, I leave on for the instructed five minutes, then I rinse then apply my night gel (any product cream), However, I have been using this for the past three weeks, and I have already been told by friends that my face looks great, and what have i been doing different..  So with this I give this product a thumbs UP!!

product_name: Solano Original Universal Finger Softstyler Diffuser: Beauty
title: Solano
review_text: The apparatus seems to work just fine and the shipping and other issues involved with this purchase were great

product_name: Iman Cream To Powder Foundation .3 Oz.Clay #5: Beauty
title: Iman Cream To Powder Foundation
review_text: I looooove Iman Cream to Powder Foundation.  I especially like how well it matches my skin color (which is typically the biggest challenge in selecting a foundation).  I like the coverage - - most people don't even know that I'm wearing makeup. I will continue to order this product

product_name: Kai Body Lotion: Beauty
title: Glorious
review_text: Scent is my favorite self-indulgence. The way I figure it is that I may not be able to afford the finest clothes, the finest handbags, or the finest cars, but I can certainly afford the finest scents, and this is one of them. I first encountered Kai on a visit to L.A. Actually, I bought it in a flower shop. You know that fabulous smell that hits you when you walk into a high-end florist, the one that makes you feel as if you are instantly on vacation? That's Kai. I own the perfume and the body lotion. The perfume oil in particular is a very small size, but a little goes a long way. I get compliments every time I wear it. You deserve it, too

product_name: Carol's Daughter Khoret Amen Hair Oil: Beauty
title: Incredible
review_text: I've never done a review online for a product-but I can't rave enough about Khoret Amen Hair Oil.  I've been using that along with the Healthy Hair Butter with my relaxed hair and it's fabulous! It's great for moisturizing your scalp and ends (just use a little dab though-it is oil so don't over do it!). Plus, my hubby really, really likes the scent

product_name: The Body Shop Mango Soap: Beauty
title: Smells wonderfull
review_text: Smells great. Loved this soap. Not too moisturizing but scent makes up for it.

product_name: Ojon Shine and Protect Hair Ritual Kit: Beauty
title: great for trying the product range
review_text: I like everything in this set.  I have colored treated, oily hair so I was kind of concerned that this wouldn't work for me, but it does! I just don't use too much if it. I have been washing my hair with the Shine and protect shampoo and conditioner twice a week (I washed my hair everyday, but I can't wash it everyday with Ojon because it would be too heavy). My hair looks longer since I have been using this product and it seems healthier and shinier. it smells sort like gum or push-ups. I will definitely be buying full sizes of these when I run out. The leave in glossing cream I used every time I wash my hair. The tube size is 2 oz (the same as the shampoo and conditioner) but, it takes so little for my hair that I think it will last six to eight months and it really does work. This is probably the best glossing cream ever (certainly for oily hair)- it's better than Kiehls and Frederic Fekkai and they are both really good. I also use the  shine and protect glossing mist when I "do" my hair (straightening iron or rollers). It works well and makes my hair glossy not greasy and stringy. The last product is the Restorative hair treatment I have used it once and it's conditioning and trufully it does smell strongly (like baby oil and dirt? coffee grounds? ashes?) But, I really didn't notice that the smell lingered after I washed my hair and I think if used it on dry hair you would have really good results

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance shimmer set: Beauty
title: Beautiful
review_text: I am not big into perfumes, however when I first smelled "falling in love" I was in love with it. Light, romantic, girlie I have had nothing but comments when I wear this

product_name: Bliss Super Minty Soap 'N Scrub: Beauty
title: Tingly goodness
review_text: A really refreshing experience that leaves you tingly in places you didn't know you had!

product_name: Bliss Super Minty Soap 'N Scrub: Beauty
title: this stuff is really good...
review_text: A little pricey, but well worth it.  Gives me a charge in the morning and really wakes me up!  Makes you feel cool and tingly all over and I find that I just want to keep on scrubbing!!!  Great product for the summer, b/c the cool feeling you get even lasts for a while after you get out of the shower.  Also, it seems to be concentrated so you don't need a lot of it.  Would have liked it even more if it were a little more moisturizing.  If not for that, and the price, I would have given it a "perfect 5" score

product_name: AVEDA Shampure Shampoo 8.5 fl oz/250 ml: Beauty
title: Shampure is blissful
review_text:
Ok, we all have to shampoo and we've all tried hundreds of products.  This one by Aveda is heavenly. The scent is almost as sweet and fresh as a brand new baby - you know, ladies.  It's bliss.  You just close your eyes and inhale the loveliness of it. Plus, it cleans hair well, leaving it soft and fresh, full.

The shampoo is bliss. Find it, buy it, use it.
At least try it once. An upforgettable experience in the shower

product_name: AVEDA Shampure Shampoo 8.5 fl oz/250 ml: Beauty
title: The BEST shampoo
review_text: This shampoo smells awesome, lathers perfectly, and Aveda is a company with good intentions. The shampoo does a great job cleaning your hair without stripping or coating it. You should be able to buy this shampoo at an Aveda concept salon for about $9

product_name: AVEDA Shampure Shampoo 8.5 fl oz/250 ml: Beauty
title: Awesome Shampoo
review_text: I love, love this shampoo. This lathers up nice and cleans your hair without leaving it stripped and dry.  I also use the Shampure Conditioner with this too.  The scent in this shampoo is heavenly! I have used this shampoo for years and will keep buying it. If you have not tried it you must, and can buy a sample size to try it out.  You will not be disappointed.

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Pretty good
review_text:
I give this product 4.5 stars. I have long wavy/straight hair. It gets really frizzy in humid weather and I used to use John Frieda serum, and that worked well for me. The bottle was just really small and I would run out fast because of my long hair. I decided to buy this product. It has a thinner consistency than John Frieda's serum but it works just as well. It does make my hair soft and it tames the flyaways, but I would not use this product alone in my hair. I usually put a little of this on before I blowdry, a little afterwards and then I put Bed Head's after party in my hair before I straight iron my hair. Both the bed head and Biosilk really sink into my hair and gets absorbed and never looks greasy. After I do that, my hair is super soft. 
I like that the bottle is a good size considering you only need like a dime sized amount but I think it is a little pricey. But considering how long it will last, I think it is worth it. I would never use this on my skin (It says you can use this on your skin) just because I would feel like I am putting oil or something on my skin. And it also smells a little like hair spray, but it is not overpowering. Once you put it in your hair, you cannot smell it. All in all, a great product.

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Great for Detangling and Conditioning
review_text: Smells great, detangles wonderfully and conditions well without a heavy product build-up feel.  I typically use Silk Therapy closer to my relaxer salon appointment as my roots grow in and my hair tangles more easily.  I run a quarter sized amount through recently washed/conditioned towel dried hair and it detangles everything -- much less breakage as a result.  Excellent as a secondary conditioner and detangler

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: BioSilk Therapy
review_text: What can I say, I also have long tight curls and I got so frustrated with the frizz in the humidity that I went back to BioSilk Therapy again.  I trimmed my hair and instead of letting it go curly I decided to straighten it and put a soft curl in with curling iron.  The BioSilk Therapy makes my hair baby soft and protects it from flat irons and curling irons.  Its like I have a totally different head of hair.  This is the best thing out there for curly hair and believe me I tried a lot

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: I Loooove This Stuff!!!!!!!!
review_text: Biosilk is with out a doubt the best product on the market for your hair! I have used it for a few years now, and my hair is in the best condition it has probley ever been in. I have very thick, curly hair that I regularly straighten with a CHI hot iron and color treat, so my hair is rather prone to damage. Before I used this product, my hair was FRIED! It was dry, crispy, and always smelled burnt from straighting it. It was pretty bad. When I went to get my hair cut, the hair dresser made a comment on how badly damaged my hair was. I told her it was from straighting and coloring my hair, and she told my about Biosilk. I little bottle came with the CHI I bought, but I had never bothered to use it. She told me to apply a little bit of it before the next time I straighten my hair to see if it helped. After my first use, my hair was noticably softer, shinier, and less frizzy. So, i continued to use it. It worked even better after I used it for while. It improved the overall condition of my hair, and has made it so much more managable. Another great thing about Biosilk is the subsatnce of it. It has thick, watery like, smooth feel to it. I use about a quarter-sized amount after a shower on wet hair, and right before I style on dry hair. It is so light weight, I can't even tell I have anything in my hair. Because I don't have to use very much, a bottle lasts me for several months. Sure its a little expensive, but it is defenitly worth it! I recommend it to anybody with troublsome hair, or anybody who just wants great-looking hair. I promise, you will love it!!!!!!

product_name: Lancome Definicils High Definition Mascara Black/Noir: Beauty
title: Long-time Favorite
review_text: If I was given a choice of any other mascara for free I wouldn't take it. If I was forced to choose just one item of make-up (God forbid!) I would take this mascara. I experiment with other beauty products but am totally loyal to Defincils. It goes on perfectly from root to tip, separates and makes lashes look long, long, long. It doesn't clump or flake. The name is appropriate because it really does define and that gives the eyes a beautiful open appearance. Lancome is known for making the best mascara and the reputation is well deserved. And if you really want dramatically flutterable lashes try putting on Lancomes base                                    coat which makes lashes fuller too and lengthens. Since I have given other products five stars I wish I could give this six. It's THE best thing in my make-up arsenal

product_name: Bvlgari Pour Homme: Beauty
title: look no further
review_text:
I have tried tons of other scents, around 20 and I hadn't quite found anything that really fit me yet. So nice when you first spray it, the extreme has like a gin or juniper scent, real manly and real clean but not at all like aftershave. After about fifteen twenty minutes it gets real polite like a clean vanilla but not at all like a flower. It smells soft and super wafty almost like a less sweet Burberry but not at all like baby powder. 
   floaty non intrusive and not too sweet. If you hate the strong aftershave smell and the cotton candy machine smell as much as I do or you find yourself spraying cologne on more than once a day then this is your best bet.

don't buy it here you can get it on the cheap off ebay

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Awesome Shaving Alternative
review_text:
I have been getting irritated skin / razor bumps / ingrown hairs (the whole nine yards) ever since I started shaving.  I've tried different cartridges, different methods of shaving, and even a cutthroat razor (had to give that up right away -- much too much maintenance).  However, with the purchase of this Merkur HD safety razor, I've finally found a product that I can stick with.  People say it takes some getting used to, but I found it not the slightest bit more difficult than shaving with a cartridge razor.  I get the closest shaves ever with it, with practically no irritation.  Other pluses include blades that last nearly a week and only cost 50 cents a piece!!  With cartridges costing up to three dollars, it's time to go old school (especially since I'm a poor college student).

I can't compare this model to other safety razors, but I can say that it is a great intro safety razor.  Good weight, and simple to use.  I would definitely recommend this razor to anyone fed up with the cost of cartridges, and looking for a simple, effective solution

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Just used it for the first time..
review_text:
All I have to say is wow.  I'm 24.  My first razor was the same kind of DE razor that my dad used (some Gillette).  Around 17 the mach 3 came out and since the full knowledge of shaving was never really handed down to me, I opted for the mach 3 which was easy to use and gave a decent shave.  I've essentially stuck with the Mach 3 until now, but being generally unsatisfied with the closeness of my shave I decided to investigate and turned back to the safety razor picking up this Merkur HD.  I just used it for the first time and it turned out to be significantly more satisfying than I had hoped it would be.  I nicked myself a few times without really noticing so there's some learning curve but as of now I've only used it once and I can tell you that it won't take long to get it down. 

A couple thoughts:
1) I'm really glad that I went for an HD.  I thought the HD may be heavy (and it may be compared to other DE razors) but I wouldn't want it to be any lighter.  It already feels light in my hand.

2) The biggest thing to keep in mind about the shave is that the razor cuts by keeping it perpendicular to your skin.  The most notable difference between shaving with the Mach 3 v. the Merkur HD centered around this.  With the Mach 3 I kind of feel like I have to drag the blade across my skin (kind of scraping it) to get a close shave (which can be done and I don't notice that much irritation).  That said most of the shave with the HD was as close, but since the aim is to keep the blade perpendicular, the razor felt more like it was gliding over the skin. Very nice.

3) To put in a new blade you unscrew the bottom and the top part comes off.  You pop in the blade, put the top back on and screw the bottom to tighten the top.  

It should be noted that I've started shaving at night so that I can tell what I'm doing (I'm not a morning person) so in the morning if I'm not really going to pay attention the Mach 3 may still be better.  Also, I'm using cheap soap and a boar brush from CVS until the stuff I ordered comes in so with any luck it will be even nicer next time

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Nice Razor for a Beginner
review_text: I recently took the plunge back to DE razors with this one.  I have since picked up some old Gillette's on eBay.  I've been thinking I might as well have stopped with this razor.  It produces a nice close shave and I don't seem to create as many nicks and cuts when using it

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Topnotch Razor & Simplicity
review_text:
This is the ideal razor to start shaving with if learning to use a double edge safety razor.
There are no adjustments to cause confusion, a non-slip grip with indentations, well balanced, quality, and well priced.
   One can always upgrade to a Merkur Futur, Vision, or the Progress models if one wants an adjustable razor. This is my favorite one & the Futur is 2nd. Happy Shaving

product_name: Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor: Beauty
title: Best Razor that I ever purchased!
review_text: I had a Merkur Razor that I bought one year ago. I dropped it in the locker room at the gym and it chipped. So I kept it as a spare, but the new one (Merkur Heavy Duty Safety Razor) is the best! I should have bought this one to begin with. It makes shaving a pleasure! I enjoy shaving everyday! It helps start my day, by looking my best!!

product_name: Veganese Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Best Lush conditioner available
review_text: Smells awesome and it worked better than American Cream on my hair.

product_name: Philosophy Pure Grace Shower Cream 16oz: Beauty
title: Simply The Best
review_text:
In the world of shampoo's I must have tried
every one of them and spent much money, each
time hoping I would see the results that were
promised. Then I found this product.   My hair
responded immediately.   It is now looking
better than it has in years.   I am not a
young woman any more, but still take pride in
myself.   I have to say this is simply the best
shampoo product on the market today - bar none.

product_name: philosophy oxygen peel kit: Beauty
title: Great for hyperpigmentation.....
review_text: Although expensive, this product produces results while the other cheaper ones I've tried simply do not.  Every now and then I get a few zits which don't bother me really.  What bothers me is the dark spot that lasts months after the pimple is gone.  The oxygen peel drastically reduces the blotchiness and hyperpigmentation.  As soon as I rinse the stuff off my face I'm always amazed to look in the mirror and see the results.  This stuff does help keep your pores clean also.  I would recommend using this product every couple of weeks and DEFINATELY before a big event (pictures etc).  Basically you put a gel over your face and then add a hydrogen peroxide cream, the whole thing foams up, you wait 1-3 minutes (intense tingling experienced at times) and then rinse.  Some people say to 1/2 the amount recommended so the product last longer but I didn't really find it was worth it.

product_name: philosophy oxygen peel kit: Beauty
title: Philosophy is Awesome!
review_text: I have been using the Philosophy products for over a year now and it has made an amazing difference on my skin. I love this peel kit. I do admit it feels funny the first couple of times because the first layer is a jelly like substance, and then when the cream "activates" and starts foaming it takes some getting used to. BUT, it is so worth it in the end. I use it once a month and you can tell a difference with the very first use. I use the purity cleanser every day along with the hope in a jar cream. These are the best products ever. Oh and before I forget, the Falling in Love fragrence is my absolute favorite, and the Pure Grace is a very clean smell. Can you tell I am a Philosophy Girl?

product_name: philosophy oxygen peel kit: Beauty
title: Like a new face.
review_text:
This is an amazing product.  It is gentle on the skin, and I have very sensitive skin, yet removes the tired, dead, and darkening follicles.  I can't believe how much lighter and younger my skin looks after a peel.  It smells nice and doesn't cause any itching or burning, on my skin at least.  This is a must to use before big days like weddings or fabulous dates, or when getting back from a grubby camping trip.  One thing, a day after the peel my skin looks a little red/blotchy in places but the day after that it's stunning so if you are indeed purchasing this for a wedding, etc. use it 2 days before the big day or else you might look like a splotchy bride.

Most of Philosophy's products are fabulous and if you're going to go for this, it works well with the Real Purity facial cleanser to use right after the peel, and then the Hope in a Jar moisturizer after that.

product_name: Pure Fiji Spa Coconut Soap - 3.5 oz. - Coconut: Beauty
title: Pure Fiji Spa Coconut Soap
review_text: I like the Pure Fiji Coconut spa line.  All of the Pure Fiji Spa products are great

product_name: Pure Fiji Spa Coconut Soap - 3.5 oz. - Coconut: Beauty
title: Very Clean
review_text: This soap is awesome. What I like about it is that it doesn't have a sweet scent to it. In fact, you really have to sniff it to smell it. It leaves your hands feeling super clean and hydrated, as if you just put on a light lotion (but without the feeling of having something "on" your hands). What I do not like about this soap is that it leaves a reddish-brown film after you use it. I had to buy a special soap holder (one that has little "pillars" to hold the soap up so that it doesn't touch the surface) so it wouldn't make a mess. I really like this soap, though. It's winter, and I like anything that will keep my hands smooth and soft without having to use lotion

product_name: Givenchy Organza: Beauty
title: Sexy and Stimulating
review_text:
Exotic, enticing, and enriching all rolled into one.  As the last reviewer said, this one will have you envisioning something wild and sexy.

Too me its a mixture of so many things that it drives you absolutely WILD.  That's why I really love I love to put this 
on when I go out at night.

This scent contains a blend of: a fresh floral, including honeysuckle, gardenia and iris, with notes of amber and vanilla.

product_name: Caleche by Hermes for Women 3.3 oz Soie de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: A wonderful fragrance that's not over-powering
review_text: I've worn Caleche for 30 years, since a sales person in a parfumerie near the Paris opera introduced it to me in college.  It works year-round & it's not heavy so you don't annoy everyone within 50 feet.  Instead, it lingers just enough.  The parfum formula is great, but this soie de parfum is perfect for work, and it's cheaper.  This is a great price from Amazon and I'm glad to see them offer it...I've had to wait till international travel to get the best buys in the duty-free stores, and it's much easier to use the web

product_name: Get Fresh Body Butter Trio - Lemongrass Lavender, Mandarin Ginger and Starfruit Pear: Beauty
title: great gift idea
review_text: this is a great gift idea for yourself or for a friend.. the smells are wonderful and last.... enjoy

product_name: Lucky No. 6 by Lucky Brand for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: I love the spicy, oriental scent of Lucky No. 6. The bottle is unique and it seems you get quite a lot in the bottle. Great for clubbing or a date

product_name: Lancome Flextencils Mascara: Beauty
title: Best lengthening
review_text: I use both this mascara and Lancome Hypnose when i'm going out, Flextencils first then coat with Hypnose.  My lashes look HUGE and not too clumpy.  Flextencils add great length, while Hypnose adds volume.  I use it by itself on just an average day.  Great Product

product_name: The Body Shop Spa Wisdom Pure Pampering Gift: Beauty
title: Impressive
review_text: St. Valentine's day is a very special occasion and it does matter what men give to their ladies. I selected this "pampering gift" and I am very happy now because she absolutely loved it! It is really a top quality package that is suitable for "pure pampering". It is a little bit pricy but so what. She deserves the best and this is one of the best things that I found

product_name: Proraso Eucalyptus Shave Cream 150 ml.: Beauty
title: Smells great
review_text: I love the aroma of this shave cream. It may brighten your mood even if you are not in mood. It very well moisturizes and cools the skin. Overall it is an upper scale product and is worthy the price

product_name: Phyto Phytobrush Special Smoothing Shampoo For Blow-Drying - Anti-Frizz: Beauty
title: Great Product for blow drying hair straight
review_text: I have naturally VERY curly and fine hair. Due to having fine hair I have the unfortunate circumstance that I do not have weight to my hair to pull the curl down, therefore I blow dry it straight every other day. For about 10 yrs now I have used the Phyto defrisant balm which is fantastic because you never feel that your hair has product in it, but it smooths it out. So I decided to buy their shampoo for similar purpose. It is excellent. It is another product that tames the hair but it moves naturally and it never feels like there is product left in the hair. Definitely a great product and paired with the defrisant balm is excellent for blow drying

product_name: Phyto Phytobrush Special Smoothing Shampoo For Blow-Drying - Anti-Frizz: Beauty
title: Worth every penny!! I'll never go back. Life saver
review_text: I had long straight all one length hair, the kind of hair people wish they had. Then I gave birth to the love of my life and my hair went to S**T!! It went frizzy, for 8 years I tried expensive, cheap anything (so, I thought) that said would help frizzy hair. Then I heard of Phyto, Yepee!! Between PhytoBrush and Defrisant, I have my hair back. IT'S NOT FRIZZY ANYMORE. If you are anything like me, on a budget and really can't afford it. Save up. You only have to use a little to help. And the peace of mind it gives you (your sanity back)no more bad hair days. Is worth the price by far. I'll never go back. PLEASE try it. Love your hair again

product_name: Green Tea Antioxidant Face Complex: Beauty
title: great cream for sensitive skin
review_text: I have very sensitive skin. I have tried so many face creams, if they did anything else but strictly moisturize (i.e. anti aging, etc.), my skin would break out in a rash. My daughter had given me an "anti stress" cream mask she brought from Germany.  My skin looked so much better!  One ingredient was green tea. So I searched for creams with green tea and found this one.  This cream is the answer to all those women with super sensitive skin. It actually improves my skin tone. The price is great too

product_name: Green Tea Antioxidant Face Complex: Beauty
title: Really works
review_text: I have sensitive skin and mild rosacea and have tried many so-called "calming" moisturizers, even some supposedly medically formulated ones.  This is the first moisturizer that really does seem to calm my skin, and feels soothing when applied.  Maybe it's the green tea.  It also does improve the look of my skin.  I'd be sorry if they ever discontinued this prouct - I rely on it

product_name: Bvlgari Pour Femme: Beauty
title: A favorite of mine
review_text: I tried this scent ten years ago after reading that it was Mary Tyler Moore's favorite, and it soon became mine.  Lightly feminine and sensual, it always garners compliments when I wear it.   Strangers (men and women alike) have told me how much they enjoyed the scent and asked what I was wearing.  I also carry the compressed powder compact in my purse.  It's got a slightly more "powdery" (appropriate, I suppose) note and is a wonderful way to carry the scent with you.  It will always be a staple for me

product_name: Bvlgari Pour Femme: Beauty
title: Subtle, feminine, and light fragrance; great for summer!
review_text:
This has been one of my favorites since its introduction in 1994.  This fragrance is on the light side.  I wear it in the summer.  The undertones of this scent are definitely floral but with a good bit of spice in the background.

I love this perfume and receive compliments on it from both men and woman.  I have had people at work ask me to right down the name of this one so that they could buy it for themselves or their wife.  

This perfume is a winner.  I highly recommend this scent.  Give it a whiff the next time you are out perfume shopping. I don't think that you will be disappointed

product_name: Beyond Paradise by Estee Lauder for Women 1.0 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Succulent hybrid of fruits and florals
review_text:
Beyond Paradise was my Christmas gift from a dear friend and I was really surprised how well she pinpointed a perfume that is not only totally gorgeous but one that works so well with the chemistry of my skin. The fragrance is a prismatic rainbow of juicy fruits and florals, heavily laden with succulent honeysuckle and musky base. I love the lasting power of the fragrant aura that envelops me the second I pray it on and the bottle looks absolutely breathtaking on my dresser. The scent itself is heady and aromatic, more floral and sophisticated than most tropical fragrance; I don't smell bananas and coconut here but soft orchid, pulpy woods, juicy plum and soft dewy honeysuckle with its sparkling golden nectar.

This is one of my favorite perfumes now, something I reach for very often and something that puts a smile on my face whenever I get a whiff of it. One a rainy and gray monday morning I feel that I can carry a layer of ambrosial paradise that sets on me like a soft cloud of euphoric proportions as it nestles itself into my skin and exudes a shimmery cloud of scent all day long. It's really a rainbow of happiness in a bottle. 

The top notes are Eden's Mist, Blue Hyacinth, Orange Flower Templar, Jabuticaba Fruit.
Middle notes are Laelia Orchid, Crepe Jasmin, Mahonia Japonica, Pink Honeysuckle balanced over a base of Natal Plum Blossoms, Ambrette Seed, Zebrano Wood, Golden Melaleuca Bark for a sweet and fruity concoction.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Beyond Paradise by Estee Lauder for Women 1.0 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: This is fabulous
review_text: I love this stuff. It smells flowery but not old lady flowery. Not cheap flowery.

product_name: Clinique Quickliner for Eyes: Beauty
title: waterproof and really goes on smooth
review_text: Love this have almost every color.Goes on smooth no tugs.Blends beautifully

product_name: Creative Nail Design SolarOil Cuticle Treatment: Beauty
title: Awesome for natural or fake nails!
review_text: I am one to always try new oils and creams that claim to be the best for nails and hands. Well let me tell you, this stuff is truly the best product that I have ever used for nails and cuticles. Solar Oil is meant for use on natural and fake nails. You should rub it on your nails and cuticles each night at bedtime. It soothes and moisturizes your nails and keeps them from being brittle and cracking. Awesome stuff...a must for anyone who wants their nails to look attractive...the price is right too

product_name: La Mer The Concentrate 50ml/1.7oz: Beauty
title: I love it!
review_text: I purchased The Concentrate a year ago when I had a rhinoplasty, and put it on the incision line after the stitches came out.  Now, there isn't scar!  It is also suitable for the most sensitive skin, which I have. The Creme slightly aggrivated my skin and the Concentrate did not.  It may cost more than the Creme, but it lasts about five months when used in moderation.  I recommend it it anyone who wants scarless skin post-surgery

product_name: Curve by Liz Claiborne for Men 6.8 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Great sent for day use!!!!
review_text:
I love this cologne so much that I upgrade my 50ml with this big bottle of 200ml. 
girls love it!

product_name: Too Faced Lash Gems: Beauty
title: Bat Your Lashes, Ladies
review_text: I purchased these at my local Sephora.  They are pretty easy to apply (much easier than I imagined) and they don't bat off like I thought they would.  I'm happy with this purchase and would purchase them again.  Wearing them to Teddy's last week I got a ton of compliments on the pink.  And for $15, you get four complete sets in white, black, pink and blue so this will last

product_name: Too Faced Lash Gems: Beauty
title: Fabulous!!
review_text: I saw these and just had to try them.  I have to say that I am very impressed.  They are easy to put on and easy to take off.  I've had lots of compliments on them.  I will definately buy more when I run out

product_name: Curve by Liz Claiborne for Men 4.2 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: I'm a woman and I love it
review_text: I'm a woman and I love the smell of this stuff. Whenever my male friends wear it I want to follow them around for the rest of the day with my nose in their wake. And that's really the point of buying cologne right? I plan on buying some for my husband this Christmas.

product_name: Curve by Liz Claiborne for Men 4.2 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: My girlfriend loves this...and so do I!
review_text: My girlfriend acutally introduced me to curve. She really likes it, so i picked up a bottle...and i love it too! wish i had found this a while back! everyone comments about it...smells so good! you can't go wrong with curve

product_name: Curve by Liz Claiborne for Men 4.2 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Oh that Curve!
review_text:
Well I got my bottle of Curve today along with another couple of colognes on the "So you'd like to...start wearing cologne" guide on amazon that I have been purchasing by. With all my newfound knowledge about cologne history, perspective, and opinions, I used these colognes to give an informative speech this evening in my public speaking course, complete with all the bottles present. I sprayed CURVE onto myself when it arrived, and now I am comparing all of the new scents to my favorites so far, HUGO and CANDIES. My impression was that it was more serious than Hugo, had a sweetish overtone combined with musk, and then there was sort of a greenish bitter forest type scent to it that I wasn't crazy about. I think I may have been dissappointed at first, but that soon changed. After about fifteen minutes the smell got to be really good and the elements I hadn't liked were gone or had matured into subtle forms that went well together. 
After the speech I allowed the class to sample all of the colognes, and Curve was commented on the most, followed by Drakkar, then Hugo. All of the women liked it and seemed to have great associations with it, and for that I have to ensure that it gets the full 5 stars. I continue to wear it now later this same evening and it has quite grown on me. 
If you only bought Curve as your main cologne, you'd be quite alright. Subtle enough for casual wear and bright enough for clubbing. Overall good mix

product_name: Andis SpeedMaster Clipper: Beauty
title: Great Clipper
review_text: I bought this clipper after talking to the woman who cut my hair in the past.  It is the same model she uses at her shop.  It has been everything I expected.  Easy to use with a variety of attachments.  I highly recommend it

product_name: OPI Nail Lacquer Classics Collection NLS72 Romeo & Joliet: Beauty
title: Perfect summer color
review_text: This color can go from summer right onto fall.  Great wide professional brush too makes painting nails a breeze!  Good buy

product_name: OPI Nail Lacquer Classics Collection NLS72 Romeo & Joliet: Beauty
title: Punny names, hard shiny durable finish
review_text: This is a very popular nail polish with color names that are always a play on words or something whimsical. My favorite is "I'm Not Really A Waitress" which is a deep, diva garnet shade and really beautiful. The colors tend to be very rich or very opaque and really wear well. The bottles are pretty

product_name: Clinique Moisture Surge Extra Thirsty Skin Relief: Beauty
title: Good moisturizer
review_text: It's light weight that doesn't make me feel sticky.  I have oily skin underneath and dry at the surface.  After using this one I have less break out.  My skin feels softer in the morning.  If the skin is too dry it does feel stinging.  It can be used as a mask too

product_name: Clinique Moisture Surge Extra Thirsty Skin Relief: Beauty
title: Awesome!
review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 years now. This is a non-greasy product that is easily absorbed into your skin and keeps skin moist all day. I have struggled with very dry skin and acne all my life and this is the only product I have found that does not make me break out! Also love the fact that it has no scent whatsoever. LOVE it

product_name: Murad Acne Complex Starter Kit ($44 Value): Beauty
title: The best thing since sliced bread!
review_text:
I am allergic to benzoyl peroxide.  So, there are many products that I can't use for acne.  I tried everything that didn't have benzoyl peroxide in it - even expensive department store brands and beauty brands to clear up my skin.  Murad's Acne System was the only one that worked!  My skin cleared up in a week.  I didn't go through any purging that I could tell.  However, I started using the system right after a professional deep cleansing facial.  It took several months to get completely clear but it worked.  I have been using it for several years now and break out if I forget it when I'm travelling.  I can't live without it!  I recently got a facial on a cruise and the woman couldn't believe that I had problems with breakouts.  I would if I wasn't using my Murad.

I faithfully wash my face in the shower with the cleansing gel every morning.  Once or twice a week I use the AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser that I purchased separately.  I then apply the Acne Treatment Gel after I've dried off.  I follow with the moisturizer in the kit.  I do the same thing at night (except I'm not in the shower).  I almost never need the spot treatment now.  I have several tubes drying up in my cabinet.  I bought the mask separately too and used it a lot in the beginning but now I think the tube has dried up.  I haven't needed it in over a year.  I also used the vitamin supplements in the beginning.  However, since I do take vitamins anyway, I didn't really notice that they made a difference.  I also get a facial by a professional once and awhile to give my skin a boost.  However, since they are $$$ I tend to only get 2 or 3 a year.  Last year I only had one and my skin looked great.

product_name: Mistral Scented Bar Soap: Beauty
title: LUXURIOUS AND LOVELY
review_text:
Mistral, as many know, is a powerful, gusty wind that blows across the south of France. Mistral, as I was happy to discover, is also the name of a line of bath and body products, all French inspired, all lusciously lovely from scented soaps to soothing lotions to rejuvenating body butters. 

Matthew Tilker, founder and president of Mistral, utilizes Shea butter, which is an efficacious natural healer, in a myriad of must-have forms. Derived from the nuts of the African Shea Tree (according to sacred custom the nuts are harvested primarily by women), this butter is highly emollient, a boon for those with dry skin, chapped lips, any number of skin irritations. 

The pure Shea Butter soap comes in a plethora of inviting fragrances, all milled six times (while others boast being triple milled). South Seas is a particular favorite - it's as fresh as an ocean breeze and as calming, soothing as a tropical island. The marine scent is accented with a touch of grapefruit, white flowers and soft woods. An irresistible combination. 

South Seas is a fragrance with which you wish to surround yourself - made possible by the shower gel, body lotion, massage bath and body oil, bath salts and candle all available at very accessible prices. 

     - Gail Cooke

product_name: Buffy Skin Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: I can't live without it
review_text: Buffy makes me so happy, I hate to shower without it.  I have extremely dry and sensitive skin and I'm prone to icky scaly patches, especially in winter.  Buffy smooths them away with the scrubby bits, then moisturizes with the butters and oils.  It's worth the money -- even with regular use, the bar lasts a long time.

product_name: Buffy Skin Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great exfoliator and moisturizer, but a little oily.
review_text:
My favorite thing about Buffy... it's awesome exfoliating properties!  I live in Hawaii, and the salt water and sun can take a beating to your skin, so I love this product!  It does an awesome job of exfoliating away dead and dry skin, and the essential oils in the bar give my skin it's moisture back.  Though like mentioned in other reviews, the almond pieces may be too rough for sensitive skin, and I wouldn't recommend this for daily use for anyone who has oily skin.  Once a week should be great.

The only thing I didn't care was the fact that Buffy did leave a slight coat of oil on my skin, and unless I was taking a really hot shower, my shower/tub floor was left feeling slick also.  I usually have to rinse again quickly with my soap, but this bar is a really nice skin conditioner for once-a-week treatments. I like to save the bar and use it when I have some time to relax for a while in the tub.  That way I'll do the bar right when I get in, and just let the essential oils absorb into my skin. I love it!

Still highly recommended

product_name: Buffy Skin Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: Yowza!
review_text: Buffy is my favorite Lush product ... and I know I'm not alone in this! Anything that saves me steps in the morning is a wonderful thing, and I love the idea that it's exfoliating and moisturizing in one. It's actually really difficult to describe the Buffy experience, but if you try this one, I'm sure you'll be hooked like me. The scent is yummy and unlike previous reviewers, I find that it lasts for a long time (although like all Lush products, you don't want to leave them sitting in the shower or tub - let them dry out after each use). I use Buffy on my legs in between shaving days, and I do an all over body scrub about once every week or two. Doing this, the small bar lasts about a month. I love that it's such a strong exfoliator, but someone with sensitive skin may need to go easy with Buffy

product_name: Buffy Skin Conditioner by LUSH: Beauty
title: I can't live without this stuff!
review_text:
Okay, so I'm a lotions and potions person. And, I suffer from severe dry skin. You know, the dry bumps all over your arms, and itchy patches on legs sort of dryness. A dermatologist called it extreme keratosis pilaris, and told me to use something like Amlactin. 
So I used that stuff and it worked, but the smell and texture was dreadful. So over the years I've tested and tried multiple other things. And it's worked, but all left my skin kinda sticky, and not moisturized enough.

Then,.....I found this little miracle bar. It took care of all my skin issues, plus it felt good, plus is smelled good. And I have wonderful skin!
